text: The owner/groomer Jenise is so professional and a perfectionist with grooming and loving on my 2 standard and 3 miniature poodles!  They love their Aunt Jenise!!🐩🐩🐩🐩🐩

name: Lira Ziyad
text: The staff was great and I love the glass imprint made of my dog's foot!

name: Richard Williamson
text: Excellent place for pet grooming highly recommend them

name: Kaitlyn Harris
text: Had a appointment at 9:30 (they are suppose to open at 9) there were about 5 owners waiting for them still at 9:40!!

name: Shay Culbertson
text: My poor Poodle mix had a terrible experience.  They took all day to groom him. He was never let out for a potty break. They lied to us that he was taken out. When we picked him up he urinated all over himself.  He was humiliated. Unbelievable.

name: Mary Gayle Davidson
text: Wonderful groomers and staff. They did an excellant job grooming my Mini Goldendoodle  and they took care of her as if she were their own.

name: Svetlana Bogdan
text:
Since I have no other option buy to write a review on this page so let it be. I called Fancy Fur last year around September to make an appointment for my dog, we are not new clients so I gave all information to a lady I talked on the phone and after a minute of checking she said that they are pretty booked for few months ahead and gave me no information about any days or months where we can make an appointment, I gave up and took my dog to another place.
Decided to call them again today 3/24/2021. Same situation: gave them my dog’s name and got a reply that they have to check and call me back. I got a call back within an hour and they said they booked for few weeks ahead so they can put us on cancellation list. I asked when is the closest day we can make an appointment and they said she can’t even tell me a day. How is that possible? Are you booked for a year ahead? And got a reply that people are still waiting from last year! Lady on the phone wasn’t rude but I can tell she wasn’t telling the truth. I had to ask if my dog is on some kind of “bad dog” list and we just have to look for another place.

I don’t know how busy people are at Fancy Fur, but this is not the way to make a good reputation.

name: Kristin Alverson
text: We brought our husky here after having a horrible experience at a different local groomer, which left him with bruising and a very matted coat. The ladies of Fancy Fur were so welcoming and loving to our fur baby. He is very shy and doesn’t take well to new people and warmed up to these ladies instantly. We went in for a meet and greet and came up with a plan to get my dog‘s coat back in the condition it was before it was ruined by the other groomers. They were able to take care of him the very next day and even sent him home with a report card that had a sweet little note on it. I would highly recommend Fancy Fur to anyone. If you want you fur baby to feel at home and receive lots of love this is the place to go!

name: The Dude
text: Good, they seem to care alot about the dogs. "We talk dog" is the best in Birmingham.

name: Leslie Hahn
text: You can tell that they really love animals at this place. Every time your pet gets groomed they get a treat and a report card on the way out. Their love for Animals is shown in the Precision of the grooming and the care that your animal will get. Wonderful place!

name: Brittney M
text: I had a very good experience having my dog groomed here! My dog looked great and the staff was friendly. My groomer listened to me and gave my dog the look I wanted. I LOVE that there is a drop off period (7am-12pm?) instead of having everyone show up at one time. I'll definitely return!

name: Emily Finlen
text: I just moved to Birmingham and was looking to get my dog groomed. A friend of mine suggested Fancy Fur and they did a wonderful job. She was happy and looked great. I was also behind and couldn't get off work at the time I wanted and they were so sweet to take care of her, took her out, and made sure she was ok instead of just sitting caged up all afternoon. The staff was very friendly and polite.

name: Kimberlee Spencer
text: Had a horrible experience here...paid $160 for what I could have done at home...was charged a totally different price than what I was told on phone...was told $125 and when I picked up I had to pay $160 because they said they had to brush out mats...there were no mats on this dog, he is a show dog and I had just showed him the weekend before...took my own shampoo to use and it was returned to me with EXACTLY the same amount in it.  They did not even use it unless they literally used one drop!  Had to do all over again when I got home.

name: Beverly Craft
text: Excellent job every time and goes the "extra mile!" Darling gifts in her shop also

name: Sydney Bomar Mayfield
text: The only people I trust with my fur baby! SO sweet & perfect grooming!

name: Connie Craig
text: I was very disappointed, they never called me back.

name: annette bramblett
text: We have taken our furbabies to Vanessa for years. We All love her.

name: Anthony Free
text: Didn't go inside

name: Judi Castro
text: Barbara has been grooming our yorkie for about 10 years. She is wonderful!  Even after moving away to Gardendale we have continued to make the trip to have her groom our baby. I highly recommend!  Not only a great groomer but a wonderful friend!

name: Colleen Hopwood
text: My little guy is a rescue and was not trusting of even me at times. I took him to Barbara from the beginning.  She is so GREAT with him. He gets so excited when he knows that he is going to get to see his Barbara.  It makes me feel so good for him to be excited and literally runs in to find her. He is a Yorkie and I keep his hair long. People always comment on how beautiful he is. There is another good groomer two doors down from my business but I will only take him to Blue Rock. That has been his home away from home since  I got him at a year old. He is 10 now and I won't use anyone else.  They are AMAZING!!

name: C Stewart
text: Nothing but GREAT things for Blue Rock! The owner is beyond phenomenal and the workers are nothing but SWEET to our pups. When other local grooming places had a wait list 2 months out, Blue Rock was able to squeeze us in the next day. That to me is everything, and doing what you can for customers!!! This place is a blessing for the Chelsea community!

name: Bobby Clayton
text: Very friendly staff and good at what they do

name: Kim Henderson
text: It was a great place and great Godly Women

name: Libby West
text: Love this groomer! So did my Mayzee. Rebecca gave Mayzee the best haircut she has ever had. Mayzee loved the "home style" atmosphere. She wasn't crated, had free access to water, and they gave her frequent breaks. Mayzee is over 10 years old and really appreciated the treatment she got. Great prices as well.

name: Jean Johnson
text: This was the first time going, after a disastrous grooming appointment at Pet Sense.  I will never go anywhere else except here from now on.  My dog is terrified of groomers, but she actually was pretty calm here.  I love the fact that they don't put them in cages.  My dog really needs some puppy transactions.  They speak calm and low for the pups and it seemed to help.  When we picked her up she looked like another dog.  She was ADORABLE.  Her nails were perfect, and she fights when you touch her nails so this was big.  I love their work

name: Alyssa C
text: Absolutely love this place! Miss Julee is so kind and loves my dogs like her own! She and her staff take excellent care of my babies and they come home looking as great and happy as ever. Also, she does an amazing job with poodle type dogs. My maltipoos looked incredible after every grooming session. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a groomer!

name: Tammy Thomas
text: Beautiful cut.We are happy

name: Dianne Barody
text: Daisy and Gabby love miss Julee. She treats my fur babies as if they were her very ownn

name: Carri Owens
text: I took my sheltie to this groomer and she developed such a bad skin infection she lost all of her fur.  To the point I took her to the vet and instead of months amd months of treatment with no guarantee of recovering we had to put her to sleep .I would not recommend this groomer to anyone.

name: Amanda Camarano
text: I love taking my dog, Hannah, to Julie!  Hannah always came home with a smile on her face and looking great!  Julie listened to what I wanted done and asked questions, so there were no surprises.  She even sent fun pictures!

name: Heather Riley (Iris)
text: Julee is amazing and really loves our fur babies. She also takes pictures of them in costumes which is adorable!!! 💙💙💙

name: Christopher Spindler
text: Ms.Julie is Awesome! She does such a beautiful job, is always kind and loving and you can just tell that she loves what she does.  I wouldn't take my dog anywhere else!  I highly recommend to anyone looking for a very high quality grooming service for a very good price!

name: Patti Mejia
text:
Our two dogs love going to see Ms. Julee at Doggie Do's. She is so caring and gentle. I have no worries about their well-being because Ms. Julee spoils and pampers each pup as if they were her own.

Best Groomer Near Fort Rucker!

name: Raquel Millas
text: Today I went there to check the prices for grooming and nails and ohhh gosh I couldn't breathe inside their place smell so bad that I get nauseous and almost puck,  the smell of cigarettes is horrible the owner breathe too, poor of those who take their furr babies there the atmosphere is not healthy for the dogs , their lungs somehow will get all that cigarettes smoking!!!! If u do really care about your pet think twice before bring them there.

name: Hollis Watkins
text: Ms. Julee is the BEST! My dog absolutely loves going to see her and gets excited even when I mention her name. Great service and great work! Wouldn't take my pup to anyone else!

name: LALA
text: MY FUR BABIES ARE NEVER SCARED WHEN THEY COME HOME FROM MS. JULEE !!! BEFORE I FOUND MS. JULEE, I HAD TO USE OTHER GROOMERS AND MY BABIES WOULD GET HOME AND HIDE AND WOULD TREMBLE AND WERE TERRIFIED !! NOW, THEY ARE HAPPY LITTLE SHOW OFFS !!! THEY ADORE MS. JULEE AND WE DO TOO !!! SHE LOVES OUR BABIES AS IF THEY WERE HER OWN SHE IS AMAZING !!!

name: Charles Daly
text: The best groomer in the Ft. Rucker area or anywhere for that matter. I've never seen anyone give pups so much care and attention and love. Doggie Do's will spoil your dog.

text: The best groomer I have ever had! I wish Julie were here in Boca Raton, FL...She would definitely make lots of money thanks to her professional and caring service. My fur baby and I miss her so much, and I highly recommend Doggie Do's.

text: Julee loves your pup like her own, she is the sweetest and really takes care and attention to the task at hand. We love our Julee!

text: I used to really love this place, but they have become consumed with virtue signaling. You are a dog groomer, not a medical professional. You do not have the right to ask me for my medical information. They also attempted to charge me $51.50, saying they had scheduled my dog for a bath rather than the $16 nail trimming I’d asked for.

name: Teresa Hunt
text: They were very sweet when I meet one of the gromers. When picked Sadie up she was very  happy but ready to go home 🏡.

name: Sarah Lawson
text: Had to change groomers of my miniature schnauzer as groomer used for 10+ years retired. Tried Sudsy Buds as 4 star rating. Unfortunately, i had horrible experience as my pet was scalped. He was so miserable that I had to take him to the vet for assistance. Vet suggested I never use this groomer again as horrible experience and caused my dog to be extremely uncomfortable for weeks. My mistake for not noticing business had so few reviews although in business for years.

name: Brandy Edmondson
text: Simply the best! All of my babies are well cared for and come home looking & smelling amazing! You can look, but you won't find better!

name: Andy Velazquez
text: We can not recommend Sudsy Buds enough! They are always so sweet and able to get our puppy quickly! They are willing to answer all of our questions, and our puppy always comes home looking awesome!

name: mike foreman
text: Reliable friendly groomer. Very happy with results on our golden doodle.

name: Jessica Carson
text:
So a place with only 5 stars is sketchy or fantastic and hard to come by. This place is great! I called to ask about their services today and they had just opened so of course they were busy. I got their voicemail and it was super informative. They offer a text option and that is perfect for me. They responded instantly and apologized for not answering my call because the recognized the number was the same.

I sent pictures of my dog and explained his undercoat is bad and needs some love. They sent back the new client information and what his grooming would include. I told them if he doesn’t participate in getting his nails filed just cut them and not to worry. He has not let any other groomer or vet file his nails while he was awake. Like most people I’m at home and free anytime for an appointment.

They offered me same day on a Saturday or next available starting Tuesday. They had a cancellation so I was more than happy to take the Saturday spot!

My pup is looking fantastic and smells great! They even filed his nails and said that he gave them no trouble and did great! For a 65lb-ish dog I am always worried to leave him somewhere or try a groomer. First trip with zero regrets. From the person fielding all my questions to the person or people doing the dogs it was a smooth contactless drop off and pick up. Fantastic job! Me and more importantly, my pup, can’t wait to go back!

name: Kendra Bridgham
text: Great place with great people. The facilities are always clean, all the animals are happy to be there and the employees treat your pets as if they were their own. If I could go higher than 5 stars I would.

name: Suzanne Talley
text: They did a great job and got me in quickly. I'll definitely be using them again! Very friendly also sweet to our puppy.

name: Kane Bourgeois
text: Favorite place to get my pets groomed! Best staff in the world. 😘

name: Hillary Chance
text:
I have to RAVE RAVE RAVE!! about this business!!
First..... about 3 months ago I had taken my springer spaniel to a different facility up the road that gets great reviews.  He was basically shaved to where I could see bald spots and cut and left with scabs for a week.  He was not even a year old when this happened. It was his first time to be groomed.  They even called me before I picked him up to warn me that the cut was probably not the best because HE acted out and continued to charge me even so.
Of course his hair has grown and his scabs long gone, it was time to try again so I found Sudsy Buds and nervously made the appointment.  They were so very kind on the phone and from the very beginning and throughout the process.  When we first arrived, he was very nervous.  The owners came and crouched down to his level and loved on him for a good while and I could tell he was fine by the time I left for work leaving him  in their care.  They texted pics during the process and in all the pics he looked very relaxed and had his signature smile on.  The venue is VERY CLEAN!!  I loved the folks there and when I picked him up he was cut  exactly how I asked them to cut him, no bald spots or cuts like the other facility, and was not upset at all, just tired from his day at the spa  haha!! I would HIGHLY recommend Sudsy Buds to any of my friends or family!

name: charmel taylor
text: Tara & her hubby are the Dynamic Duo!! They are the absolute best! The Groomer Whispers’s. If you want a team that pays close attention to your fur baby and his/her special grooming needs. This is your place!

name: Steven G
text: I'm extremely satisfied with my pups haircut!! They do an excellent job and have a wonderful staff!  Thanks so much!! 😊

name: Tim Cano
text: Tara and Brandon do a great job! My Aussie has a thick coat and they handle her with great care!

name: Connie Hartley
text: I took my doodle, Lulu, to Sudsy Buds yesterday and she got the best groom she has ever had!  We will be back.

name: Jay rblx
text: Great job! Very pleased!

name: morgan smitherman
text: I called on a Friday & talked to Nicole. She told me she could get my golden retriever in on Tuesday at 9:30. She told me on that Friday she would send me the address since she moved & she never did. I called her at 8:45 on tuesday to get the address & no answer. I continuously called & texted her cell & the business number up until 9:45 & I never heard back from her. I finally found the correct address on her website & was there at 9:35. I texted her & told her I was outside and if i should bring him in or if i should wait another day because i didn’t understand why she was not answering. Never got a reply from her. HIGHLY do not recommend as she is not reliable, responsive, or professional.

name: Joy Baker
text: They were able to get my dog in quickly, and they did an amazing job. He smells so great, and was in a great mood when I picked him up! Great job! Highly recommended!

name: Millie de Simone
text: Took my baby for her first grooming and was very pleased with the results. They gave me an appointment that was very convenient for me and best of all my baby looked great and smelled wonderful.

name: Athena Morales
text: My two dogs Lola and Ramsey were in bad shape with overgrown hair and mats all through it which made them look like homeless animals, it was out of control but Nicole took them anyway, and the transformation is Amazing...They look Beautiful with the new cut and are so much cooler with this hot summer weather! I am so Thankful for the hard work she put into my two babies. She treated them as part of her family while they were there getting groomed...Thank you Nicole!  AKA:  ROSALINDA HAYNES

name: Dennis Emmons
text: So friendly do a good job at my puppy so happy there.

name: Crystal Gilliand
text: Does an amazing job!! Very detailed!! Very family like business! Very experienced!!

name: Federated Trading, LLC.
text: Excellent job and service!

name: Susan Trump
text: The groomer and her helpers do a great job and really  care for your pets. I have taken reba to her twice and she looks awesome. .so I took my Shelties to her they did a great job

name: KrisTina Massey
text: My scrappy gets groomed here and attends day care. He loves this place and so do I! They're so sweet to my baby

name: Brandy Minor
text: I was referred to Nicole by a friend and I couldn't be more pleased with the friendly and caring service my dog and I both received. Nicole is very knowledgeable and caring. My Standard Poodle Memphis has a forever loving groomer.

resp.text: We love this boy, he is now forever part of our pack! And acts as though he is as well!! Lol....I am so glad to be able to watch this chocolate fluffy bundle of love (who thinks he's one of the tough guys in the Doberman duo ....now trio with him!!!)) But thank you fpr allowing us to be a part of you guys daily life!!! By the way, we (mainly the doberdork Crew and myself)already miss him!!! They run to his playroom everyone we let them out waiting for him to come out too!!! See you guys soon again!!!

name: Parker Smith
text: Slowest, most unorganized business I've ever experienced. Had my dog for nearly 10 hours one day. dropped off around 8 am and wasn't done until 6. Just last week, dropped off at 930 and went by at 330 and took him home. Had only been washed. Will not use again. No sense of urgency or understanding people have a life. Wouldn't recommend.

name: Beverly Morgan
text: Just had my two maltetzus groomed today. Nicole did a fabulous job. Could not believe how well my girls behaved for her. I have found my groomer.

name: Marlena Hayes
text: The staff at A Cut Above is absolutely amazing!!!! They treat your animals like their own. They are definitely in the business because of a passion they have. I wouldn't use anyone else!!!

name: Cherise Scott
text: I Have 2 Pomeranians male/ female I was extremely satisfied with their cuts, and they both smelled so good. Would definitely recommend this place to family and friends ❤️

name: Christina Huff
text: If you want your dog to receive a hair cut, this is NOT the place for your pets. The last two appointments that were scheduled with them (today, and 3-4 weeks ago), my dogs were there for hours only to be called later and told, "Our employee who performs haircuts hasn't shown up for work today". So I get to pick my dogs up TWICE in a row with no haircut. Even better, no one calls to follow up, or apologize, or offer a discount. Now I've got to wait another week before I can schedule them elsewhere since they've notified me only after hours of waiting that it wasn't going to happen. There are many other choices in town. Do not waste your time or have your dogs sitting there for hours for absolutely nothing. They dont care about their business (apparant by lack of follow up or apology), their dont care about their customers, and certainly dont care about your pets. Unbelievable!

name: Debra Forbus
text: Everyone is very friendly and they do a great job grooming my Shih Tzu. I couldn't be more pleased. Thank you for your service.

name: Elizabeth Jones
text: I went in to get some samples of dog shampoo, and saw she had a few small dogs. They seem skitished. So i asked her why, she told me why, Its was because of the previous groomer they had. She took the time, petted them loved on them, and got them comfortable with her befor she started working on there bath. I watched her handel the pups and dogs she had for over a hour. She showed love, and respect. She will deffently be my groomer. I will not have to worry about my dogs being ruffed and not showed love and respect like they deserve

name: Nanna Moates
text: We always get a great cut for the two dogs.

text: Worst grooming ever. Cut spot down to the skin on left side. Brought dog in at 11:00am and he wasn't ready until 5:40pm, then was charge more than was quoted with less service. Was told will do the other services next time.

name: Brenda Glass
text: Awesome groomer

name: Sylvia Moates
text: Awesome!!!

text: The staff was very friendly amd courteous. The answered all my questions very well. As a first impression goes, i have confidence my animals will be in good hands with them.

text: This is my most FAVORITE pet place ever. My dog who usually does not like people, LOVES them all. He loves coming and playing with the other dogs for daycare, the staff take care of him so well. I feel like he is with his extended family when he is here.

name: J Kincer
text: Awesome people, service and grooming☝️

text: Just because you do not recognize my name does not mean I have never used your facility.

resp.text:
Thank you for taking the time to give us a review. But having never used our facility, we are confused with the low score.
Hopefully there was a misunderstanding that we can get resolved quickly!

name: Mary Suhr
text: If you are told to be there a particular day....make sure you have an appointment. I was told to be there today only to find I had no appointment. Every groomer I have used over the last 20 years you bring them in and pick them up that day. Don't understand this perspective.

name: Gypsy Barretto
text: Absolutely beautiful and functional boarding facility! Our 4 fur babies will be staying for 7 days in January. We have also used Abigail's doggie day care for our Chena, she had a wonderful time and was so calm when she came home after her day with playing with friends!

name: Jasson Thomas
text: Always great service and my dog lives it there.

name: Jennifer Holley
text: I would highly recommend Abigail’s Waggin Tails!!!! We love to go on vacation but hate to because Lucy has separation anxiety and it makes us sad to leave her. This was our 1st experience and they did not disappoint us!! They are super sweet people and they show all the animals lots of love!! They also have rooms with cameras where you can check on them anytime, which helps so much just to get to see them. If you are ever worried you can text them and they are very quick to respond. Also, very good about working around the needs of your pet!! Lucy loved it and made some sweet little friends while she was there🐶❤️We will definitely be using them again!!😊

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words! Lucy is such a sweetheart! We can’t wait to have her visit us again!! ❤️🐶❤️

name: Lindsey Dilworth
text: Our greyhound stayed at Abigail's when our family went out of town. They provided updates on how our fur baby was while we were away. They provided lots of love while she stayed. She enjoyed her stay and looks forward to staying at Abigail's again. I highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you For the kind words Lindsey! Maya is a sweetheart! ❤️

name: J Calvert
text: Wouldn't trust anyone else with our fur babies.

text: Would not board my dog due to sepration anxiety and she said the way it sounded she already had some dogs there with separation anxiety just lost a possible permanent client becuase every now amd then im gonna be in hanceville and need to have my dog boarded

name: Debby Mason
text: Sophie was so excited to come back a second day, as I pulled into the parking lot, she started clawing at the window to get out of the car.

text: Clean facility. Friendly staff. Took great care of our furry baby!

name: Nancykit Moon
text: I wanted to see how much it would cost to get my dog trim

name: Michelle Alldredge
text: Friendly staff. Did a great job.

name: Sheryl Simpson
text: Max and Doodles love staying at Abigail's Waggin' Tails.

name: Wayne Mckerley
text: Very good

name: Armando Delgado
text:
Where to start? I have not had the best week and yesterday it showed when I arrived to pick up my dogs. Stress and life were on my face, and I was looking forward to seeing my boys. I will not get into the details but let me say this about Petagree Pet Center.
You are not treated as a customer, a client, a number or even just a client.
You are treated as a human being.
Someone that has been through what they themselves may have gone through.
Empathy, respect, encouragement and just good old-fashioned manners. Something severely lacking in our world today.
Needless to say, they gave me a little pick me up on a week I have desperately needed a win. When your grooming center not only does an outstanding job on my King Charles Cavaliers but also restores faith in humanity and helps to get you through the week. You cannot help but continue to go there.
Today I returned there to express my thanks and was welcomed with open arms. They will take care of your animals like they are family.
They do an amazing job grooming.
I have spoken to several people that take their animals there for kenneling and love it. I will not take my boys any place else. In my opinion they are the best grooming facility I have ever had. They are also one of the top places of business in the Huntsville/Madison area, they remember you, treat you kindly and take their time with you if you have any questions.
Professional.
Courteous.
Kind.
On Time.
Loves all animals.
Great people, Great business.

resp.text: We are so happy you and the boys are back in our area. We missed you all so much! No thanks needed for yesterday. We are just happy to help and make sure you all got home safe and sound. If there is anything else we can help with, please let us know!

name: Katie Colon
text: I have been bringing my husky here for nearly three years, from doggy day care to boarding for trips, and baths too! Whenever my dog realizes we’re headed to Petagree, she is always excited! Always walks in excited to see everyone. When I pick her up she’s always in a good mood. Everyone there is so nice, they love their dogs. And I’m always glad to know my dog is taken care of when I leave here there 💛

resp.text: I don’t know what we would do without Kuasa’s energy at PetAgree! She always brings a smile to our face with her dramatics and excitement. We enjoy her every day! She is certainly one of a kind.

name: Shelley Whiddon
text: This was my babies first visit. She was very nervous and shaking when we arrived. However the ladies at the desk was super friendly and so helpful. Not sure who groomed my little girl Molly but she looks and feels so much better and happy. She wasn’t even shaking when the young lady brought her out to me. We have found our new groomer spot. I will be telling everyone about this awesome place! Thank you for making my baby pretty!

resp.text: It was absolutely our pleasure to take care of Molly. She has a personality that is one of a kind, and we are very happy to be able to overcome her anxieties about a new place and the grooming process. We are excited to see her again!

name: Clint Verge
text: Petagree Pet Center and the entire staff are amazing!  Our two Shih-Tzu’s (Zeke & Zoe) have been going there for nearly four years (since they were puppies). We wholeheartedly trust the staff and know that our babies are loved and pampered during their grooming sessions and boarding stays.  I honestly think that Zeke & Zoe believe that Petagree is their vacation home!

name: Jacqueline James
text: I needed a groomer because we were going on a road trip and my normal groomer has been overly busy.  Petagree employees understood and made room for my furbaby and I so that she would look beautiful for our family reunion.  I was beyond happy with the quality and my furbaby seem equally satisfied.  Great group of folks!

name: Lisa Dahl
text: Petagree was able to fit my 3 dogs in for a short notice boarding. When I picked them up they were in great shape and my pyranees/retriever mix had the best grooming he had ever received. Staff is friendly and professional. Would definitely board with them again!

resp.text:
We enjoyed your fellas very much! We definitely hope to see them again in the future!
P.S. Franklin is absolutely stunning! Very handsome!

name: Briana Mack
text: I’ve been taking my dog here for about 5 years. We love their service. They are so sweet and professional! I wish I could give them 10 stars!!

resp.text: We love that Pixie Mack! She never fails to entertain our staff with every visit. 😃

name: Tracey Greene
text: Can’t say enough great things. This was our  first time to board our 7 month old German shepherd mix.  We had a great experience with scheduling, drop off, and pick up.  Our dog stayed 9 nights.  I could tell when I picked up up that he was well taken care of and played with.

resp.text: Rocky is a wonderful, energetic boy! We enjoyed him in our play yards and watching him have a great time. Thank you for sharing him with us!

name: Monique Dees-Conley
text: My 1st time boarding my pooch with them and I will be back! Everyone was very friendly and genuine. I left feeling confident that my beloved pooch had quality care in both the boarding and the grooming. Thank you, Petagree! My pet agrees! ❤

resp.text: Thank you for sharing Hollis with us! His personality is one of a kind! ❤️

name: Amanda Brodie
text:
I didn’t really know how to articulate the cut I wanted for my dog and some how the tech was able to read through my babbling and know what I meant.

Their prices are great and the place felt warm so I didn’t feel like I was leaving my dog in some cold kennel. All the other dogs there seemed happy and interacted with each other. I’ll definitely bring the brat back there.

resp.text: Haha! This is the most honest review I think I’ve ever read. Thank you for sharing your fur kid with us, and additionally, for the extra laughs in your awesome review!

name: Colleen Fryer
text: I wouldn't trust anybody else to take care of our two dogs. These people are wonderful with animals and you can tell they love their job.

name: Carley D
text:
I messaged through the website inquiring about a future grooming for my maltipoo and explained that he has extreme separation anxiety and will be heavily medicated; therefore, I would be waiting for him during his appointment. I received a message back asking what “waiting for him” meant, which is odd since it’s pretty self explanatory, but I clarified that I would be waiting in the lobby during his appointment. To which I received a very snarky response stating:

“While we admire the love for your pet, our business is not allowing outside public at this time. We have a small lobby area which doesn't supply space for someone to hang around through an entire appointment. We would suggest a mobile groomer to accommodate your specific needs to watch your pet's full process. They are usually really good at accommodating owners who have anxieties towards the grooming and bathing processes.”

As you can read they tried to slight me at the end of their response when I made it very clear that my dog was the one with extreme anxiety and does not do well under duress. VERY UNPROFESSIONAL AND INSENSITIVE TOWARDS POTENTIAL CUSTOMERS. I understand not being able to accommodate special needs dogs which is fine but to further insult a potential customer is absolutely appalling. Also, quite suspicious how adamant they are about not allowing you to watch their grooming process, which to clarify, I had no intention of doing nor did I care to do. The request was again for my special needs dog so if you have a special needs dog, this is not the place for you!

**Update:
The unprofessionalism continues as they said “We are just not in a position for helicopter parents.” Which again, I was inquiring on behalf of my special needs dog. VERY RUDE, UNPROFESSIONAL, STEER CLEAR OF THIS TYPE OF BUSINESS PRACTICE!

resp.text:
I’m sorry we cannot accommodate your needs at this time. As mentioned, there are high risk COVID employees and family members, and we are not allowing public entrance at this time. We understand that you don’t know us, and we won’t hold that against you, but if you did, you’d know not only that we accommodate special needs animals but also special needs people. Any animal that comes thru our doors receives the utmost care and love. As also mentioned in our emails, a mobile groomer would better suit what you are seeking.

We wish you the best in finding your future groomer. Have a blessed day!

***UPDATE: This lady has now threatened us and continues to email us in a private company email.

name: Jacquelyn Dolly
text: They were so nice! They did a great job with my big baby! He is 130 lbs of love and they handled him so well here

resp.text: We enjoyed Meeko so much! Absolutely fell in love with him. Thank you for sharing him with us! We hope to see him back for his next beauty spa day. 🤩

name: Danny Price
text: Petagree takes exceptional care of our 2 dogs.  They go over and above to accommodate special food and always assure all medication schedules are completely understood.  Our girls are always cared for in a 1st class manner.   From baths and grooms to boarding,  I have absolute trust in the level of care the ladies at Petagree provide.

resp.text: We have enjoyed all of your babies over the years, and miss a special girl in particular. Thank you for being so good to us. We appreciate you and your fur babies so much!

name: Katalina-Marie Kruszewski
text:
I brought our German Shepherd and Golden mix for a bath and trim. They were so nice and friendly. The dogs looked beautiful afterwards and were all smiles. I will be bringing them back here and 100% recommend.

Good covid standards where someone comes and gets your pet from your car and brings them out when you come back when there ready. Plus you can pay outside as well.

resp.text: We enjoyed your babies yesterday! Thank you so much for your kind words and rating your experience with us!

name: Nicole Stubblefield
text: Love Petagree! Smooth and easy drop off/pick up. Friendly staff, they took great care of all 5 big dogs I dropped off.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to let us know of your experience! 5 stars to you and your fur babies also!

name: Kay Walton
text: Awesome care, loving environment,  have used for over 15 years, won't go anywhere else

name: Kristin Bradford
text: Love this place, the staff and the service! They were amazing with our dog Ragnar. His undercoat had grown out of control over the summer and they spent two hours brushing him to perfection. He was such a happy puppy when we left. They were so friendly and personable to human and animal alike, DEFINITELY recommend.

resp.text: Thank you! We really enjoyed Ragnar! He's the coolest guy! We are looking forward to seeing you both next time!

name: Patrice McQueen
text:
Aubree has been going to Petagree Pet Center for over two years now. We love the service we recieve there. The staff is friendly, professional and always give the best cuts! Thank you Petagree groomers for always taking such good care of our little Aubree!

Patrice Jones

resp.text: We love her, and enjoy having wonderful people like you in our PetAgree family! Thank you again and again for sharing her with us!

name: Alicia Boyd
text: I have been taking my dogs there for years never been disappointed once. They have always done a great job and can tell they are passionate and take good care of your pets needs. 🙂

resp.text: Thank you, sweet lady! We love your babies. Our prayers go out to your old gal and for you during her last days. We will sure miss her sweet face.

name: Melissa Pollime
text: Best grooming my dog ever had! She is so happy! Thank you! Highly recommend.

resp.text: We enjoyed her so much, and it’s our pleasure and mission to give all fur babies the best experience while in our care. We are looking forward to her next visit!

name: Brenda Hill
text: This small business is an excellent place to groom and board your fur babies. They treat our Maggie with sweet loving care and love.  Cant say enough good things about their customer service and professionalism.

resp.text: We adore Maggie and enjoyed Bogie for the short time we knew him. Thank you for sharing your Maggie with us. She always warms our hearts with her presence and personality.

name: peggy whitt
text: First time.   Petagree did a beautiful job with our nine year Bichon.   Very pleased.

resp.text: We absolutely adore Saban! Thank you for sharing him with us!

name: Brittany Brown
text: The staff was super friendly, it just didn’t look like they groomed our dog at all. Went in for a full groom and came out looking exactly the same even with tear stains still under her eyes. Bathed her and gave her a cut ourselves once we got home. Pretty disappointed, but everyone was nice and friendly.

resp.text: We want to make your experience a good one. Looking at our notes from what was asked of us, it looks like Millie was a neaten up/shape up (no length cut off) with bath and nails done. If you wanted something different, we would be happy to change anything you saw as not satisfactory. If you’d like to do that, please let us know!

name: Heather Whitmore
text: I love Petagree! Everyone there is wonderful and my puppers always come home clean and happy.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing the girls with us! We enjoy them so much! ❤️

name: Fredia Love
text: My dog was well taking care of. The staff was excellent!

name: Mandy Powers
text: My doggie loves going to Petagree Pet Center, for both grooming and boarding.  She is always well taken care of and the staff updates us on how she's doing.  It's makes leaving her that much easier!

resp.text: She is such a sweetheart. Thank you for sharing her and your experience with us!

name: Dana Whittington
text: They are fantastic and were so good with my doodle!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to rate your experience with us! We look forward fo seeing you both next visit!

name: Tammy Chappel
text: We've been taking our dog here to play and to be groomed for many years. We've always been pleased and Pixie loves to go visit.

resp.text: We love Pixie and per pizzazz!

name: Karen Dickson
text: They truly love our pets and I know they will not mistreat them. That’s the most important thing to me.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We are always excited to see your babies. Of course, Sherri and Jack are two of the first babies I met when I (Chris) started here. They will always hold a special place on my heart and mind.

name: ryan ziareke
text: Excellent service and attention to detail.

name: Judith Bell
text: As usual, my Otie looks so handsome when he has visited Petagree. Thank you so much for taking great care of him.

resp.text: Otie is the best, little handsome guy. It’s our pleasure to take care of him. Thank you for sharing him with us!

name: Laura Bannister
text: My Nala loves to come to PetAgree! All we have to say is “Are you ready to go see your friends and get a bath?” And she jumps for joy and runs to the door!

resp.text: Nala is the sweetest. We always enjoy seeing and spending time with her! Thank you for sharing her with us, and welcome back home!

name: Allie Hebert
text: My babies LOVE going here!! The workers here are so personable and love every animal as their own. My two aussies cuts look fantastic every single time. Would highly recommend Petagree.

name: Wila von Oven
text: Our family loves Petagree and our  dog loves going there. They’re always so exited to see him. Wouldn’t board him anywhere else.

resp.text: Buddy is the BEST! Thank you for trusting us and sharing him with us for these past several years. We enjoy him!

name: Karla Reeves
text: They do a super job at a fair price. Recommend.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Jo Ann Jarreau
text: Just wonderful, experienced and nice people!   Jessie loved them also!!

resp.text: He’s such a lady’s man! We enjoyed him as well as meeting you!

name: Brooks Latta
text: Hands down the best place in Huntsville for grooming and boarding.

resp.text: Thank you, Mr Latta! You have some great and sweet babies! We enjoy them! Thank you for sharing them with us.

name: Crystal Rivera
text: First time taking my dog Pepr (Dorkie) here and they did such a wonderful job grooming her. It's been a struggle finding someone who can cut Pepr the way I like (standard Yorkie cut) and they did a fabulous job!  Sarah and Taylor were very friendly and professional. We will be back!

resp.text: She is such a sweet girl! We look forward to seeing you all again at your next upcoming appointment!

name: Allen Butler
text: Our dogs are in good hands while on vacation. Thanks Petagree Pet Center

resp.text: Thank you! We enjoyed them!

name: Hodges Ingram
text: You are so sweet sweet potatoes

name: mark moore
text:
After my longtime groomer fell ill and closed shop I searched for the right place. All the shops and groomers I tried were nice but Petagree is the only one to hit all the marks:
Quality cut
Pet loving
Good hours
Ease of setting appointments
Affordable!! (Important with three pups)
Close to home
So glad to have found you.

resp.text: We absolutely love you guys and your babies! We are so happy to call you part of our PetAgree family!

name: Christina White
text: What an amazing experience! Clean shop, amazing people, wonderful groom, and great pricing on all 5 dogs! My pups left happy and kissing all over the groomer’s face. I will definitely be back! Thank you Petagree for taking such great care of my kids! It means so much that my babies are taken care of at your facility!

name: Tori L
text: They do a wonderful job grooming my too small dogs. All of the staff is friendly and very sweet to them. I feel safe leaving my dogs with them which is a great feeling. Prices are also affordable. I’m so glad I found petagree!

resp.text: Thank you so much! We love what we do, and all the fur kids and people we get to meet! We can’t wait to see you all next visit!

name: Jessica Clark
text: We used to take our Jenny girl to Petsmart (I know, I wasn’t the smartest person). However, they’ve been closed or booked for x amount of time. I wanted to move to a locally owned business and gave Petagree a try. They responded same day to my inquiry and even let me know they had a last minute cancellation and could take her the next business day. Awesome! Dropped my girl off in the morning, they were very proactive about letting me know her pick up time. It was going to be a little late, but they were taking such good care of her in the facility it was no issue at all. When I picked her up, my baby looked like a star! And for a better price than I was paying at Petsmart. I will for sure be using this business for as long as we live in the area. Very caring people, professional, responsive, and I had a happy/gorgeous baby girl! They even hit all of the grooming marks I’m picky about, I am 110% satisfied!

resp.text: We absolutely love and enjoyed Jenny! We are happy to have you all in the PetAgree family! Thank you for being patient with pickup times as we are also trying to play catch up in the biggest grooming season of the year. We can’t wait to see you all next time!

name: April Clark
text: These guys are the nicest. This was my first visit and my three pups look great!I I was so impressed. I will use them from now on!

resp.text: We enjoyed your babies so much! We look forward to seeing you all again soon!

name: Sean Wallis
text: Petagree did a great job with our dog. She was happy when we picked her up and we even noticed a change in her attitude from all the hair they were able to get off of her. She’s going to be a regular every two weeks. Their prices are reasonable for the services performed.

resp.text: We had so much fun with your baby! We can’t wait to see you both next visit!

name: Joseph Libasci
text: Apparently it is against policy to issue refunds of any kind. The first time we weren't satisfied but they were very kind. The second time they didn't even groom her. Just a bath. I called and was told to bring her in once more to correct the issue. Why would I subject my poor girl to a third time? The fact that they refuse to issue any kind of refund speaks volumes. They won't even stand by their own work!

resp.text: We are sorry you aren’t satisfied with our services as we did what was asked of us. We spent 6 hours both visits with Malibu and groomed her to your specifications. We stated if you wanted her shorter, we can do that by simply bringing her back for any corrections you wanted. This was at no charge to you. We were absolutely not told that you didn’t like her first or her second groom until yesterday which was unbeknownst to us as it was stated both times that she “looked wonderful” upon pickup. We are a service business and a dog the size of Malibu is not a quick grooming, bathing, or drying operation. We don’t mind correcting your dog’s grooming needs if you choose to. If “Subjecting her” to a fun and loving environment is not what you want to do, we hope you find what you are looking for in another groom shop. Have a great day.

name: Lauren Taylor
text: As a previous employee at this boarding and grooming facility, I absolutely love them! I worked for them before I moved for college and they are excellent. I have known Desiree (one of the owners) since I was 8 and have always loved her and her upbeat attitude. When I first started working there they had only had the shop for about a year and were working on getting renovations done and having a consistent staff, they have since renovated pretty much the entire building and it looks AMAZING! They treat every fur baby as their own and take amazing care of them. My dog has separation anxiety pretty bad and when we went out of town and she boarded there, Christina (the other owner) facetimed me when they did their night rounds of feeding just so I can see her and she could hear my voice and hopefully would eat that night! They are super caring and will take amazing care of any animal that walks into their door! 10/10 recommend them!

resp.text: We miss you tons, Lauren! It was awesome to see you and Megan’s face! And I only got one “side eye.” I know you know what I mean by this. Haha

name: Mic Green
text: Super nice and did an amazing job w my girls.  Such a good job.....  will be going back

resp.text: Thank you again for sharing your sweet girls with us! We enjoyed them as much as talking with you. :)

name: Laura Vereen
text: They have taken wonderful care of our dog for years. We use them for boarding and grooming. Our dog typically would be very upset after we left him for summer vacation. Once we started leaving him with Petagree, that changed drastically. They really strive to make pets feel as close to home as possible. Highly recommend the grooming services as well.

resp.text: Thank you Vereen family! We always enjoy seeing all of you!

name: Tim Pence
text: Awesome group of girls  the animals are well loved and cared for  a++ in my book

name: Rachel Hall
text: If you want a good deshed/summer undercoat removal, go here! My corgi sheds so much at the beginning of summer that it looks like it is snowing. I asked them to do an undercoat deshed and wow! Just wow!  They are really nice, do a great job, and are really good priced.

resp.text: Thank you so much! She did amazing and we are happy to hear she isn’t snowing in your house anymore. Haha We hope to see you all again soon!

name: Kathryn Witek
text: Always treat my dog with love. I know he is safe when I drop him off.

name: Cody Shumate
text: Owners are super awesome folks 10 out of 10 would reccomend if i could give more thsn 5* 's i would and not hesitate!!!!

resp.text: Thank you, Cody! It was great meeting you!

name: edith de los santos
text: I took my dog with them and she looks absolutely beautiful! I will definitely come back!!!

resp.text: She is super sweet! We are looking forward to seeing you all again soon!

name: Jason Miller
text: Great first time visit!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to rate us! We look forward to seeing you again and for months to come!

name: James Turner
text: Nice respective people I highly recommend taking your pets there

resp.text: Thank you so much! We really appreciate your kind words.

name: Nancy Eason
text: Sandy comes back looking great!

resp.text: Sandy is such a sweetheart. Thank you for sharing her with us!

name: Mary Ellen Hovik
text: They took great care of my beagle. Loved the updates and pictures while I was away. Highly recommended!

resp.text: We enjoyed having Walker, and were choking back tears when you both were reunited with each other. It made us smile to see you both so happy. 🥰

name: Jess Phipps
text: I love this place, absoulety love all the fur babies and love the people. I most definitely recommend them for all your fur babies needs and cares.

resp.text: We love you and enjoy seeing you!

name: Jan LibertyJustice
text:
Great owner. Loves dogs and is very good at bonding with them. She does excellent grooming. More expensive than some but I know I can trust her to be kind and take good care of my dogs so she is worth every penny!! 😊
My dogs are afraid of some grooming places!! 😭

name: Andrea Kellar
text: Petagree are wonderful. They have taken such good care of my elderly Yorkie ever since we moved here (9 years ago). Their prices are very reasonable for grooming, especially for the quality of service. They have always given my dog a custom style. Many groomers I looked at in the past charge extra for custom cuts and others only give clipper cuts. I will never take my dog anywhere else for hair cuts. Importantly, I feel like my dog is safe in their care.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We are thrilled you have enjoyed your Petagree experience! We look forward to seeing you both again soon!

name: durtycurty
text: I accidentally posted that one star review last year. Just saw that now, sorry!!! 👍👍👍

resp.text:
Could you give a little more information as to why you only gave a 1 star review? Please also tell us who you are so we can associate you with your fur kids.

Oh, awesome! Thank you for updating us! We appreciate your review of our business and services. Thank you again!

name: Kaley Gilchrist
text:
Don’t go here!! The people are rude and don’t care about your experience if you have a problem it’s your problem and they don’t make any effort to try and solve it. It was messy and had a weird odor. The costumer service is insane. Save your money and go somewhere with people who care about you. If this is how they treat people imagine how they treat your pets.

First of all who is lexi and why are you accusing an employee of being someone? I had my doodle groomed here and that is just my experience this just goes to show the disrespect that these people have for their costumers.

I guess people never use different names on their google accounts. Exactly for this reason why are you accusing ex customers of dumb things like not having dogs? For the record i have 4 dogs 2 doodles and 2 mutts. Not like it’s any of your business. But it’s not like you know anything about business much less running one. This is the most childish and unprofessional salon i’ve ever encountered . I’m appalled by this.

resp.text:
And Lexi’s mother. Disgruntled ex employee who got fired for stealing and wouldn’t get off her phone long enough to actually work.

Oh yeah? What is your Doodle’s name? We have no doodle under the name “Langdon” nor do we have ANY dog under the name “Langdon.” You are not even a customer nor have you ever had an experience with us because as all of our other reviews show, we are exactly opposite of your statements. Furthermore, you have cats who have never been customers of our shop. Your claims are false. You don’t even have a dog much less a Doodle.

Come on down to the shop and let’s discuss. If you’ve been a customer, I’ll have your file out and we can go from there. I’d be happy to discuss any issues you may have experienced with our shop in a personal and professional manner. Several of your statements prove that you’ve never been to our shop. I encourage you to come on over during business hours. Ask for Chris.

name: snickerpaw G
text: You know it's funny that you want to make up fake reasons as to why you let me go then accuse other people of being me. As I recall and from the message and screenshot I have. The message I received when I was fired was "Good morning. We are going to move onto the next candidate for the position. As a small business, we have to have people who are reliable. Yesterday, Desiree and I were left to maintain the entire shop by ourselves with another groomer. This can’t happen. We have too busy of a shop. If you’d like to reapply again in the future once you’ve become accustomed to work ethics, we would be happy to have you back. You did a good job when you were there but we can’t deal with whether you are coming, when you are coming, and whether you’ll stay when you get to work." I worked for you for three days and not once did i I recieved a write up for anything and if I did I certainly didn't sign anything so I hope for your sake you didn't forge my signature. I also haven't stolen anything I'm better than that so I'd appreciate it if you would delete your false comments off random people experience. Also btw my mom's name is melinda just an fyi. You really should rethink how you react to things and look over the lies you have told me because I have screenshoted everything. Hope you have a nice day. -Lexi what exactly did I steal I was literally there for less than 3 days unless it was the filth off the wall in your kitchen? I'd delete it if it was me but it's not so I have no control. If you want to continue spreading false information I'll make sure I'll show everyone the threatening messages you sent me from your personal account saying you were going to show up at my house so I suggest you stop acting like a stuck up middle schooler and more like an adult who owns a business. Yet again still curious about what you think I stole 😂? My life would be 100× better if I didn't have false accusations about me and the place I used to work at would have just paid me like they were supposed to and wouldn't have been childish about doing what they have to do by law.

resp.text:
Lexi - Again, for the fourth time now, this is not a conversation for social media. You have tried to bombard our Facebook page publicly and now 3 times on Google. I have you on camera which we have all over our building inside and out. We have video evidence of your theft. We did let you go in a polite manner to avoid situations such as this one. We did not report you to law enforcement and for that, you should be more grateful. If you want these threads deleted, delete your original “reviews.” That choice is yours.

Lexi - You are drawing at straws here. We have the cleanest shop in the area. We have renovated, but you wouldn’t know that because you haven’t been to our shop in nearly a year. We have health standards in which has been approved by the department of health. Again, you are simply trying to take down a business where everyone is family to us, and where we treat every fur baby as our own. Everyone that knows us knows exactly that. You sending your friends, mom, boyfriend, and whomever else is not going to change the fact that we are a wonderful place to work and a wonderful place for fur kids. You could have been a part of it, but you chose to lie and steal. We wish you the best of luck in your life. God bless.

Lexi - It has been a couple of weeks and I have been very transparent about the situation. We have to 1) make sure the checks were not cashed nearly a year ago and 2) put a stop payment on those checks if they were still out there. This takes time when it was so long ago. As I said before, it will be mailed out accordingly. We always pay people. Never ever not paid someone. Furthermore, we have screenshot your page and submitted to Google to remove and ban any email, name, or review associated with this situation. Again, God Bless. I’m not giving anymore energy to this conversation. If you’d like to speak to me like a grown up, feel free to visit the shop during business hours or unblock me from your page. I’d be happy to discuss further in an adult manner.

name: shane Gadomski
text: Love these people!!! So caring and great! Highly recommend

resp.text: You all were a pleasure to meet (especially Jack Jack). I can’t wait to see him again next time, and Molly, such a sweet girl! Excited to see them both again!

name: C Bentley
text: Been taking DUNCAN SIR here for a while now. He still gets excited to see the ladies every time. And they love see him as well. His grooming is always nice. Its love all around from me, Duncan and staff. Keep up the great work.

resp.text: We can’t thank you enough for bringing us Duncan Sir! He is the absolute greatest! We look forward to him every time!

name: Em Ext
text: They watched my cat in 2015 for many weeks and she had a blast! They truly love animals here. Plus the manager will give you a small discount if your pet needs and extended stay. They will specialize/cater to your individual pet (mine was on a diet).

name: Lindsey Thomas
text: Just picked up our dog from boarding here for two days, and he was supposed to get a bath before pickup. We got there two hours before closing on the day of pickup and he had yet to receive his bath?! Also it seems like he has diarrhea now, which he didn’t have prior. I could’ve left quietly until I had to pay a FIVE dollar card fee with zero warning. This left me speechless. We will be finding a new place to board our good boy that won’t hurt him and will follow through on what they are supposed to.

resp.text: Sorry to hear you had a bad experience with our business. We are now under new ownership and would encourage you to give us another opportunity. We did continue our credit card/debit card convenience fee. As a small business, merchant services are not kind to us. However, we do accept cash and checks as an alternative options and without additional fees.

name: Angie Dowdy
text: So sweet and caring.  My little silky terrier had several matted spots I couldn’t get out and they did a wonderful job with his haircut.  Highly recommend them!

name: Robin Ivey
text: Thank you for to everyone for being so kind and helpful to Barkley and me. I have had so many compliments on his haircut. I'm in a doodle group on facebook and everyone told me it was the best grooming they had ever seen!

name: Alicia Lueras
text: Very friendly & family oriented place. Groomers & bathers treat our dogs like their family members! Take your fur babies! Cats included in bathing & grooming.

resp.text: Thank you, Alicia! We have a great team of caring associates. We absolutely love what we do, and the people and pets we are fortunate to meet every day!

name: HazeGames
text: The entire salon smelt HORRIBLE as soon as you walk in all i could smell was cat pee and bad dog oder. It does not seem like a clean establishment at all.

resp.text: Lexi - All you are is a disgruntled ex employee. Anyone that has been on our shop knows this is not the case at all. Please take your drama somewhere else. It’s been over a year of this. One thing you have correct is the part of “games” in your name. Childish games. Remember, you stole from us and refused to do the job you were hired to do. After several attempts and write ups, you refused to change your behavior. This is your own fault as to why you don’t work here anymore. Please go about your business and leave ours out of it.

name: Brandon B
text: Always love taking my husky/lab mix here for grooming. People are great and pretty easy to get in.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We do our best to accommodate as best as we can!

name: Jennifer Justice
text: This place is amazing. Our dog loves it there.

resp.text: We love Ellie Mae!

name: Tamara “Tammy” Potts
text: I met the owner, when she first built the business in the early 1990s. She has groomed every one of my 3 Shih Tzus, over the years. She and her staff truly love the dogs that they groom. I have not had another groomer for my dogs, since I started using her in the 90s.  The owner sold this business to her head groomer (I  think), that had groomed my dogs. She continued with the excellent service and the same groomers that had worked for years for the owner.   If you want  a groomer that does a good job and loves your dog, Petagree is the place to go. I have been going there for almost 40 years and never regretted having Petagree taking care of any of my babies. ❤❤❤❤❤❤

resp.text: Thank you! Always happy to see you and Jojo! Linda says hello also!

name: Amanda Ballard
text:
In Response to the owners reply: My dog is NOT a doodle. It is in fact a dog with very little hair and usually takes very little time to bath and groom but thanks for trying to cover yourself. Also, I was told 9am was the absolute earliest I could drop off and that my dog would be one of the first to be seen for the day and that it would not take longer than about an hour. Hence why I was annoyed and frustrated.

Horrible service. The first time I was there was mediocre. This 2nd attempt was beyond frustrating. I made an appointment June 26th and was told they had zero openings until today, July 13th. I tried to set am exact time and was told to bring her in between 9 and 10. I dropped my dog off at 920. Heard nothing from them by 11am and so I went by to check on her since I had immediate plans and didn't have a ton of time to sit and waste. When I showed up to ask about her at 11, I was told although hadn't even begun her. And all I wanted was a bath and nails to be trimmed. Their excuse they had a bunch of other dogs they were trying to finish. How about taking care of those who make appointments and especially weeks in advance.

resp.text:
Reply to your second response:
Again, we don’t set appointment times at our shop. Drop offs are 7:30am to 9am unless there is a special case discussed during scheduling. We always start on grooming (haircut) dogs first and then move onto bath only dogs thereafter. Usually that means starting on bath only dogs around 10 or 11am at the earliest unless we have a light schedule that day and can promise an earlier time. We have operated in this manner for 27 years. If that wasn’t explained to you thoroughly upon booking, we do apologize for that; however, we do wish you well in finding another place that suits your unreasonable timelines.

name: kathryn witek
text: Just the best!! Great prices and the staff are excellent

resp.text: Thank you! We love Teddy and appreciate you all!

name: SassyButClassy
text: They take good care of my ShiPoo here!!

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We look forward to seeing you next time!

name: Kyle von Oven
text: They care about your pet...Love this place!

resp.text: Thank you, Von Oven family! We love Buddy, and are enjoying him this week!

name: Rhonda Lustig
text: For the last eight years, I have used Petagree for my dogs' (a bichon, a bichon/maltase and a fuzzy little rescue diva) grooming, boarding and day care.  They treat them like their own; they get to know the dogs personalities and cater to each one.  The groomers are wonderful - my dogs look terrific after grooming or a bath.  The original owner was wonderful and the new owners are putting their touch on it with some great new updates.  I highly recommend Petagree.

resp.text: Thank you! It sure makes our day seeing their smiling faces come through the door. They are the absolute best!

name: Shirley Greer
text: Very friendly staff. Carried my dog food to the car! Great customer service. Thanks!!

resp.text: Thank you so much! We are pleased you are happy with your Petagree experience! We look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: David Schwartz
text: My little man loves this place, especially the staff. He goes to day care and boards here often.  Clean and very friendly.

resp.text: Thank you, David! We love you and Pablo!!!

name: Jewels
text: I had my dogs boarded for about 8 days. I spoke with a woman on the phone who said they treat the dogs like family, they let them out a lot to play, use the restroom and treat them the way you would at home. Well I thought that they would be in good hands because the people seemed to genuinely care. Even when I dropped off my pups the establishment was clean and the people seemed extremely nice. However, when I picked them up about a week later it absolutely reeked in the lobby. So much so that my mom got nauseas. We also noticed that the dogs were outside and it was a kind of chilly day. One of my dogs is short haired and she doesn’t do well in the cold. It wasn’t a problem until I noticed she wouldnt stop shivering when I picked her up. I don’t believe that the inside of the dog runs had any heaters attached to them. Also, both dogs smelled absolutely horrid and I noticed that their paws were red and they wouldn’t stop licking them. Once I got home I gave the dogs a bath and observed them through the rest of the day until I could get an appointment for my Veternarian on Monday. When I took them to the vet, both dogs have ear infections and have mange on their feet. I know my dogs were healthy before being boarded and I am really upset that they came back with all these problems. It makes me furious at how they were treated. I paid around $300 for my dogs to be taken care of and not have to take them to the vet after and spend $400 there for someone else’s negligence. Maybe they were understaffed that week or someone dropped the ball but I wouldn’t want anyone else to go through this. I will not be bringing my pups back.

resp.text:
Are you sure you are reviewing the right establishment? We don’t and have never had issues with mange as we check every pet boarding or getting groomed to ensure mange is not an issue. We also have shot records from every customer which are up to date.
As far as the cold weather, while we can’t please every customer when it comes to cold weather, we keep a close eye on time spent outside in extreme conditions. Each pet gets time outside to use the bathroom and burn off energy. Our kennels are heated and cooled. When they are inside, they have the proper comfort. When they are outside, they have supervision.
We would be happy to hear any other complaints you may have if you’d like to call us during business hours; however, I don’t feel you are reviewing the right place of business. In any situation where a pet has gotten muddy, smells, or even if they have stepped in urine or feces while playing in our play areas, we clean them up before going back inside unless the puppy parents request otherwise. We clean constantly (inside and outside) during the day to ensure normal wet dog smells are kept to a minimum. We work very hard to do right by every single fur baby that we see.

text:
Had my Yorkie groomed here for the first time. I asked for the “Yorkie Cut” around her face and for her body to be shaved down to a 5 (they have a nifty numbered chart with a faux fur that you can see and feel for different lengths - it was helpful).

Since we are new, we filled out paperwork and a release form and they took her back.

Her hair looks great, they did an excellent job trimming the fur everywhere (around her bottom, paws and eyes too!) and her coat looks even, shiny, and bright.

The staff was very sweet and made sure to answer any questions I had ahead of time. And I got a text when she was ready for pick up!

One thing to note - don’t let the size of this shop fool you! They’ve got loyal and dedicated repeat customers. Get there earlier for drop-off services. I got there on a Saturday at 9:02 AM and there were already a handful of families waiting!  Would recommend. My puppy was in the same 1 whole piece when we picked her up than when she was dropped off. No nicks, no trauma, no problem!

text: This small grooming business in South Huntsville, Alabama is top notch! The owner is also the head groomer and she is extremely professional while also being very personable and adaptive to customer needs. Caity and her staff of amazing groomers make the grooming experience wonderful for the human and the furry clientele. The smorgasbord of available grooming and care options is also impressive. The results I experienced were absolutely wonderful! My two large dogs looked amazing when Caity completed their grooming. What a well-run small business! For those in South Huntsville, Caity's is in a great location, which is easily accessible. For those in other areas of Huntsville or in Madison, it is worth the drive.

text: We just had or doodle shaved at Caity’s pet grooming. They were So great! We had to put our other dog down the week before, and my kids were very anxious about leaving their dog. They were also so open and understanding when we were trying to figure out a grooming schedule going forward. I highly recommend them! 😊

text: The employees were great, very personable and professional. However the grooming service quality was poor and rushed. I expected a cut and bath - looks like they skipped the bath. Dogs hair was cut uneven and choppy, with dirt still on her face. She almost looked like a rescue dog getting picked up at a shelter. I had to try and fix it when I got home. Cut was over priced, at least based on the results, $50 plus a $10 tip. In their defense I didn’t bring up my dissatisfaction and still left a 20% tip. . It seemed like they were in a hurry (Friday afternoon) and I didn’t want to be that guy.  Bottom line, I would not recommend Caity’s to anyone.  They must take care of their regulars and maybe the next one would be better, but with numerous other options in the area, I would not risk another $60. Now to find a different groomer to fix the problem.

text: During the end stages of my grandmother's battle with cancer she boarded her schnauzer Buddy here. Sadly she passed away while Buddy was boarded and when my grandfather came to pick him up the day of the funeral (a Saturday) the owner refused to take payment. They had been boarding Buddy at Southern Star for 10 years. My grandfather was appreciative but still wanted to pay. He went back the following Monday to try again to pay because he just wanted them to know how important it was to him that someone had taken care of his furry friend during such a difficult time and they would not let him pay. This meant so much to me and my family. The people at Southern Star are amazing and care not only for the pets but the people as well.

resp.text: Your review is truly touching. We love Buddy like one of our own & your grandfather is precious to us (as was your grandmother). This is the least we could do for your family during this difficult time. Your grandparents have been awesome customers for the past 10 years and customers like that are considered family to us, too. Thank you for such a sweet review, we continue to keep your family in our prayers.

resp.text:
Hi. Sorry for the late response, our Google business page is under new management. We take reviews like yours very seriously. Unfortunately, we have no record of any incident with a customer as described in this review. We are also unable to verify your identity from the names of customers in our records. We went through our customer bookings in the time period of your review in order to try to contact you and get more information on this incident.
We take pride in allowing dogs to be themselves at our facility. We have 8 spacious yards where the dogs are allowed time to run, play, and bark as they please! 7 days a week.
We hope it is not too late to talk to you regarding this review.

text: The staff was extremely helpful and understanding with everything.  They helped me clean up the accident my pet had when traveling to the vet and reassured me that for his next visit we could plan ahead to keep him calm for his visit. The facilities were welcoming, clean, and organized. I would definitely recommend Dr. Boudreau and his staff to feline parents. As for charges and the bill everything was on par with what my research had shown for an annual visit, shots, and 6 months of revolution. I also bought some food that cost the same as at Pet Supermarket. Worth the visit and worth your consideration.

name: lawlaur
text: Absolutely love this place! Not only do my babies come here for their regular needs, but they also stay with them when we are on vacation. They take great care of them and the staff is amazing!

name: lisa Berry
text:
I started going to Dr. Boudreau after bad experiences with large veterinary practices in town (yah know that HMO Feeling). I have been a client for the last 2 years and have not regretted the change. Boudreau provides an old time, family doctor experience but for my pets. I am greeted by name as I walk in the door. That’s right, his staff remembers, along with the names of my pets – WOW how refreshing! Dr. Boudreau and his staff are very knowledgeable. I have had a couple of “emergency” issues, he and his staff have always made great effort to be as accommodating as possible.

If you need a break from the big (HMO Style) veterinary practices and are looking for more individualized care, please give Dr. Boudreau and his staff a try… you won’t regret it.

name: Billy McLeod
text: Very friendly and knowledgeable staff. Dr Boudreau is awesome.

name: Elizabeth Friedl
text: By far one of the worst vet experiences. Dr Boudreau not only misdiagnosed my cat, treating her with anti-anxiety meds when he should have been treating her with antibiotics, but he wouldn't return phone calls or listen to my concerns about her health. When he did finally call back 3 days later (!!)  he treated me like I was being dramatic. However, because of his lack of care and negligence we ended up in the ER vet spending $1000 when it would have been a much cheaper fix in his office had he just taken the time to run the appropriate tests.  Even when I called to tell him about the ER visit he never called back, which again only shows how little he cares about the health of his patients. My cat was very sick and in pain the whole time he was ignoring us, and I would never suggest anyone bother with this clinic. Go somewhere that cares, like Rehm. You'll pay more but you'll get legitimate care and your pets will be much safer.
