text: I called to get a quote and the woman who answered was RUDE!! All I was wanting was an estimate for a simple shave for a standard poodle and she acted like I was an idiot for asking. I hung up because I would rather pay more for someone who is a professional and cares about their customers, instead of being talked down to.

resp.text: Destanie, I WAS explaining simply it depends on size, coat, condition, as well as specified instructions. It's not rude to ask you these questions, when you abruptly disconnected the call, I thot HOW RUDE! FYI There are variations in size, condition of all dogs as well as grooming preferences. Prices are according to each situation.Im sorry you are offended, I'm sorry I cudnt answer your question in 1/3 of a nano second and before collecting information for the quote you asked for. You never said for a shave during your question, and then still it matters price wise if you have maintained your poodle or neglected.

name: Ben Brenner
text: Can't say enough good things about Dana. We've had bad experiences with some of the other shops in town where the staff is not well trained and don't seem to care about the animals. Dana clearly has a ton of experience, and you won't find anyone who will treat your dog better.

name: Sarah Miller
text: My Cat was matted under her arms and on her belly and Dana got them out quickly and safely and was absolutely amazing. I've never had to have a cat groomed before but I am so pleased. She even trimmed up her long hair for me and cut her nails. Best of all my cat stayed calm for it all!

name: Erin Little
text: Super friendly and did a great job grooming my mini Schnauzer.

name: Amanda Nelson
text: LOOK-I I read all the reviews before calling in but as a midtowner, I wanted to support this NEW local business that is less than a mile from my home. I started off the conversation by politely telling Dana "I know I am probably totally unreasonable in asking this but I wanted to see what the earliest was that I could get my dogs groomed." She told me that Saturday was her earliest, I said thats okay, I cant make that and she let me know she was going on vacation next week so it wouldnt be for the following week before I could schedule an appointment. I said "Oh no thats okay- I knew it was a last minute thing I was kinda wondering if you had a cancellation or had any downtime today." She SCOFFED at me on the phone and said "TWO NEW DOGS? TODAY?" Now please keep this in mind- I have ALREADY STATED nicely and VERY upbeat that I realized it was last minute and such an inconvenience to expect her to see me today. ALSO KEEP IN MIND that one of my dogs is less than 5 pounds and the other is 15 pounds. BOTH would have just needed shaves. But listen guys, Dogs aside, shaves aside, it was her lack of professionalism that got me. She then goes in to telling me how her bathers have to pick up their kids and she "Cant be in the back and the front at the same time". *insert wowwwww face* I work in the medical industry in customer relations, I understand that sometimes customers may ask for things that are unreasonable and frustrating. But to be a NEW business, PLEASE learn professionalism. PLEASE learn how to kindly say "Oh no! So sorry I hate I cannot work you in today or tomorrow and it stinks this is falling on my vacation time but I truly would LOVE to meet Aubrie and Belle! Is there any way that we could make it happen the following week when I am back? I will be so rested by then and can really give them my full attention! Hey did you mention whether or not you are local? Thanks for calling and supporting my business!" I would have HAPPILY understood. I would have EAGERLY referred all my dog moms to you. How sad that this was the outcome of what could have been-a great relationship. Best of luck in the future-I hope it works out for you.

resp.text:
Lord, you are so correct,  I would love to have met your furrbabies, we are a fantastic facility,  that loves ,cares, and beautifully grooms dogs. Because you are in the medical field and not the pet grooming industry, maybe you dont quite understand the safety factor of not being able to be in two different work areas at one time? Maybe you dont understand time management in my type business? Im so sorry, my level of expertise doesn't suite your convenience or emotional needs. You did call late, I was booked for Friday, as most* people do book days n weeks in advance, because they have an understanding of working their schedule and a grooming schedule together. You did omit the parts of our discussion..where I tried working with your schedule and our hours of operation next week. When I mentioned time for your furrbabies, that is my consideration for them, not knowing their personalities or what shape they may be in.
My time off  next week btw, is my prerogative has nothing to do with rest, I'm entertaining family from out of state.
I'm not new to midtown. ❤
I started working in midtown,1979 until 1988  and was asked for years to return. It has been quite awesome! Loving hundreds of  awesome dogs and their furrmoms n furrdads! The only exception is for those few, under 10ppl, like you, who expect this seasoned pet stylist of over 50 years, my 40th year in Mobile,  To become a magician and master linguist.
I purposely ask the questions I do when clients call me. when you've not been here b4, I purposely schedule dogs a certain way,  and I purposely
Love,care and groom for each pet properly and genuinely. If you choose,  you may come meet us, have a chat and see you really misunderstood me and the professional process. I give Midtowners much more honor and  credit!...for being genuine  loving, Pet adoring non-judgmental people.#KUDOSMIDTOWN!
Blessings to you n yours.🐾❤🐾
Thank the Lord for your education and profession skills. I thank the Lord for mine ❤🙌

name: Catherine Roberts
text: Not sure why or how its possible for the ones to write a review stating Dana was kind and very professional with them and they're dog. Not only do I disagree but I was appalled at how she treated me(the customer) I was on my second visit, first visit she got into an argument with a customer over dog food she was giving her animals and then talked about the poor lady  behind her back once she left. Second visit Dana was very rude to me over the fact it was suppose to rain and she was getting the dogs finished before that happened, but then when I asked her when it was going to rain she lit into me telling me she didn't predict the weather only God knows. And proceeded to follow me outside screaming and crying. I was appalled at her PROFESSIONALISM. I was not about to leave my fur baby in her care with the ATTITUDE she had. So if drama is something you can deal with. Then by all means shes the person to go to!!! But as for me and my fur baby I will not go back!!! Thank you Dana for showing your true colors before I was so invested in you!!!

resp.text:
In sorry for your experience,  sometimes you cant please everybody.  The dog food issue is horrific. causing skin,coat, and medical issues. Sometimes it's difficult for some to understand. As a groomer, I see and experience horrible issues these pets deal with, sometimes changing food is the instant help that changes their lives. There are hundreds of people who never knew, or were never told that , now have healthier pets and are informed  well. When I see constant neglect, sometimes years of it, like raw sores, or
cauliflower ears,  which takes years, and such sever pain, omg, all dietary caused, I become the pets advocate,  it's not rude to help a furrbaby to get relief or suggest medical care! Its truth, and I'm sorry if I shared my frustration with you. You now seem not the person I perceived you to be, caring as well, my bad.

text: The best place in mobile for grooming BY FAR!!! I have been using Dana for almost 10 years now and I would never go anywhere else. Her has scissoring is 2nd to none and my dogs LOVE to go there. Her work is meticulous, and my dogs will smell clean for days, sometimes weeks, after I pick them up!! She groomed Phoebe for almost 8 years before she passed away. And when I was ready to get a new dog she actually GAVE me a little schnauzer she had rescued from a bad situation. I also like that she doesn't have tons of employees and is a smaller operation so I know 1, that my dog isn't just another number in the shop, and 2 I know exactly who is going to be washing, drying and grooming my dog. I don't like these big volume shops with high employee turn over rates because you don't know who is back there washing and drying your dog, at Dana's it's been Jessica, for many years, in the back washing and drying and Dana up front grooming, and I like that. If you are looking for the best groomer in town give her a call - but call early! She books up quickly!

resp.text: I just finished reading several complaints by groomers on a fb page about how cuts, nicks,  or brush burning occurs due to the lack of owners handling teaching and helping train their pets for maintenance and healthy keeping .sometimes it's a total nightmare :(  Pets can be nervous, jumpy, scared and even ridiculously unsafe to groom, I assure you we are kind and as careful as possible,  I'm am sorry for any accident that may have occurred. I also assure you and anyone else, its awful to not be perfect...or have anything happen but greatness, it's our goal to always do our best, to have our clients happy and beautiful, for it to be a good experience .

resp.text: Pets behavior is the owners responsibility,  when I am violated yes I'm human, I was not happy  ..since when is it your opinion a groomer is to get bit or injured and its ok..fui..its not ok.🤔

name: Bill Sutley
text: My first experience was ok but I was told that our dog was disrespectful and indicated it was our fault. The grooming part was ok. I will acknowledge that my dog is hard to manage and I told them this at the first meeting. I've taken her there four times now and each grooming session cost more than the last without any explanation  so this last time I asked why. I was told that my dog was too hard to handle and she was tired of customers abusing her and her employees by bringing dogs such as mine to her. She followed up by telling me not to bring my dog back and so I won't. The quality of grooming deteriorated with the last two grooming being horribly gapped and uneven all over. Maybe this was due to my dog being uncooperative but I feel a professional groomer should be able to deal better with the situation (not just continue doing a poor job and raising the cost without explanation).

resp.text: Poorly maintained dogs, like your Doodle,  causes poor behavior. My job as a groomer is to groom your dog, not deal with biting pulling tugging  or any issues caused by the owner not handling n maintaining your own pet. Your dog is beautiful,  as you said had issues to start with, I'm apologizing for not having the capability of dodging his biting, brushing our painful tight matting, or expecting your dog to stand with grace  after such behavior. All this is Not part of my job description..hope you have a more capable groomer for your dog.

text: I have been using Angela for the past 5 years to groom my two Havanese.  She and her staff are amazing groomers.  I have had dogs that needed grooming since I had my first poodle at age 12 -- I am now 69.  Angela is the best I have every used.  I have never had to tell her what I wanted.   She has an innate ability to see what looks best on the dog.  I have received countless compliments on our two Havanese.  Once person drives from Tuscaloosa after seeing my dogs, to get her dogs groomed.  I book her a year in advance so that I know I will get an appointment.

name: gloria lyons
text:
I cannot say enough about Happy Hound Pet Spa and the owner, Angela. I offer this praise because she went above & beyond to help me with a problem I was having.

I have been taking our 2 Shih Tzus to Happy Hound Pet Spa to be groomed.

However, recently, for the first time in her 4 year life, one of my doggies began scratching & biting herself all the time. In one night, it got so bad until she created an irritation &  hot spot that was raw. I had decided I would be forced to take her to the vet against my better judgment (because I knew they would give her a steroid shot which has dangerous long term side effects.)

Upon my routine visit, Angela & I discussed type of food she was eating, possible vitamin deficiencies which may be causing it, etc. & essential oils for treatment. Her knowledge & advice was right on target. I made some changes and she has completely recovered from her itching & hot spots within a few days. And no more scratching. Amazing, indeed!

By Angela sharing her knowledge & experience, it helped me to figure out a natural way to heal my dog without dangerous meds.

Not only is she the best groomer she really cares about the pets she services. Thanks!

text: You won’t find anyone that is any nicer and more compassionate about their service and pleasing their clients. They treat you with utmost respect and make sure you know they appreciate your business with them. I wouldn’t even consider doing business with any other groomer.

name: Ceandra “Cece” Hill
text: My dog haircut was ok looking. The lady that groomed my schnauzer did admit she nicked his ear. Got home to find out that his left eye was red in the corner. Wont be going back. I recommend bath barks and bubbles. Did not have this problem and groomers are top notch.

resp.text: Ms. Hill - Thank you for the feedback. Again, we are very sorry this happened during Chopper’s visit to Lucky Dog back in January. It is never a good day when a pup goes home with a boo boo. We strive to be as gentle and safe with the pets in our care as we can, but unfortunately, sometimes these things do happen and it breaks our hearts. You did fail to mention, though, that your Schnauzer is a puppy, was in for his first ever haircut and had barely been handled prior coming here. This, of course, does not excuse the incident, but it does give context to the situation. Schnauzers get a very short blade on their heads and Chopper was in the process of having his head shaved when he jerked in reaction to a sound in the salon causing his groomer to lightly graze the edge of the top of his ear. Our Salon Manager handled Chopper’s service and her incident rate was zero for the last year until this happened for which she was upfront and honest with you about and you told us you understood and even re-booked your next appointment. It was an incredibly minor nick as her reflexes are quick and it did not bleed. Again, we are very sorry that this happened to Chopper. We take things like this very seriously as it hurts us to see it happen, too. No groomer ever wants to accidentally injure a dog while in their care, but again, unfortunately, it is a trade risk when working with wiggly animals, especially puppies, and surgically sharpened equipment. Again, we deeply apologize and hope that you’ll reconsider letting us take care of Chopper in the future. Additionally, I urge you to compare our reviews to those of the salon you recommended. You’ll find they too have incidents happen and yours is our first complaint since we’ve been open. Thanks again for your feedback. ❤️

name: Avery Rhodes Akins
text: Lucky Dog is the BEST.  Not only do they go above and beyond with their grooming techniques but also truly care about and love our dogs!  Our dog Honey LOVES to go to Lucky Dog.  This past spring, we lost our older dog, Teddy, to a genetic disease that caused him to lose his ability to walk.  We will never forget the compassion shown by the Lucky Dog staff to help us get him bathed despite his lack of mobility and huge size, not to mention their sympathy for us after his death.  Thanks Alyssa, Magan, and Teddy’s favorite caretaker, Roxanne, for being excellent, kind, professional, and full of integrity.

name: Amanda Rutoskey
text: I have been using Lucky Dog since they opened in Mt. Laurel and I can honestly say these people are family!!! They love our animals as if they were their own and will go over and beyond for them. When I lost my best friend they mourned right along with me as if Lexi was one of theirs. You can not find better people and/or groomers in the Birmingham area!

resp.text: Amanda - Thank you so much for your kind words! You guys mean so much to us! ❤️❤️❤️

name: Heather Rushing
text: Magan and Alyssa have been taking care of my fur babies since 2013!  They do an excellent job every time and I couldn’t be happier!  I have recommended multiple people to Lucky Dog so they and their pets can enjoy the same level of service that I always do!

name: Kathy Scott
text: Alyssa and Magan are the best! I have a standard poodle and she is beautifully groomed. They are wonderful to work with. Highly recommend!

name: David Short
text: Best experience ever!!! My dogs love these ladies!!! I especially love the reserved spot so we can get in and out quickly with our older dog. 10 stars!!!

name: Macey Dunn
text: Great place to trust your beloved furbabies with. You will not find a better staff who cares as much as them. I enjoy giving them my business.

name: Kate Cox
text: The owners of this business are some of the most genuine, kind, and compassionate people around. If you are looking for a place to bring your pet, you can leave your loved ones here with peace and confidence that they are being well loved and well taken care of.

name: Mel McCoy
text: The girls at Lucky Dog love our Loui. Ever two weeks he goes for a spa day and loves it and I am so thankful that the girls love him. He always come out happy, super clean and looking spiffy.

name: Jessica Spencer-Henderson
text: The staff at Lucky Dog is not only professional, but they have a genuine love for our fur babies and treat them as gently and with as much care as they would treat their own.  Highly recommended and much appreciated!!

name: Brittany C.
text: These groomers and their staff do wonderful work and truly care about their clients! I would give them more stars if I could!

name: Katy Bush
text: Outstanding staff, caring owners. They love what they do and they are the best in their business.

name: Zach Carmichael
text: One of the best if not the best grooming salons in Birmingham. Magan and Alyssa are the best!

name: kelley marchant
text: Great people, wonderful groomers ! I have been using Lucky Dog since it opened and even my dogs love them !!

name: Lindsay Shippey
text: Fantastic owners that will treat you right and do a great job!

name: Regina Vaughan
text: Love Lucky Dog and how they treat our fur babies like family! Wonderful business, great work, and exceptional customer service!!!

name: Cindy Gibbs
text: Very friendly staff and they go out of their way to make your experience AMAZING!!

name: Kevin Gardner
text: What an amazingly awesome groomer! We've been seeing Alissa from Lucky Dog since her days at PetSmart for our dog grooming needs. All of their staff have the magic touch with canines. We drop them off on the morning and pick them up nice and groomed in the afternoon after work. Such a convenient experience! Their pricing is very reasonable for the skill level. Highly recommended!

name: John
text: Love this place! The owners are fantastic! Would highly recommend!!

name: Patti Mixon
text: Not only do the owners run a well respected business, they are good people!

name: Stefanie Whitworth
text: Best groomers ever !! Love these ladies they take great care of our pups and make them gorgeous! Gizmo always perks up after going and getting all handsome.

name: Panagiotis
text: Literally the best groomers we've ever used!!! We recently moved out of AL and miss the experience and staff so much.  Our dog Miss Pickles hates grooming, is squirmy and a definite tough cut, she loved going to Lucky Dog because of the great girls who work there and the care they gave...never had a bad cut, Pickles always left smelling and looking great. A true Bama Gem.

resp.text: Aww, Mr. Peter! Thank you so much for the kind words! We really miss you guys! Give us a call if you're ever back in town! We would love to see Miss Pickles! <3

name: Ashley chesser
text: Magan and Alyssa are both one of a kind. They have a beautiful boutique that contains hand made leashes, toys and especially DOG TREATS! Thats right I said home made dog treats, who even does that any more. Who out there takes there personal time to better cater to our loving doggies! These two do for sure!! They also have an outstanding Dog Grooming salon. Where they work specifically to meet our sweet fur babies needs. You tell them what you want and that is exactly what they give you. They will also educate you in any better care your sweet baby might need at home after your amazing groom. And the prices, you cant find a better quality Groom for the price they offer. They are all around fantastic even offering you different packages to fit your every need! When I took my sweet fur baby Cooper to them.First thing they ask is what would you like to be done to Mr. Cooper. Not just snatching him up and taking him to the back to do whatever, they take there time with you and find out what you would like and then they meet every need! I would and have recommended them to EVERYONE so here is your chance! Choose Lucky Dog Grooming and Boutique for all of you fur babies needs!

resp.text: Ashley! Thank you so much for your kind words! It's clients like you that make our jobs so enjoyable! See you soon!

name: Amanda W
text: Wonderful salon with caring and attentive staff!

name: Cathie Bella
text: Excellent customer service! Best pet salon in the area

name: Magnolia Hall
text: quite literally the best in birmingham

name: Ken Ledbetter
text: Great groomers.

resp.text: Mr. Ledbetter, thank you for your review. We always appreciate feedback from our clients! Please let us know what we can do to get your rating up to five stars! -Magan

name: Krystle Gallegos
text: Wonderful place and kind staff!

name: Emily Stewart
text: Amazing owners and staff!

name: Jessica Costes
text: Best groomers around!

name: JENNIFER WOOD
text: Love the staff and location.  Our dog Sophie always comes back looking great!

name: Diane Derry
text: Awsome

name: Feyna Advani
text: Kind staff.

name: Amanda McGough
text: We trust Dr. Johnston and his staff with all of our fur babies and are so thankful to have them close to home. Dr. Johnston goes beyond most and takes the time to explain and educate clients. He is fair and just in his pricing and does not perform unnecessary tests/procedures. Dr. Johnston is a caring human being who will treat your pets as if they were his own. I strongly admire his love and passion for animals and am very happy we chose his hospital. You will be too.

name: Kat Paay
text: Absolutely wonderful vet. All of my dogs go here and will for the rest of my life. Doc is absolutely wonderful and treats the animals with the compassion and respect that they deserve. He is a no nonsense kind of guy that will tell you like it is and get your fur babies feeling better in no time

name: Curtis Bush
text: Very caring and knowledgable!  Had my Katybug up and going in no time.

name: Cody Burgamy
text: I very highly recommended that you DO NOT use Pike Animal Hospital. This disrespectful vet had our Lab, who had been our family pet for 12 years, for the entire day. Somehow between keeping our dog for 8 hours, charging us 400$ just for bloodwork and X-rays, he failed to notice the 5 pound tumor on our dogs spleen. The tumor caused our dogs spleen to rupture in which we took to another vet in town, who was amazing and their entire staff treated us with the upmost respect and professionalism. They had to do emergency surgery for which our pup didn’t make it. Aside from overcharging us, and missing the key diagnoses for the situation, he was extremely disrespectful and unprofessional to my wife and I. His passive aggressive, sarcastic remarks all of which regarding money, were almost overwhelming. Not to mention that he didn’t even send any meds home with us to help my dog. Neither myself nor anyone I know in our community will be using this vet ever again. He really needs to do some self reflection and learn how to be respectful and professional all the way around.

resp.text:
Mr. Burgamy,
We were perplexed by your scathing review because as you left our office on Monday, Nov. 30th you thanked us repeatedly for all we had done and assured Dr. Johnston and the rest of the staff that Cooper would be returning the next day for the free treatment that had been offered. We were even more surprised by the hostile text from your father that was sent to Dr. Johnston after hours. Thankfully, your father was willing to answer our phone calls and understood our position. It has come to my attention that you may have heard a briefing between the vet and staff, which is often much blunter than the conversation between a vet and the client by necessity. Unfortunately, I believe that this misunderstanding may be the source of this perplexing review. Our staff would never speak to a client in the same manner as they do to each other as we understand that clients do not handle these situations on a regular basis. All conversation that has taken place between you and the staff at Pike Animal has been compassionate and courteous up to this point.
I would like to assure you that our staff does not bring up money unless asked to do so by the client. We did everything in our power to help you and Cooper. I would like to remind you that we did not only offer ICU care for Cooper, which was declined, we also offered 7 days of free out-patient treatment which was also declined. We highly doubt that your other vet offered any free treatment for Cooper.
In veterinary medicine, there are many variables. Cooper presented as a 12-year-old Lab who could not walk; therefore, we were searching for hip dysplasia. Dr. Johnston informed you gently that as we ran more tests more health issues would be found due to Cooper’s age and pre-existing health conditions. Once initial diagnostic testing had been run, Dr. Johnston did inform you that Cooper’s prognosis for recovery was poor. Pike Animal Hospital and Dr. Johnston do not make these calls lightly and run every diagnostic test necessary before coming to this kind of conclusion.
Our heart goes out to you for the loss of your beloved pet. It is unfortunate that you cannot find it in your heart to see things clearly at this time and have chosen to accuse Pike Animal Hospital of any form of neglect or misdiagnoses when so much was offered to you in kindness. We have attempted to reach out and extend our condolences as well as hear your feedback and try to put to rest any miscommunications, however, we have been met with no response. It is regrettable that you misunderstand the situation and this review is all the more disappointing. Each case presented to us is different and as such we must customize treatment accordingly, which we attempted to do for Cooper and would have been able to do better had he returned for further treatment. Please bear in mind that Pike Animal Hospital did everything we could for Cooper. Cooper was a fine dog who the staff here at Pike Animal Hospital, especially Dr. Johnston, grew to love in his short time here. We would like to offer our condolences and hope that you will be grateful for the love and memories Cooper bestowed instead of looking for someone to blame for his loss.

name: Fat Antobelly
text: Best vet I have ever met. He is honest, passionate, and excellent at his craft. Very straightforward and won’t BS you. I know he and the staff are going to put the health of the animal above everything else. Much thanks to all of the staff at Pike Animal Hospital. Only place I’ll ever take my pets.

name: Brandon Grantham
text: I have been Amazed by Dr. Johnston. I’ve never had a vet like Dr. Johnston. He is the most caring Vet that I know and you can see that whenever you talk to him. He loves the animals and treats them as his own. The staff is the best staff I have ever encountered every time I’ve ever needed something they answer my call and are the most polite and kind. They will adjust to your wants whenever you ASK. My last pet to bring them was my female cat who was urinating blood. From the first minute on, Dr. Johnston was completely honest and upfront about her diagnosis. He tried the least invasive treatment first Antibiotics. Which we did for about a month. Me and my Fiancé  thought they worked at different points and eventually we had to have surgery. In 30 YEARS of being a vet he has never done surgery on a female cat with kidney stones. Before her surgery he did not know what she had and told us that it could be a tumor or kidney stone we just didn’t know but he narrowed it down to the 2. Dr. Johnston was truly over the top in his care of our baby who’s surgery was a great Success!!! Removal of 2 Kidney stones.  He treats your baby as his own by not doing extra procedures like sending off blood for testing because he knows treatment is expensive. If needed he will do whatever is necessary because he treats them as his own!!

name: Jonah Magnus Hate Account
text: Absolutely phenomenal. Was an emergency visit. My dog was hit by a car and the Dr and staff were awesome with him. Very professional and caring st the same time. Will recommend to anyone I see. Will also be changing vets for my other dogs.

name: Joshua Whitson
text: They treated our little puppy like their own.  Took him there for parvo.  They saved the little guy.  Now if we have to board him we go there.  The puppy gets excited if you mention the vet or the names of the people that work there.  Highly recommended

name: Laura Dove
text:
Dr. Johnston and his team are absolutely wonderful. They have been caring for my dogs for the last six years and we board our dogs with them when we go out of town. Everyone there genuinely loves the animals they see. They are also very accessible in emergencies. I have had to reach out to Dr. Johnston on a Sunday before, and he returned my call within an hour.

One of my dogs became ill, and Dr. Johnston did everything he could, but we sadly ended up having to make the decision to put him to sleep last year. It was a horrible thing to go through, but because we had been working with Dr. Johnston, I at least had the confidence that it was the right decision. When it was time, the support I got from everyone there was unbelievable. It was comforting to be surrounded by people who truly knew and loved my dog.

name: Hannah Styron
text: I honestly could not say enough great things about the staff at Pike Animal Hospital! From the moment we walked through the door they were so friendly. Our sweet baby had to unexpectedly stay the weekend with them. Every time I called they ensured me that I wasn't bothering them and gave her the best care while she was there. Even after bringing her home they were so friendly when I called with questions. I would so highly recommend them.

name: Andrew “Foster” Reeves
text: Great vet! They have always treated my dog like she was one of their pets.

name: Audra Weaver
text: I used to work here, but even before and after, I still take my pets here. Dr. Johnston loves his animals, his staff, and what they do. He will do everything he can to help you and your furry friends. No large animal practice. Emergency services. Boarding services with great kennels and yards.

name: Laura Thompson
text: The nicest & most honest people. They actually care about you & your precious babies! Always been so hopefully! Thank you for caring about ME!

name: Jordan Sutton
text: Absolutely love Dr. Johnson! Has such a heart for animals. I've been bringing my fur baby here and he's always so sympathetic and compassionate towards even the smallest problem we've had. Tells you just how it is and is very eager to work with you. Staff loves the animals and I've always felt very comfortable leaving my cat over night because I know they go in and check on her and take care of her and even update me on her conditions. Very reasonable prices! Best place in troy to go!

name: Stephanie Caldwell
text: Our dog got attacked and Dr. Johnston and his staff were absolutely wonderful with him. After weeks of stitches,surgery,and being in doggy ICU, We finally got to bring Stinky home!!

name: tori mcquagge
text: Best vet around! Our dog ripped her stitches tonight and we met Dr. Johnston within 30 minutes he made sure she was all good! Definitely recommend him!!!!

name: Jason Sulliman
text:
I am not sure what was more frustrating. It might be that time our cat was attacked by a dog so we called their emergency line and never received a call back (we found another animal hospital- unfortunately our cat did not survive).

Then again, it might be the reminder we got in the mail 6 months later about his vaccinations. But when I think about it, I think the most frustrating part was speaking to their employee about the incident. They were very sorry about mailing the reminder. Completely missed the point...

I'm sure they are fine for basic services etc. and many people seem to be happy with them. But for me, the time I really needed them they were not helpful and it was completely mishandled. I get that our pet's death is not their fault per say, but I will never take my animals to them again.

name: Robyn E
text:
Unfortunately, I lost 2 pets in their care. I lost a Toy Poodle that I was told had pyometra and needed to be spayed immediately. I took her in and she was extremely sick. I went to visit her, and they had her in the boarding runs, surrounded by barking dogs. I asked for her to be moved to a more quiet place, so they moved her to the cat room. A couple of days later, I came to visit her again, and they had her in a "parvo" kennel that was being used for storage. She died shortly after that visit.

A couple of years later, I brought a Heeler in because she was throwing up. Same scenario--pyometra. They spayed her and her health continued to decline. After a few days, she was stable enough to come home. When my husband got there to pick her up, Dr Johnston said she "crashed" when he took her IV out. A couple of days later, the doctor recommended that we euthanize her.

I came in to pay my $1200 bill and pick up my dog's ashes,  and the doctor didn't even bother to talk to me. The young man at the desk apologized and hugged me. Then he handed me a stained pillowcase with a plastic bag full of ashes. I couldn't even get a list of procedures that they did on my Heeler.

It has taken me a long time to be able to write this review. Look around the clinic when you go in. There are used needles laying on counters and the place needs to be deep cleaned. The exam rooms are full of junk, so he uses the exam table in the middle, where the public has no business going.

I've been to a lot of vet clinics, and have worked at a couple. This one is sad.  Yes, Dr Johnston is nice, but that only goes so far.

resp.text:
Hi Robyn, first I would like to say we are so sorry for your loss. Since you have chosen to remain anonymous and this event occurred years ago, I have little recollection of the specific details. I do, however, remember you said you previously worked in vet clinics before. You were shown that my equipment is constantly upgraded and all approved treatment protocols were followed. You must still be grieving to write a scathing one star review so long after the event occurred. My heart goes out to you. I would have met you at the door with your ashes had I known you were here.
I am also very sorry that you did not have your dogs spayed. That would have prevented the deadly pyometra, not the lack of a "deep cleaning" which all but brand new clinics require. To ensure transparency, we do encourage clients to watch us work on their pets in our treatment area. All treatment areas have surgical instruments and needles in them. If a client does not care to watch, they always have the option to wait in the lobby. Since the time of your visit we have an entire new staff. I have shown them your review in an effort to reemphasize the importance of client communication, compassion, cleanliness, and grief management. Sometimes during upgrades to our facility, we regrettably must utilizes all the storage space including the exam room and isolation ward. Sounds like you caught us at a very busy time and we made some mistakes in those areas, but unfortunately those things could not have prevented the tragic outcome. All animals I see get the best care I can provide. Tragically, they do not all survive and I have as much trouble accepting that as you  do.
I have been practicing for 30 years now. Losing a patient gets hard every year. Online reviews are new to me. I take them all personally and would much rather speak in person. I am very accepting and open to constructive criticism.  As you can tell by the vast majority of my reviews, that my cherished clients are pleased. I know it is impossible to please everyone and save every pet, but I do try my hardest. It breaks my heart to know how you must feel to write this review after a loss so long ago. Again, I am sincerely sorry you are still grieving and I am hurting too.
My very best regards.

name: Matt Ezell
text:
My wife and I have been bringing our dogs here for years.  When we lived in Troy, we wrestled for years trying to find a vet we were truly comfortable with...  After being recommended here by friends, we have never looked again.  The people here not only do this for a 'job', but they do this because it is important to them and because they truly care for our animals...

Since, we have moved nearly 3 hours away from Troy, but still often drive our dogs back down for their shots and checkups when we can just because we love the care and value of the Pike Animal Hospital.

name: Theresa Frakes
text: Dr. Johnston is dedicated to his patients and treats each animal as if it were his own!

name: Jeff H (Tandom)
text: Just started taking my dog here after trying out a few of the other places. Johnson is a good vet who tells you like it is. He takes care your dog like one of his.

name: Amy Copeland
text: Wonderful place for your pets. Excellent care and compassion.

name: Vickie Roberts
text: Wonderful clinic to work with.

name: Ronda M
text: I have to give them a 5 star.  A friends baby boy Louie became very ill, due to being bit.  They weren't sure at first what had bitten him.  He didn't get any better with the treatment he was receiving so, they started an antivenom thinking that maybe he was bitten by a baby snake.  He has started to improve, but has a long road to recover.  Robin is extremely grateful for all that they are doing for Louie....  Thank you for all your care.

name: Rebecca Walters
text: The employees and doc says very friendly

name: Latasha Smith
text: Lost my dear Della but the vet and his staff was very compassionate towards my family thank you so much

name: Angel Tillery
text: Biggest, bestest heart! Such caring staff.

name: kevin heil
text:
I'm a truck driver who takes my dog everywhere i go.
Dr Johnson is a very good at what he does and will take care of your pet without unnecessary and expensive treatments.
I really thought the week of April 1st my dog got very sick on the road she wasn't looking good i thought i was going to lose her when we arrived back home.
She was treated and found out just bad allergies.
I can't thank him enough for what they do there at Pike Animal Hospital i have been there for as long as i can remember.
Agian THANK YOU ALL for all you did for my baby she is trucking again and healthy as a 10 year trucker can be.

name: Cathy Engwall
text: Great place, everyone is wonderful and will answer any questions that you might have !

name: tr3b0r85
text: They know me and my pets. If I bump into them away from the office they still inquire about how they are.

name: April Mooney
text: I will not ever take my animal to this vet ever again.  My regerstered service dog had been possessed and about dead.  We sat in their office for an hour and he had a accident in the waiting room they told us to get that thing outside and for us to find another vet.  Far worning people u may wanna find another vet to go to instead of this one. If you go to this one your little one may die.

name: Alice Jones
text: There great

name: Robin palisades
text: Saved my dogs life....

name: Carl Norman
text: Fantastic place for daycare and boarding! My Great Dane was clearly treated well during his week-long stay and seems to really enjoy his daycare play time. Very clean. Very professional. Highly recommend!!

name: Caitlin Warburton
text: I can’t express how grateful I am for Port City Pups. It was our first visit, and we kept our dogs there for almost a month. From Day 1, Archie and Brodie were treated like family. They went above and beyond to ensure their comfort, including sitting with them while they ate and walking my older dog to get him some exercise. They even took Christmas pictures! They clearly love animals and it shows in their work. On top of the amazing care, they’re family owned, military friendly, and affordable. What more could you ask for?!

name: Tara Wells
text: I was so grateful that Port City Pups was able to accomodate me as I was traveling with my greyhound and needed help with day care while I was visiting the city. They made it so simple and smooth to get her in for some play time and much needed time outside of the car. The service was impeccable from my phone calls to make sure they could take her until the time I picked her up. I couldn't be happier with the service.

resp.text: Tara, thank you so much for this review! We really enjoyed Taz and can't wait to have y'all back!

name: Drama Moye
text: Love love love everyone here! It’s a family owned business and they put their whole heart into it and caring for our pups! I recommend Port City Pups to all of my friends now😊

resp.text: This is so sweet! Thank you. We love having Nala and will always fill up the swimming pool for her! :)

name: jonesb25
text: Just a wonderful establishment. They seem to know all the dogs personally no matter how often the dogs are there. The staff is incredibly friendly and helpful. If I could give more stars, I would.

resp.text: Thank you so much for this kind review!! This made us all smile. :)

name: russ copeland
text: Port City Pups is awesome!! Bailey and the rest of the staff truly love the dogs and it shows.  Ollie jumps out of the car when I pull into the parking lot!

name: Hilary Harless
text: I boarded my dog for the weekend, and let me just say, I have never felt more at ease boarding my dog. The staff's communication is superb. The facility is clean and organized. They didn't seem overrun with dogs. They remembered exactly who I was when I picked up my dog after meeting me only once. They have a no aggression tolerance. Usually, I worry the whole weekend wondering if my dog is getting let out and if she able to socialize safely, but this was further than the case. Do not hesitate taking your pup here!

resp.text: Thanks, Hilary. This makes me so happy! We strive to make the boarding process as stress-free as possible, and dogs like Luna make that so much easier. She's awesome and we can't wait to have y'all back!

name: Toni Duplantis
text:
Wow, just wow!! Bailey and her family are incredible!!
I have the MOST spoiled, demanding chi-weenie and he loves them!! Rudy comes home so happy and calm. Bailey treats him like he is the “boss”.
And he loves it!! We love Port City Pups!!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for this review! Rudy is definitely the boss around here, and we love it that way. Y'all are such sweet clients and we appreciate you very much!

name: Allyson Fulcher
text: We love Port City Pups! Bailey and her staff are incredibly friendly and we trust them completely with our pups. The location is convenient, clean, and we always know our dogs are well cared for while they are there. Our dogs always come home from daycare exhausted from playing all day. Most of the time they are snoring as we pull out of the parking lot. A+++

resp.text: Thanks Allyson!! Birdie and June make our day 10x better as soon as they walk in the door. Y'all rock!!

name: Mick Biggs
text: Great place to take the fur babies.

name: Kat Kennedy
text: The pups had such a good time they didn’t want to leave! Great people who love the dogs. It’s wonderful to know your pets are in great hands when you have to be away!

name: Harrison Pearl
text: Great place to let our dog socialize and get some energy out. The owners are very nice and treat the dogs very well. We always feel comfortable dropping our Airedale off for the day.

name: Erin Hughston
text: The people at Port City Pups are truly animal lovers. I needed to board my dog.  My dog is difficult to work with, but they agreed to take him in anyway. They worked with him and he began to bond with one of the owners! I am so happy! Love Port City Pups and will definitely be back!

name: C Lynn
text: Very clean, convenient to my work, super friendly owners/staff. My dog went here for doggy day care and I was very pleased. We will return.

resp.text: Thank you so much for this kind review! Can't wait to have ya'll back!!

name: ERICA MILLER
text: So excited for Port City Pups to officially open! The owners are so dedicated to caring for animals and I feel so comfortable leaving my puppy with them! Downtown Mobile has been needing a pet boarding and daycare facility for sometime and Port City Pups is the best company to fulfill this need!

name: Rebecca Hindman
text: I am so excited for the Port City Pups opening! This is such an amazing addition that downtown mobile has been lacking for such a long time!! The owner has such a passion for pups of all kind that I can’t imagine trusting anyone more with my fur baby!! Having someone on site 24/7 also gives me a sense of ease that none of the other dog daycares in mobile have been able to provide for me!! The location and prices that Port City Pups are offering are honestly unbelievable! Can’t wait for my baby to be a regular!!

name: Zane Patterson
text: The owner went to South with me, and there is no one that is more patienate about what they do than Bailey. She pours her blood sweet and tears into Port City Pups, and there is nobody that I would rather have provide daycare for my dog.

name: Della Fuller
text: I had to ask repeatedly to see the boarding kennels that my pet was staying in. Every prior visit was under Covid restrictions, and no one was allowed in the building. Finally a tech allowed me to look thru a window. I had to ask for my blanket when picking up one of my pets, and my leftover food was not returned back to me. The charges were ridiculously high.

name: Susan Grace
text: All staff I encountered were so helpful and friendly. This is definitely my boarding choice when I attend the annual AKO reunion in Opelika. I know my sweet dog receives lots of TLC including the turn down service for which I gladly pay a little extra.

name: Fern Compton
text: Very helpful, specially how many times we had to cancel dates because our move dates kept changing. We appreciate your ability to help us. The animals came back happy and healthy. Thank you.

name: Shawna Bell
text: We were referred to Goodwin when we began to look for another  Veterinarian to work with our rescue, The Shire Rescue & Sanctuary, Inc. We are beyond pleased and blessed to have found such an awesome clinic. Dr. Faqua and the staff are amazing. I know that our seniors will be well taken care of here. I highly recommend other rescues to add them to their network of Vet services. You will not be disappointed!

name: Capricia Devoe
text: Our Pekingese is the first dog in our family and let me say Goodwin Animal Hospital and Pet Resort has been heaven sent.. all of my questions that I feel like I should know they reassure me and keep our baby in tip top shape!! My first experience in boarding they sent me pictures and updates daily.. I couldn’t ask for a better vet because they make us feel like family!!

name: Gayle Oden
text: My dog loves the Day Care. The staff is friendly. We also use the vet's there who are very caring and helpful in taking care of my baby.

name: Amy Jones
text: My fur baby loves going to their doggie daycare! They post pictures every day so you can see you dog in action too. He’s always so exhausted on the car ride home and is always excited to go again the next morning. It’s fairly priced and the staff is so nice. I would highly recommend them!

name: Erika Poikey
text: I've recently switched vet offices and now I'm SO HAPPY with my choice! Awesome service, on time, very consistent and explained everything to be very well. Highly recommend!

name: Rett McGowin
text: Dr. Katie, and Ashley, and the receptionist were awesome! Kudos to all!

name: Kristina Stephens
text: The staff is always so friendly and helpful. I travel a hour just to keep my dog with familiar faces who know his issues and take special care of him.

name: Linda Fuqua
text: Great professional staff and a very clean environment !

name: Mike Bradley
text:
Update June 2021. I am still happy with staff however I would definitely compare prices when it comes to over the counter meds.  I could of saved $60.00 by going with Amazon. Dasuquin $33.02 on Amazon,  $94.00 at Goodwin.
I find the staff polite and professional.  The staff truly seems to care about my dog.  I would,  however,  be pleased to see a report on how my dog faired during his boarding.  Did he eat? How did he interact with others?  For the money I spend on boarding a report would be appreciated.  Thank you.

name: Kris Lynch
text:
I can’t even begin to thank this Hospital enough.
We came in as an emergency while traveling for work.
Dr. FIelds met us in the lobby, and immediately made us feel at ease.
From the front desk staff, to the techs, to the Dr, everyone was so so nice !!
After an initial exam and xrays, we received the diagnosis of a torn ACL.
Dr Fields took the time to explain all of our options.
We scheduled her surgery the following Friday 7/5/2019
We drove 5 hours back to this hospital for her surgery !!
We dropped her off, I cried , they reassured me, and we left her in their capable hands .
Stephanie called me immediately following her surgery with an update and we returned the next morning to pick her up.
I’m so completely impressed with this hospital !!!
We will return with the rest of our pack, if the need should arise !!

name: Gayle Cowan
text: Hobo had a wonderful stay. Plenty of love and attention. Thank you! We will be back

name: Dominque Torres
text: Goodwin Animal Hospital and Pet Resort has been our vet family since 2015.  We have always appreciated the sincere kindness and professionalism of the staff, amazing medical care and outstanding facilities.  Most recently my two French Bulldogs were scheduled for grooming and at the last minute I asked if they could get their annual exams completed and stay overnight.  Aliyah was wonderful with arranging our boarding accommodations and scheduling exams and documenting information in their records.  I received two calls from physicians, one after their initial exam and she thoroughly explained everything to me and offered to complete dental cleanings for them.  She was able to get them scheduled and completed as soon as possible.  Additionally, they now offer a turn down service where my babies were provided a walk and cuddles in the middle of the night.  With service like this, I am completely at ease leaving my babies with the Goodwin family.  Thank you so much for the amazing job you did.  I genuinely appreciate it.  Sincerely, Dominque Torres, Mom of Weezy and Lu Lu

name: bill crowder
text: the people that work there make this a great place   we have been so happy with them    our 16 week old lab loves to go there     i would recommend Goodwin Animal to anyone

name: Tori W
text: Originally we took our pup to a different vet bc they also boarded. Recently I took a tour after hearing several positive comments about Goodwin & I was blown away! Zoe did my tour & was fantastic. She answered all my questions & concerns. I immediately booked my dogs next boarding reservation here. They have an indoor salt pool, which is also is solar heated in the winter months! That's right, check out my pics, you can see the doggie hotels from the lobby. They also have separate entrances for dogs & cats. The back play area has astroturf so you don't have to worry about allergies.

name: Tiffany Williams
text: The staff was very helpful and pleasant and assisted me with getting my pup all squared away for his stay!!!

name: Shannah Bonner
text: Always great service! My pet gets the best care at Goodwin, which is why I keep going back.

name: Brittani Franklin
text: Everyone here is so wonderful. Have yet to have a bad experience ❤️

name: Peggy Haveard
text: Our pets had a wonderful stay!! The staff is always caring and professional.

name: Ronnie Poole
text: Very good experience the veterinarian was very professional and answered all of our questions.

name: Karin Hager
text: Our dogs absolutely love going here for boarding and even general vet visits!

name: Leila Cockerel
text: We just recently moved to Alabama and we already love Goodwin Animal Hospital.  Dr Fields is an intelligent and caring Veterinarian.  Also, his team was extremely helpful and friendly.  They took such great care of my dog and while we were there, they were able to get my dog's yearly vaccinations and examination.  Thank you Dr. Fields for being so nice, helpful, and flexible during our first visit.  Highly recommended.

name: Lance Neven
text: I keep asking my dog how it went, but she’s not talking right now.

name: Janice Norman
text: I am always pleased with the care my pet gets. The staff "goes the extra mile" to make my pet feel loved and comfortable. I cannot imagine leaving my pet any other place.

name: Sky G
text:
Absolutely, hands down, the BEST veterinary staff on the planet.

I will drive from 4 states away to keep coming back here.

name: Nina P
text: The whole team is amazing!  Super friendly, warm, and courteous.  They put my mind at ease every time I board my pup there.  Any issues that may arise, they let me know immediately.  Thank you!!

name: Brittany Graves
text: Great service and friendly staff.

name: Dawn McCoy
text: I had an emergency call with my cat late at night. And they still took him in. They are so nice and professional with him. I am glad they were honest when they could not find out what was wrong with him. But Dr. Kallam was so determined to help him she figured out the probably cause. Im following her instructions and he is all ready improving. Definitely bringing my baby's back to her.

name: Chris Bennett
text: Everyone is very friendly and helpful.  Never had a bad experience.

name: Kay Ware
text: Dr. Fuqua is the best veterinarian.  So compassionate. Our dog Banjo has loved her from day 1. Just like M.D’s, not all veterinarians are alike. When you find a great one, stick with them. We love Dr. Fuqua. Wish we could take her with us to Louisiana. I highly recommend her and this clinic.

name: Andrew Moulton
text: Everyone is always so kind and helpful. They treat my animals like they would their own, and genuinely care. I wont go anywhere else.

name: Stephanie Enloe
text: We love Goodwin Pet Resort for boarding our dog. He is always happy to be dropped off and the staff are incredibly sweet to us and to the pup. Our puppy always leaves with a wagging tail, well fed and hydrated, and overall happy! We would highly recommend them for boarding!

name: Jim Sheppard
text:
Had to make an after hours visit to clinic on Saturday for our aging cat, Missy.  Both Dr. Rigsby and the tech Ashley, were personable, helpful and very kind to Missy.  We spent waaay too much money, but felt it worth the cost to get Missy some relief from her ailment.  We have used the Goodwin clinic on Atlanta Highway for several years and have never failed to get excellent, caring service.

Have recommended you to several friends over the years and will continue.

name: Susie Pang
text: My two pups love it there!

name: Lisa Steadman
text: Everyone was amazing from the time we walked in.  This was our first visit as we are new to area.  Dr. Fields was great as well as his assistant (I cannot remember her name).  What an amazing practice!

name: Marie Mcgarry
text: Great place and it's nice and clean, great people/staff and they sure do care about your furr babies did not expect for a follow up call to check on our Little "Tank".  First visit and I'm glad i choose the right place, always check for a google reviews. Highly recommend it to everyone, you won't be disappointed on your first visit, Trust me.

name: bridgette jarry
text:
I really love taking My Maltese Lucky here.
They are really nice and take really good care of my pet.

name: Marina Ford
text: Dr. Jane Snead was awesome in an online consultation (my girl had an abscess, she's all good now). Thank you.

name: Jeffrey Jernigan
text: The vet is the sweetest the technician was great and all around good place to take your fur babies.

name: Dani's Do's and Don'ts
text: Dr. Fields and all the staff are great. They explained EVERYTHING in detail about my puppies surgery. Vanessa was on-call over the weekend. She answered numerous calls from me. Dr. Fields is personable, professional and seemed to genuinely care about for my pet.

resp.text: Dani Thank you for being part of Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort!  We appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts about Dr. Fields & our team.  Thanks for the kind words and the recommendation to other pet owners!

name: Leigh Smith
text:
Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort has become like family to Jenni, Lola, Maggie and myself. They were there for us throughout our loss of Cooper and have taken amazing care of Lola and Maggie. The staff is incredibly friendly and quickly turn into family. They not only ask about your fur babies but also about you. I couldn't imagine going anywhere else.

We love you guys!

name: jst4kxs
text: Goodwin Animal Hospital and Pet Resort is more than a business, it is an extended family.  They make you feel at home and there is never a worry when your pets are left in their care.  As someone who travels often, I find myself with comfort knowing they are always well taken care of.  From the time you walk in the door and greeted by smiling faces to your time in the back with the vet and staff there is never a moment you feel like you are being rushed.  Everybody takes time to explain things and always goes out of there way to take care of any issues no matter how big or small.  Wouldn’t trust anybody else in Montgomery!

resp.text: Every client & patient that comes through our doors is a member of our Goodwin Animal Hospital family!  THANK YOU for the kind words and recommending us to others looking for a new veterinarian in Montgomery.

name: Cassandra Gipson
text: I have been with Goodwin for a little over a year...started with grooming to taking care of my Baby(great grooming service!!!)...They have a an Awesome Staff friendly staff  who recognizes you and your Baby by name the second you walk in. Even when I called as a walk in last-minute appointment, they go out their way to fit me in that same day and No waiting. Fast, Friendly, and trustworthy. They made me feel/and my Baby special as if he was their Baby. Would not trade Goodwin & it's Staff for the World!!  Thank YOU for ALL YOU DO!!/Kudos!!!! PS...oophs forgot...AND the doctors are so knowledgeable and great!..Thank You Too!

resp.text: We appreciate you & your fur baby being part of our family!  Thank you for recommending Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort to other pet owners.  Thanks for sharing your thoughts!

name: Jacob Johnson
text: I brought my dog in for daycare a couple of weeks ago and he was still full of energy and reeked of urine after getting him home that afternoon. Clearly they are not running these dogs hard enough or making them sit in kennels all day long. He was so thirsty when he got home too. Drank the entire bowl of water only to throw it all up a few minutes later. Very disappointed in my experience here and will not be back again.

resp.text: Jacob Our goal at Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort is to exceed client expectations and provide personalized care to each pet.  We apologize the experience was less than exceptional for you. We want to reach out to you but cannot find a client with your name.  Please give our manager a call as we want to discuss this with you.   Often dogs do not eat or drink as much as they do at home because of excitement or nervousness, which may be way he drank more water than normal when he went home.

name: Bet Baldwin
text: The Doctors & staff are amazing!  They are a full service facility from medical care, to boarding, to daycare, to grooming!   They treat your pets like they were your children!  I appreciate all that they do for my dogs & cats & would never take them elsewhere!  The rates fair & reasonable! Thanks for all that you do!

name: Antonia Rodden
text: Y'all are amazing, compassionate, and just all around wonderful people. We feel lucky to have y'all as our Vet/groomers/boarding place.

name: Joe River
text: From the moment we walked through the door we were greeted with a friendly and warm smile. We did not  have to wait for a very long time and to be seen. I was very happy with Goodwin Animal Hospital. I highly recommend them and their services.

name: Patricia Lassmann
text: love Goodwin Pet Resort.

name: Gary Daniel
text: Everyone was great from Vet to Boarding to Grooming!  Highly recommend!

name: Mildred Price
text: The staff at Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort is amazing! They are always attentive and we trust them to take care of our kids everyday with day care. Our three are always so excited in the morning because they can't wait to go! You guys are awesome!

name: Carol Roberts
text: We board our dog here whenever we go out of town. She's a tiny chihuahua mix and we worry about her like she was a child. We always get her a suite as it has the feeling of just being on the back porch with a screened door. She's a picky eater but the pet resort weighs her and monitors her eating throughout the stay to make sure she's ok. They take very good care of her there, and the people who take care of the pets are especially nice.

resp.text: Carol - We appreciate you & your dog being part of our family! Thank you for recommending Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort to other Montgomery pet owners. Thanks for sharing your thoughts!

name: Ralph Hill
text: Excellent experience.  Friendly staff.  Knowledgeable Vets.  We had one concern, but Dr Goodwin completely resolved it.  I will definitely recommend Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort to family and friends.

resp.text: Ralph - We appreciate your feedback. Thank you for recommending Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort to other pet owners. Thanks for sharing your thoughts and for the kind words.

name: Kathryn Jones
text: I can't say enough great things about the wonderful care the staff has provided my dogs over the years.  Everyone there is very warm and friendly.  It 's great to have a place to take your animals where you know they are in good hands.

name: Donald Wyse
text: Highly recommended. Superior service. Have boarded and cared for my dog at this establishment for 2 years as if this writing and I have not a single complaint about it. Wonderful, caring, understanding staff with capable and patient doctors.

resp.text: We appreciate you sharing your thoughts - thank you!

name: Gwendolyn Hill
text: I had to let my Fibi go to sleep due to health issues. I got to hold her, tell her how much I love her, and how she would miss her. The staff was so supportive and still are supporting me now. I thank God blessing me with their service. Goodwin Animal Hospital is the best.

name: Ray Alvarez
text: I am very satisfied with the services my pet received at Goodwin Animal Hospital. All of the doctors are great and they really do an awesome job taking care of our 4 legged children. I highly recommend them.

name: Betty Law Morgan
text: Always friendly and helpful they take great care of our dogs and keep us well informed of everything.  They deal with the fact that our two can't be separated much better than previous vets

name: A Redoble
text: We love Goodwin! Though we do not live in Montgomery anymore, we will use them anytime we are in town and so happy to have them there for our pups!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!  Please come visit us next time you are in Montgomery!

name: Stella Dallas
text: When I first came to this location a year ago I posted that I was not greeted at the front door and they looked at me like why was I there. I was pleased with their boarding photos so tried to give them another shot. They are not honest on what they tell customers and they are rude unless you are spending money on vet services. I heard them and a patient laughing about the review about the ladys cat having a UTI. I am really torn their other location is good but they both are owned by the same company or corporation so they stay in business no matter what location you. Remember a lie is a lie and a business that will lie about something small will tell you anything to get money out of you. Also a lady had posted a review about her cat dying and having a UTI and today I heard a patient and staff at Goodwin laughing about that review.

name: Hannah Ingram
text: The doctors are great and take awesome care of my puppy. Love this place. First time pet owner and they are all very helpful and friendly. Thank you everyone!

name: Ex Libbin
text: Great staff that is always eager to help. Also, the groomer Alli is out favorite. She always does the best job!

resp.text: THANK YOU!  We appreciate you sharing your thoughts.  Thanks for recommending us to other pet owners.

name: David97
text: Professional service and great customer service for all my pet questions.. Highly recommend!!!

resp.text: Thanks David97 for recommending Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort to other pet owners - we appreciate the feedback!  We are grateful you recommend us to other pet owners.

name: Andrew Jones
text: Dr fields, dr rigsby, and nurses who are reviving a sick puppy. Office staff is very friendly and helpful.

name: Heather David
text: Great doctors and staff have always taken the best care of my dog, Molly!! I can’t thank them enough esp Dr. Glasscock, Dr Fields and all the awesome staff that took care of my sweet Molly this past week!! We can’t wait to come see y’all soon!!

name: Roy Daniels
text: I am happy to say that Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort has continuously completed a job well done. We are very satisfied with the service provided and the special care given to our pet. I have been with Goodwin Animal Hospital since 1996.

name: Penny Crawford
text: I had a little emergency with my pet  and the staff and Doctor's were  fantastic and so caring. I live close by 5 months out of the year so I'll go back if needed ..

resp.text: Penny - We appreciate you recommending Goodwin Animal Hospital & Pet Resort to other pet owners!  Thanks!

name: Alishia Traywick
text: The groomer was very sweet and such a hard worker! We will definitely be back. She went above & beyond. The value cannot be beat.

name: Denise Bryant
text: Lacie is great and takes special care with my older dog. Lacie always gives me a report on how they did and anything she saw that may need to be checked.

name: R 1
text: Awful groomers. Rude and condescending. Cancelled my appointment that I had been waiting for without communication and rudely would not work me in after I made the trip there. Other experiences equally horrible. Got the feeling the groomers are paid by the hour not per dog and do not want to work. Avoid this place.

name: Emma Grace
text:
We love petco grooming! Really enjoy the positive attitudes and good service😇
They treat our fur baby like their own! Going back at least twice a month!

name: Joy Samford
text: I have used quite a few pet groomers around town and in my opinion barbi is the BEST!

name: Adrienne Webb
text: Bea is always happy with her grooming at Petco. Barbie always makes sure she's well taken care of.

name: K Pence
text: My dog was given a poodle cut and she’s a labradoodle. I even gave specific instructions and pictures for references. I then picked her up and came home to see her whole stomach was cut up by the groomer. 2 days later and now she has fleas. She has had a flea collar on until the day she got groomed. You would think if the groomer saw fleas she would say something about it. She definitely got them at petco while being groomed. Never going there again.

name: Rhonda Lusco
text: Barbi is outstanding and one of the most knowledgeable groomers ever!  Very caring and does a super job with our pets for over 10 years

name: Lesley Watson
text: The groomers are so sweet and take great care of our dog and genuinely care about his well-being. We love getting the scorecard that shows what they did and what is recommended for us to keep his hygiene up. And our dog always looks so nice when we're done!

name: Kay Reid
text: Barbi at Petco is OUTSTANDING!!!!!  She is knowledgeable, loves the animals she grooms, and is helpful to me as the owner.  She personally talks with me after each visit and fills me in on anything, good or bad, that is going on with my rescue dog.  I LOVE Barbi….she is BY FAR, the best groomer that I have ever used.  She makes my little 'elderly cocker spaniel' look beautiful!!!  She deserves whatever recognition that Petco awards to their exemplary employees.

name: D K
text: Q, is superb, she is a very lovable and patient young lady.  I trust her with all of my pets and they really love going to see her.  She is very meticulous, professional and knowledgeable of our doggies attitudes:-) They love her and so do we:-)

name: Brenda Hudson
text: My pets are always well taken care of. I have 2 senior dogs. One has several skin tags and her nails can only be buffed. The staff has notes on my dogs and always asks questions before they start.

name: Ashley Weaver
text: Always a great experience, and customer service! I have never been disappointed with any of the services provided. I live in McCalla and travel to Highway 280 because I trust the groomers.

name: Tracy Dempsey

name: MOMMA WEBB
text: It cost more than I expected

name: Patrick Young
text: Barbi is always kind and the only groomer that our Daisy will allow you handle her.  First class everything with Barbi. Every employee should model after her and her service.

name: Anne Betbeze
text: Barb is  the best!  She listens to how we want our dogs groomed and treats them like her own.  If she left, we would follow her anywhere.

name: david paisley
text: Barbi is the BEST . The staff always thoughtful and courteous. Explain what procedures need to be done and schedule time for pick-up.

text: They always go above and beyond to service Winston.

name: Glenwood Autism
text: Great customer service

name: david schneider
text: Friendly folks

name: mary Meyer
text: I love this establishment. They do a amazing job!! Always on point and exceed my expectations. They are amazing with my dog and really care. I will not go to another. They have a amazing booking website and super fast with responses of anything. WOW like wow. I love them.  They even contact you back to make sure you don't need anything after.

name: Jan Ellison
text: As this was my furbaby's first bath I was apprehensive about how it would go. They were gentle and made Izzy feel safe. She came home soft and smelling nice. I will definitely take her there again.

name: Misty Bonner
text: I can't say enough wonderful things about this business and their employees.  I was very hesitant to leave my puppy anywhere because she was having a hard time interacting with strangers and other dogs.  In no time they had her relaxed and making friends.  The employees would text me pics and videos without me even asking. My pup LOVES going to daycare now. HIGHLY recommend them for your fur babies.

name: Jovet Alejandro Sanchez Martinez
text: They treat my dog like one of their own. Prices are reasonable and customer service is amazing.

name: Frantina Wilson
text: I have to say I had heard negative things about Piper's from friends, but I continued to use them because we had always had good experiences with them. However, I really can't give Piper's a good review after my 4 babies latest visit over Thanksgiving weekend. We took more than enough of everything that our 2 dogs and 2 cats would need for a stay that spanned from Wednesday night - Sunday night. When we picked them up and got home we noticed left over food for the dogs, we took separate bags for each dog for each day, so was there a day that the dogs were not fed. In addition, MOST of the food we took for the cats was still in the bag...that concerns me as well. My 18 month old cat came home extremely jittery and has been jumping at the slightest noise. I can't say that Piper's did anything wrong, but I will say that our furbies did not come home happy this time. The cats will probably never go back and I will have to think long and hard about taking the dogs back too. The staff, as always, was great in their interactions with me.

name: Lydia Higgins
text: We love Piper's Playhouse and have utilized their services when they were at their old location in Saks. We absolutely love taking our pups to them, as they take awesome care of them and provide us with pics of playtime when we are away. We will always take our pups there for grooming and vacation getaways!

name: The Lott Spot
text: They were truly a blessing and helped us when we were in a bind. My dog was labeled as aggressive by my veterinarian when I tried to board with them. I called Piper's playhouse and the owner personal helped calm me down (I was furious with my vet for not even really trying!!) and allowed me to come visit the facility and my dog loved them and it was great!! We would of had to cancel our plans to go out of town if I didn't find them. They were awesome to me and with my dog. Forever grateful!!

name: The Loc Kingdom By Endless Design Braiding LLc
text: Yess love them

name: Fred Pope
text:
Great doggie daycare and Great people !
I just love this place !

name: Teresa Aguilar
text: We used Piper’s Playhouse to board our dog, and I must say we are very pleased!!  He was so loved and cared for!!  He came home all nice and clean!!!  I would recommend Piper’s Playhouse to anyone who has the need!  A special thank you to Shannon and the other staff for making our boy feel loved and welcomed!!!  We will use Piper’s again!!!  Thank you for being so great and professional!!!

name: Charnika Reynolds
text: I love them, and so does my Hemi. They are heaven sent. Not only do they board, they have a daycare center, so my baby is not caged up half the day. They even have an amazing groomer. I can travel with ease, and not have to worry about how my baby is doing 🥰 They're reasonable priced as well.

resp.text: We love that handsome yorkie!!! Thank you for the kind words! We can't wait to see you again!

name: Bill Kimber
text: Positive experience.  Will definitely board dog there again.
