text: My dogs first day was today and we both loved this place. Very affordable and clean. Best place in town Bailey love his bath

name: Teresa Davis
text: I would like to Thank the Staff at Piper's Playhouse for the special accommodations they gave to me & my babies...Chuck & Rocket! I like to Thank the Owner & Shannon for coming in early to help accommodate my schedule. Again, I truly appreciate the staff for making my babies comfortable while we were here in Anniston, Al. on assignment.

name: Kayla Donner
text: I’ve taken my dog here to be boarded three times now and am very happy with the service. I can tell she has a lot of fun with the other dogs and is well taken care of. I love that they post pictures and videos of the dogs every day on Facebook, it really eases my anxiety. I definitely recommend this place over any other boarders in the area.

name: Megan Wade
text: Love Piper's they are amazing and always so friendly. My dog always loves going in to be groomed here.

resp.text: So happy Theo loves his spa days! We love having him.

name: Richard Ensley
text: Staff was very friendly. I felt comfortable leaving Andy with them. They try their best to make your dog feel at home. I will definitely be using them again.

name: Melita Muhammad
text: As a busy college student at a nearby university, Piper's Playhouse has been nothing but a blessing for my dog and I. I am so thankful for the staff, especially Connie, and the care they take of my dog! The love these people will have your dog is truly unconditional. The prices are extremely affordable and they offer daily deals! I highly recommend Piper's Playhouse!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review!!

name: Melinda McElroy
text: I have been bringing my puppies, Jazzy and Jagger to Piper's for two years and we LOVE it! We've used grooming, daycare and boarding and we've never had any issues. They are always exhausted after a fun filled day at doggy daycare!  The staff truly care about the animals and do everything possible to ensure the animals are fully taken care of properly. We would never dream of going anywhere else or trusting our pups with anyone else!

name: Tia Stambaugh
text: Absolutely fantastic! My Husky's loved the groomers and they did a great job! Very friendly staff and we were given advise on how to properly take care of their coats and such. Great prices and awesome daily deals! Highly recommended!! We will definitely be making this a regular routine!

name: Cade Somers
text: Our family dog is well-behaved for our crew that includes 3 kids ages 5-11. He loves to fetch baseballs, run, play, and frolic in the occasional Alabama snowfalls but he doesn't get out to socialize often with other people or dogs, so he can act territorially aggressive when kenneled once or twice a year. We've kenneled him other places before, but he came home the happiest when we used Piper's. He came home clean and happy, and the staff seemed upbeat and positive both at drop-off and pick-up. I know he's likely not the most easygoing dog for which they provide services, but our family appreciates them for their professionalism and care.

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review! We can't wait until Homer comes to see us again!

name: Nicholas Shelton
text: I have three hyper-active brindled rescued dogs that absolutely love this place, they begin going nuts when we are still blocks away. When my dogs are there for daycare, boarding, or day school they come home completely worn out and sleep/lay around for the next two days. They groomers do wonderful work. I cannot begin to express my gratitude to the wonderful people who work there for giving me peace of mind while I am away. I highly recommend entrusting your pet with these wonderful people for all of your pet care needs.

name: Tessey Johnson
text: I am very happy with everyone from Piper's Playhouse. They had my babies Casey and Daisy for 3 days, I was able to see pictures of them on their facebook page to see how they were doing. But the most impressive to me was how when my trip home got messed up because of the weather, they stayed late so I could get my babies back instead of having to wait another day. I had missed them so much so this meant the world to me. I would gladly take my babies back to stay with them. Thank you all so much

name: kala mitchell
text: My pup has been going to pipers for almost 3 years now. Even though my pup started daycare at an early age she isnt very social towards other dogs. However she isnt aggressive. The staff at pipers recognized this right away and made accommodations to make her feel safe. While she is visiting she is allowed a safe place to withdraw when the interaction of other dogs is just too much. At the same time she has just as much freedom to join the group and observe or if she is in a really good mood play! The fact that they treat each dog according to each dogs personality and temperament speaks volumes! It is above and beyond and average doggie daycare! My pup is always excited to go to day care! She starts crying from excitement as soon as we turn off quintard. She is always extremely excited to see the staff, especially Alisha! 😉 (her second mom) Thank you to Alisha, Shannon, and all the Pipers staff for 3 years of great service!! 💖🐶

name: Elizabeth Blue
text: They took such good care of my dogs when we boarded them there for a long weekend. As part of their boarding price doggy day care, playing with other size-appropriate friendly dogs, is included!

name: Lisa Amerson
text: Good prices, easy to get reservations. Dog is always excited to go. Love that they take pics daily and I can see how Scout is interacting.

name: Stephen Mann
text: They've kept my dogs on several occasions and have always done a great job.  They are also very reasonably priced.

name: Jennifer Jackson
text: My fur babies look so awesome after their visit and the staff is wonderful. Found my new groomers

name: Erin Calvert
text:
This local Dog establishment is violating multiple heath codes. The owner of this facility and the manager were told on multiple occasions by employees and were aware of the following: Fire extinguishers (they only have 2) being extremely out of date, last checked back in 2015— also no evacuation plan, or safety drills, air vent maintenance doesn’t take place— vents/filters not properly maintained can easily catch fire, this company works with LIVE animals, the safety of your dogs are not being considered as you can tell from the images.... everything is layered with years of dog dander and hair.
When the heater gets turned on the smell of burning hair lasts for days and the company uses wax melts up front to mask the smells. They also stuff the vents they don’t clean with smell good beads to mask the smell.
Even daycare dogs are kenneled. Employees hang around upfront until around 9 when they decide to start putting dogs in daycare—- this means if you’re paying for a full day or even a half day of doggie daycare starting in the morning your furbabies are missing out on 2+ hours of socialization. This facility doesn’t properly clean the daycare room. And weeks worth of hair is noticeable near the drains in the daycare play areas, this is extremely unsafe for your animals/the employees. The smell in this building that’s separate from the building your drop off your dog is horrific. Dogs are left unsupervised in daycare, and the daycare supervision in maintained outside of the daycare rooms- so instead of dogs getting that one-on-one attention they are only monitored when barking has increased. Because of that, rooms aren’t cleaned right away causing burns on paw pads from dogs playing around in urine. Most dogs have to be ran through Grooming to be spot cleaned before leaving. Bored dogs have started eating the walls of this establishment because of the lack of social interaction they receive. This facility illegally mentioned to employees that they can not pay overtime to them when they have worked 40+ hrs. Because of this, I believe the care of the animals that go there are being affected.
During the recent snow storm an employee managed to chase a already nervous dog around the front lobby of this establishment causing him to run out of the front door. This dog was missing for a week and found with his hip shattered, and he had ate an entire toe off of himself.. this establishment paid his vet bill which included the cost of utilization. Clearly the proper training of employees is not being conducted. This facility also does not clean kennels often and when they do they use a dirty mop to wipe out the kennels. This is probably a factor to the outbreak of kennel cough they are currently battling.
Many times employees just feed  dogs breakfast without even bothering to clean the kennel first or move the dog to a clean kennel.. that means that they were eating breakfast in their own filth and kenneled with it until daycare started up. In It’s hard enough trusting someone, let along finding out an establishment you’re paying LOTS of money to is neglecting your animal. This establishment recently caused the death of a small 4 lb dog, and they are trying to cover it up. By deleting comments and blocking any negativity they receive. I refuse to be silent. This facility is anything but transparent!!!

name: Shannon gilmore
text: I wouldn't take my two babies anywhere else!! They love everyone there! My oldest dog is nervous around strangers and he doesn't hesitate to run up to everyone there. The groomer is amazing and I have never been disappointed. I have a 6 year old male dorkie (dachshund/Yorkshire terrier) and a 1 year old female schnorkie (schnauzer/Yorkshire terrier), who are both rescues. I recommend pipers to everyone

name: Faith Wright
text: Great place for our fur babies! They pups love to play and the staff all take good care of pets.

name: Rebekah Shierling
text:
They kept my lab for a few days. She has never been boarded or been to doggie daycare. She came back to me just the way I dropped her off. They were very understanding as to her walking for 15 minutes. They posted pictures of her playing daily! They said she enjoyed herself and they loved her. I would bring her back because for the first time in 6 years I didn't worry about picking my dog up and them being under stress, no walked enough, kept in a crate all day, or not being checked on plenty.

Thanks to piper's dogowners can rest easy knowing their pups are being pampered to the fullest in a clean environment!

I even called and ask if my lab could stay one more day one the day I was supposed to pick her up from our trip and they were happy to let her stay in her room!

resp.text: Can't wait to see Mocha again!

name: wild rose
text: It is a daycare ONLY!!!! THEY NO LONGER ADOPT DOGS OUT!

resp.text: Piper's Playhouse is a boarding, daycare, training and retail facility, but you are correct about the rescue. We had to close the Piper's Rescue in 2018 due to the lack of income to keep it running. We do work with other local rescues in order to continue helping in the community as much as possible. Piper's also holds drives for the the local animal shelters at least once a year to help in that aspect. Piper's Rescue a

name: Rachel Bonnett
text: Wonderful with my Tod his hairstyle always looks amazing.

name: Marilyn Hart
text: Piper's Playhouse has been a lifesaver!!! We recently got a very sweet but very high energy rescue...Smokey:)  They were not scared off by his hyper-self and have been a wonderful help in helping me make his entrances and exits not so wild LOL;). I live and work in Gadsden so add 3 hrs and 140 miles to each work day for Smokey to go there...it's worth all that extra effort bc I know he is well taken care of(they welcome me calling to check on him), having fun, and will be toast when I pick him up, which makes nights much more manageable;). This place of business is clean, professional, helpful, loving, and a blessing for dogs and dog owners!!!

name: Kate Upchurch
text: Prior to this past visit I'd have written a great review but when I picked my little guy  ( a shih tzu )up on Christmas Eve I was horrified! Shaking, limping and handed dirty bedding with no explanation as to how he was injured, why we weren't informed  when it happened plus finding out he'd been very stressed by being kenneled every night in the large room with the large dogs with big dog barks! When I first boarded @ Piper's 2 years ago I requested that he be kenneled at night with only little dogs and was shown a room off the hall on the right where I was told the small dogs stayed. When I asked why he was put in the big room this time with the big dogs she said "well, you didn't request that he be separated". If my file had been consulted I'm sure it would reflect my wishes. There was no I'm sorry we didn't contact you about his injury, etc. He literally had to be carried that night and Christmas day every time to potty, to food bowl, etc. While I understand this may not be the norm @ Piper's, ( had never happened to me before) since it happened this time, I'll be making other arrangements next time. Beware. Things are not always as they seem. Ask to see where your dog will be put at night. I was told they  NEVER allow tours! That's shocking! I've ALWAYS toured where I board my dog. Ask what their policy is if your dog becomes injured or sick. I asked when the owner would be there as I wanted to speak in person with them and was told the owner was never at the Anniston location. Really? So, I've emailed the owner to express my concerns.

name: Wilson, Brandon David
text: To fire one on leave seem real... despicable. More care is given to pups than those mental. If you've paid the piper you know who I am. The management's a joke, but current employees are grand.

name: Leisa Cole
text: My dog loves this place! People working here are GREAT!

name: Alabama Zephyr
text: Wonderful staff and a wonderful doggie day care! Thank you!

name: Lawanna Wade
text: Thanks to Pipers Playhouse  for taking care ol Handsome  for the Wades !

name: Shawanda Edison
text: Prices aren't what they advertise. But it's a nice place to take your pet and know they are in good hands.

name: Micah Morgan
text:
Highly recommended! Never had a complaint! My babies have been groomed here, boarded here and had play dates in daycare! If they were misbehaved I would have them in the training classes as well. There prices are very affordale plus they have just lowered the prices! They always have some new homemade nutritional snack for sale on the counter and tons of things to buy for your fur baby. Ranginger from shampoos to clothes to toys to collars and leashes. You will not be disappointed. Thank you Pipers for making it easier for me to go on vacation without being weary of how my babies are. Yall are awesome!

Also I would like to add with being a former employee of Pipers Playhouse. Know that your baby is well watched and takenjoy care of. Blankets, kennels and play areas are washed daily with non harmful chemicals.  They have very interactive play during daycare, someone is always watching and spending time with your furbaby. Medicine is well charted and given correctly.  Staff does their very best at making your pets stay as easy and comfortable as possible. The owner is the most compassionate person I have met and treat every animal with respect and love. You must check out Pipers for yourself!

name: NameIs Private
text: Great people great service.  Thank you

name: Ms. D.
text: The front desk worker helped me a lot.

name: Cory Clifton
text: Great place for doggy day care

name: Toni Bell
text: My dog was boarded the weekend of July 4th. He was picked up today and reeked of urine as well as his bed that was sent. Highly disappointed and will not be using pipers playhouse again.

resp.text: I am very sorry you were disappointed with our services. Rudy (still being a puppy) did have accidents in his kennel at night. He also played VERY hard in doggie daycare each day. His bed and blankets were washed each day - but in the rush of dogs leaving today (July 5th) it was overlooked. I have addressed it with my Boarding Supervisor and it will not happen again! We would like to offer him a free full-service bath.

name: Maia Canning
text: The place smells strongly of urine.

name: Teresa Craven
text: The daycare is the best!!!!!!

name: Brooklyn Turner
text: Dr. O’Leary is incredible. My partner and I brought our cat to him due to a fever and, later, breathing problems. Dr. O’Leary gave our kitty the best care we could have asked for while also checking in with us to see what we could afford and what we couldn’t. He frequently keeps in contact in with us to make sure our cat is doing okay and see if we have any questions. He is extremely intelligent and understanding. We cannot recommend him enough!

resp.text: It was an honor to provide the best care for your kitty! We truly care about the health and well-being of every pet that visits us, and we're delighted to have earned your recommendation thanks to the knowledgeable, understanding, and helpful service you received.

name: Joelen Ward
text: Dr. O'Leary is a fantastic reptile vet. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you for the high recommendation, Joelen! If you need anything else from us in the future, please let us know.

name: Kaylee Hobbs
text: One of the most professional vets I've been to in the city of Montgomery. I went to get my pet tegu (lizard) examined because they're one of the few vets in the tri-county area that treat reptiles. Dr. O'Leary was extremely knowledgeable and caring and the staff was very courteous. I cannot recommend them enough.

resp.text: Kaylee, we're honored to know that you hold Dr. O'Leary and our staff in such high esteem. Your recommendation is greatly appreciated and we'll be here for you if you need anything else for Tegu. Sincerely, VCA Vaughn Road Animal Hospital

name: Erika Poikey
text: Vet for the rich, good luck getting out the doors for less than $500. 1/10, Do not recommend, they are mostly nice, kinda pushy, and everything is at least double compared to anywhere else.

resp.text: Erika, we're saddened by your review. When it comes to any services we provide, we always strive to be as accommodating as we can be, so it's unfortunate we did not meet your expectations. Feel free to email our hospital manager at Kelly.Greenstein@vca.com if you would like to discuss your feedback further. Respectfully, VCA Vaughn Road Animal Hospital

name: Julie Freeman
text: Brittany did a fabulous job grooming our toy Pomeranian, Pipsqueak. He knows he looks great! He has been so sassy since I picked him up! Showing off his silhouette cut!

name: Lawrence Daniel
text: I found a stray 6 week old old kitten that needed to be certified healthy.  They got me in and the kitten checked out the next day (my request).  Otherwise they would have taken care of the kitten that day.  Fast, friendly service with great attention to making sure I know everything I need to know about this kitten.

name: Linda Weeks
text: Dr. Lamb and her staff are the best.   They are kind, efficient and always have a smile of their faces no matter how busy they are.    I know that my babies are being well taken care of at each visit.

name: Sally Cupcakesandthings
text: Excellent services. Would give 5 stars if they weren't so pricey but you do get what you pay for here, which is excellence.

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your enthusiastic feedback about our services! If you ever have any further questions, please don't hesitate to ask!

name: Linda Weeks
text: I wish I could rate Vaughn Road Vet Clinic with100 stars.    I have been using them for 20 plus years and they are the best!!!!!    The doctors as well as the vet techs are full of compassion for each furry baby that comes through the door.    I never worry when I have to leave my babies there for any type of procedure - I know they will receive the best care possible!!!    Three cheers to Dr. Lamb and her employees- I don't know what I would do without them!!!!!!😘😘

name: Riketa Johnson
text: I had a wonderful time at my appointment with my dog king they gave me and my dog the upmost respect and the vet gave me great information on my dog and what I can do to keep him healthy we will be back thank you all best staff very friendly and they really care that is what I love the most

resp.text: Riketa, we couldn't be happier knowing that you enjoyed your experience with us. It was our pleasure to treat your dog with lots of love and we'll be here for you if you need anything else. Thank you!

name: Lawrence Daniel
text: I found a month old kitten.  They got her in and checked out the day I requested an appointment.  They took great care of both of us.  I would highly recommend for any of your pets needs.

name: Hilda Young
text: I am leaving yet another glowing review for Vaugh Road Vet Clinic.  Dr. Lamb and Haley performed efficient and thorough exams of my fur babies, making sure the pups were comfortable and unstressed throughout.  Dr. Lamb was even patient with me and answered my many questions.  I also enjoyed meeting and talking to Sarah, the smiling receptionist at the front desk.  I will continue to bring all 4 of my dogs to Vaugh Rd and highly recommend you do the same.

name: Amelia Blackwood
text: The vet techs & support staff are 150% professional pet handlers.  They make pet pandemonium look like its a piece of cake which is much appreciated when someone lile myself is handling, transporting & responsible for someone else's beloved furry friends.  I don't know if my trips to their clinic could ever be so smooth & easygoing without their accommodating assistance.  They never fail to go above & beyond to help regardless of request or simply their nature to help at the first possible situation in meed.

name: Leisa Johnson
text: Started here for the grooming. Stayed for the excellent vet care! The whole staff is friendly and caring.

resp.text: Jim, it's been a pleasure to go above and beyond for your lovely dog who always deserves the highest caliber of care and love. Thank you so much for supporting our team!

I can't say enough good things about these folks and the service they give all their clients.

I have highly recommended Tangled Tails to my friends.

name: Pam Dillon
text: My dogs have been going here for years.  I love how they took extra time with my lab Buddy who had doggie dementia.  They allowed him to sit out with them as they groomed. The only one pup I have left is now 16 and she comes back looking like a puppy. every time

resp.text: Thanks Pam we have loved all your babies and mookie is still a pup at heart!

name: Stephen Gauthier
text: Always pleased with condition of our dog after visit.

name: Jaclyn Tew
text: Beau had a great time and his summer shave came out perfectly!! Price was great too!  Friendly service and will be going back!!

name: Susan Comperda
text: I used to take my two Yorkies here. They have both passed away over the past year but one of my Yorkies was 16 years old at his last groom. He had become very agitated just to be touched but they were always very patient with him and did a great job. We now take our Goldendoodle there and they do a great job with him. He's a big, lazy guy so not always the easiest to handle but always come out looking great. I always find that I can pretty easily schedule an appointment online and the price quotes we have received have been accurate. They are express groomers which they are very upfront about which won't work with everyone's schedule but otherwise I think they do a great a job and are upfront regarding their services and pricing.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words! And yes our express groom only works for some families but we try and be very upfront with our 2-4 hour time frame and call ahead time for pick up. We also work Saturdays to try and help those who work during the week and can’t do express grooms on weekdays.

name: Kendyl Uptain
text: We couldn’t be happier with Tangled Tails!  It means a lot when you can find someone you trust to groom your babies!  Alice and Cooper are always happy to go to Tangled Tails and are still happy when we pick them up!  Thank you again for making our babies beautiful and for taking great care of them while they are with you!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much! Your two babies are very good for us. Getting reviews like this is what keeps me doing this job!

name: Mandi Stroud
text: Absolutely perfect! I chose this salon based on reviews and close proximity to our house. Found out they've moved, but the experience was 1000% worth the drive. My dog is 11 and we've lived in several states... this is hands down the best she's ever looked! Plus, the owner is super, and the rates very good... it's safe to say we've found our groomer!

name: Russell Estep
text: Just picked up my dog and now off to emergency vet they do a good job but my dog has never come home like this

resp.text: We spoke in detail with you upon pickup and again when you came back to the salon. We provided the best service we could for an older dog and you came in the salon and said you never actually went to the emergency vet so this review is not accurate. I thought this review was removed but it appears it was put back up so I felt the need to respond. Buddy became upset at the end of the groom when we tried doing his nails so we took him off the table and explained at pickup.

name: Pamela Kerns
text: This is the spot to have your dogs groomed!  The staff does a great job.  They don't keep your dogs all day, they are groomed and you pick them up immediately.  My dogs never come home stressed out, its truly spa time for them.

resp.text: Thanks Pamela. We love your dogs and appreciate the kind words.

name: Alinda Coiner
text: Took really good care of my dog!  Reasonable prices. Great staff. Will be going back.

name: kristine latham
text:
First time going to Tangled Tails and after seeing how BEAUTIFUL my two long hair chihuahua's looked coming back from their grooming session, I can definitely say I will be coming back! They were given a bath, a shave, and nails trimmed and the cost was cheaper than other places. My pups were so happy and you can tell the staff care for their furry clients.
I have bathed my animals many times but they have NEVER came out looking so good.
Tangled Tails did an amazing job!!

name: Adam Clauss
text: It was an awesome experience and they did a great job with our dogs.  They look better than they have in months and our dogs loved it there.  Awesome, awesome place.

resp.text: Thank you Adam. Both Levi and Simon are always welcome at Tangled Tails. We love getting to groom our big pups too!

name: Jeff Montgomery
text: Friendly staff who care for your pet. We are very happy with how they groom our dog.

resp.text: Thanks Jeff. We truly appreciate your kind words!

name: Charles Looney
text: They did a good job, however appointments are limited due to hours. A little pricey, but you will have to travel for competitive spas.

resp.text: We are an express groom shop open Wednesday- Saturday by appointment. (We are open on Saturday’s for the convenience  of our clients who work through the week.) We only book between 10-12 dogs maximum between 2 groomers to maintain high quality grooms. As far as price we have our prices listed online as well as in the shop when you walk in so nobody is caught off guard. The reason your first visit was more expensive was due to the matted condition of Hucks coat. I explained in great detail that it would take a long time to brush out and I have to be able to pay my groomers and bathers for their time. We always strive to offer our clients a five star experience and I’m sorry you didn’t feel you got that with us. Our limited hours are due to the fact that we run 2 salon locations which has us working 6 days/week and both groomers have young children that we care for full time so express grooming is really our only option as of now at our Harvest location.

name: Emily Camarigg
text: Friendly and professional!! I brought my long haired chihuahua in there today and they did an amazing summer cut for her! Followed all special requests!! Highly recommend!!

name: Lindsey R
text: Amy at Tangled Tails is the best groomer I have been to, and that's saying something considering I've had my dog groomed in numerous (and more expensive) places in Birmingham prior to moving back to Huntsville. She does the best work I've seen and charges very reasonable rates. Tangled Tails is so good that when I still lived in Birmingham I'd plan trips home to Huntsville, just so I could take my dog to them rather than using someone in Birmingham.

name: Ben Williams
text: Tink has been with these ladies since there first location in Harvest on Wall Triana. They are so good with him and very understanding I will always be a customer. Thanks

resp.text: Thank you so much!  We love little Tink and appreciate you staying a loyal customer.

name: Nicki Sheaffer
text: New in town and first time at new groomer. Tangled Tails did a great job with my handicapped shih tzu. I called several groomers and nobody would take him, either they didn't have time or wouldn't answer the phone. Prices were affordable and I didn't have to leave him all day. Thanks Tangled Tails!

name: Dave Padgett
text: The groomers love dogs and it shows. The dogs love going there. The cut is great every time (2 Shih Tzu's) and the price is reasonable. I highly recommend them to everyone.

name: Barb Higgins
text: Tangled tails always does a great job on my two for babies!

resp.text: Thank you so much! Harley and Mack are sweet pups and we appreciate your kind words!

name: Carrie Smith
text: Never Answers the Phone and when they do the groomers are rude. The one time I did get in for a groom they did do a great job but their manners leave SO MUCH TO BE DESIRED.

resp.text: Answering the phone is a struggle for us especially when we are busy because are main focus at that time is caring for the pet on our table. Being rude is never our intention but as humans working in a high stress job I am sure we have made the mistake of being to short on the phone. It is something that we have made a very conscious effort to never do now. Many times we don't hear the phone ring because of the loud environment we work in. We ask that people leave their name and number and we will return their call as soon as possible. I am sorry your experience was not up to our current standards but we work very hard to do great grooms for our customers and will continue to do so.

name: Dana Hofmeister
text: Nice local groomer, has been super nice to work with our dog who is older

name: Kathy Norton
text: Love this place and so does my dog.

name: Easton Smith
text: It sucked

resp.text: We have never had you at our business and I would appreciate if you would remove this review as it is our only review under 5 stars. I believe this review was not meant for us seeing as you were never a client here and it is unfair for it to hurt our rating

name: Terry Brown
text: I am so pleased with my BIG DOGs grooming at Paws and Whiskers! Awesome job, great with my very active "puppy". I highly recommend them for all your grooming needs! We will not go anywhere else!

name: Sarah Knight
text: She is the best!!! I’m very pleased with my furbabies bath and cut. I already made their next appointment!!!!

name: Willie Mason
text: It was really a great visit she was efficient & professional I would want everyone to give her business

name: Kelly Parkhurst
text: I will never use this grooming service again. I have an Alaskan Malamute and what she called 'matts' was actually his undercoat. She not only shaved part of my dog, but there were bald spots from where the hair has been ripped out. She shaved his underbelly and the back of his legs. These dogs have a special coat that keeps them cool and now his is gone. She also trimmed his nails too short and one is bleeding. When asked about it i was told she doesn't trim them she uses a grinder and that something  must have happened on the way to the car. My dog is miserable and his beautiful fur is gone. He doesn't even look like a malamute anymore.

name: Ben Williams
text: Always does a wonderful job...thanks

name: Deborah Burch
text: Amy always does an amazing job on my hard to groom fur baby!!

name: Andrianne Adams
text: Fast and efficient. They love their job. Which means they'll treat your pet as their own. Kodah loves it there! He always comes out happy and fresh and cute!

name: Kevin Payne
text: A fantastic cat grooming service, with very affordable prices. Very kinda and polite, they take care of your pets like family. I highly recommend their grooming services!

name: Jim Richards
text: Amazing service at reasonable rates! would recommend!

name: Jonah Leclair
text: the best Cat Grooming Service in town! they did an amazing job with my little kitty!

text: They do good grooming. And take care of your pet like family.

name: Rhonda Hilbert

text: Dependable pet boarding service

name: Travice Biller

name: Larry Cook
text: Paws& Whiskers is closed at this location

name: Tami Moreland
text: My babies look great.  Staff extremely friendly and professional.  Best grooming ever.

name: Crystal Anderson
text: I can't say enough great things about this place. Great prices and she does a wonderful job with our fur baby! She always comes home with a new scarf on. 😍 I always recommend them any chance I get. 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

resp.text: Thank you !! ❤

name: Dianna Weaver
text: Today was my first time using Ms. Kelly and I am very impressed with Happy Dog. My Ronnie looks so handsome and was in such a good mood when I picked him up. I would highly recommend using Happy Dog Grooming.

name: Lisa Amerson
text: Very friendly, reasonable and they do a great job!

name: Jamie Stewart
text: Excellent people Excellent service. Give your dog some some time at the spa. They treat your dog like it was their own.

name: Joseph Albright
text: My dog is happy and comfortable going here. She jumps out of the vehicle and walks in herself and waits to get in a kennel unless one is open with a towel in it. She gets in herself  and sits down. Very strange. Lol

name: Bill Prickett
text: They are great with my Sheltie.

name: Gene Fuller
text: Great job and friendly

name: Ashley Mink
text: I highly recommend this place!! This was the fourth vet I took my very sick kitten too and they didn’t even hesitate and told me to bring him in right away and took care of him all day and even offered for me to bring him back the next day since I had no one to monitor him and feed him regularly while I was at work. I could tell everyone here genuinely cared and it was a great feeling. Unfortunately he didn’t make it and the next morning, they called to check on me. Thank you to everyone that helped Shiloh and fought for him.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave this kind review. I'm very sorry about sweet little Shiloh. Please let us know if there is anything we can do for you in the future!

name: Elizabeth Bailey
text: If you want good people to treat you well and treat your animal like it's the only animal around you need to go here these people are the absolute best

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! We really appreciate it!

name: Jessica Keith
text: Took our 7 week old kitten here for her first round of shots and they were so sweet and helpful. They loved on our kitten and answered all of our questions! Will definitely be using them as our vet from now on.

resp.text: Thank you for reviewing us! It was a pleasure to meet you and care for Molly!

name: Tiffany Lipska
text: We took our German Shepherd to doggie daycare for a couple days while we camped out. They treated my puppy like family and were super nice! He came home happy each day!

name: John Carr
text: During the past twenty-four years, Dr. Whitfield has cares for our four legged family in a most superior way. This includes procedures without anesthesia due to the old age of the pet. We have developed a long standing friendship between his family and ours over this period of time. Once when our Cocker was experiencing seizures Doctor Whitfield made a home visit. Hard to beat!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review. We are grateful for your loyalty and love having you and Freddie as part of our family!

name: Jerry Warnock
text: All of the staff demonstrate a caring and professional attitude.  They genuinely care for the animals and clients well being.  I have never been disappointed with their grooming or  medical care of my dog.  In fact, I suspect they spoil her a bit as she does not hesitate to go with them when I drop her off.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us this great review! Your suspicions are correct! How could we resist such a "Precious" face?!

name: John Morris
text: I’ve been going to Oakview for almost 16 years. From the beginning they have been professional, reliable caring, and have become like family. They were the first veterinary clinic I used when I got my first pup. Wonderful staff and very personable. It’s like having a vet in a small town. I will continue using them for our veterinary medicine needs for years to come.

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave this review! We appreciate you trusting us with Acre and Bo's care!

name: Robert Chaisson
text: Friendly, caring and knowledgeable people, who are always helpful and caring when it comes to your pets need, would recommended 1000%

resp.text: Thank you for reviewing us! We have loved caring for, and watching Warrior grow.

name: Amy Serrano
text: I love this place!!!!!   Everybody is so caring.  I trust them implicitly with my cat.  Dr.  Robinson always follows up to make sure her suggestion/treatment has worked.  She always takes time to answer my questions.  Way to go, Oakview!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review. We are grateful for your loyalty and love having you as a part of the family!

name: Kim Winsett
text: All the staff is extremely friendly!!!  Never had any issues with anyone.  Everyone is super nice and love animals.  They do not force services on you and always answer all your questions.  My girls are not afraid to visit the vet.

name: Amanda Laddie
text: Swapped vets due to several repeat issues with our prior. The service at Oak View was quick, professional and comprehensive. I appreciated the friendliness of all staff members and the care they had for our furbabies.

resp.text: Thank you so much for leaving us this review! Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you!

name: Shay Steel
text: Kristin, the groomer, does an amazing job on my two dogs. They are always so clean, smell so good and have the cutest haircuts when they leave. Most importantly, my dogs are happy. The staff at Oakview is kind and caring towards the animals in their care. What a great place!

name: Ellen Neely
text: The best vets around.  Love them.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to review us. We have loved caring for John Parker and Kodiak as they have grown up. Thank you for your loyalty and trust!

name: Melissa J
text: Oak View Animal Hospital has been beyond kind. When I first went there with my new puppy, they wrote me a handwritten note welcoming me to the clinic and had also thanked me for working as a nurse during Covid. Since that time they have given my dog personalized care and answered my questions as an over-anxious dog mom. They also get my pup in quickly if i have any concerns and send me reminders about appointments. Very good vet clinic to go to!

name: Clarissa Powell
text:
Love the staff and Veterinarians at Oakview!

They are all so helpful and knowledgeable and take excellent care of our furbabies.

Service and compassion for animals is #1

resp.text: We appreciate the sweet review! Thanks for trusting us with your furbabies!

name: Brooke McClellan
text: The staff is so friendly and really cares!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5-stars! We really appreciate it! We look forward to seeing you and Cash again!

name: Melissa Hull
text: I have had great experiences with all of the doctors and staff at Oak View! I always recommend them when I get the chance. When I had to put down my 17 yo dog they were so incredibly accommodating and respectful. Dr. Robinson was there to help me along the way!

name: Rider 0401
text: Such a wonderful experience today!  I am a first timer to Oak View and took my newly adopted pomeranian for shots and grooming. The entire staff was so friendly, knowledgeable and took excellent care of my little guy!  Kristin did a fabulous job grooming him, he looks adorable!  Thanks for taking such good care of Hamlet today, y'all are the best!

name: BisonAP
text: They've been a part of my life for a number of years. All the dogs I've had entrusted to their care get the sincerest of effort and the utmost in kindness & compassion, which both animals and their owners can use from time to time. It's not "just a job" with them. They really, really care. And that goes a long way with me. 🐾🐾♥️👍

name: Chasity Gilmer
text: I love using Oak View Animal Hospital for my puppies grooming needs. I have taken all three of my dogs there and they have come home smelling amazing and super soft. The employees are so sweet and patient will my big pups. I will continue to take all three in the future.

name: Tony Oddo
text: Always show me the professionals that they are. Take utmost care of my boy Alex...and always check back with me on care and test results. All around...good people!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us this sweet review! We always look forward to seeing you and Alex!

name: Amanda Counts
text: Very kind, open lines of communication, took great care of our pets while we were on vacation.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us this review! Please let us know if there is anything we can do for you in the future!

name: Dorothy Sarvaunt
text: I have been bringing my babies here for years and let me just say that even with the pandemic they have gone above and beyond. They are always there when we need them, they are all well trained and professional and above all else they truly care about  your pet and you! I even get follow up calls after a visit from the Dr. to make sure everything is ok. I Can't speak highly enough of this office. Thank you so much!

name: Sarah Tamburello
text: I LOVE this vet. They take care of your dogs as if they are one of their own. I highly recommend!!

name: Sarah Mayfield
text: Oakview staff have been with us through five dogs and four cats. Need I say more?  Everyone there has, provided up-to-date care,  charged reasonable fees, been kind, and showed compassion, especially when our pets got terminal diseases, needed comfort care, and eventually had to be put to sleep.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review Mrs. Mayfield! We will always be here for you if you need anything!

name: Morgan Pettus
text: Oak view is the best!! I take both of my Boston’s there and couldn’t ask for a better place.  Great customer service and so understanding and able to fit in ASAP.

name: MaryJo Sewell
text: The techs and doctors are Oak View are top-notch!  We recently had to have both of our dogs put down which was devastating for our family.  Dr. Robinson, Julie and the rest of the crew were so kind and attentive to us during (and after) this difficult time.  I absolutely give them the highest recommendation in the world.  Your pets will be blessed over and over to have any of these doctors & their staff take care of your furry friends!

name: Larae Ganger
text: Dr. Robinson is great and is so patient with my VERY ANXIOUS great dane.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review! We hope Chapel is doing well!

name: Whitney Hackworth
text: The staff was great! They were very attentive and prompt. I especially loved that the vet came to the car to explain everything to me so I could understand completely! I will definitely be changing over to this clinic.

name: Victoria Covarrubias
text: Absolutely love them. Just started taking out new fur baby about two months ago and they have been wonderful. Very friendly staff!!!

name: Kaitlyn Poff
text: I have been taking my goldendoodle here to be groomed for about 6 months now and love it! He comes back looking like a doodle and not a poodle, and always so happy! Would recommend Oak View to anyone looking for a great groomer and vet!

name: Rock Fish
text: The entire staff shows that they "truly" care about my pets!

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us  a 5 star review! We really appreciate it!

name: Sheryl Sheppard
text: I took my fur baby for a meet and greet, she is a 6 yr old mini schnauzer and although we live in Pelham now, we were driving to our long time veterinarian in Trussville. I wanted a clinic close to us. After requesting an appointment, the office contacted me and were very helpful and friendly. We had the opportunity to meet one of the vet techs and a veterinarian, who both understood  her and her personality. I only gave 4 stars since this clinic is only doing “curbside” visits, when many places have opened since the COVID pandemic. I wasn’t made aware of this until we arrived and honestly would have postponed our appointment until we could be seen inside. I would have rather see the interaction between the staff and my dog. We’ll probably go for her annual appointment for vaccines and see how that goes.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review! I apologize that our curbside policy wasn't addressed when you made your appointment, but I am happy to announce that our lobby is now open! Please let us know if there is anything we can do for you in the future!

name: Janice Eubank
text: Oakview is like taking our dogglettes to a Pediatrician’s office. They truly care about our little dudes, remember their names and treat us humans the same way. Covid has created some distance in our face to face interactions but we still feel the same way. Julie Jordan Evans and Brandy Skinner consistently treat us as family. Dr Robinson and Dr. Robinson, are not only experts in Small Animal Surgery and Diagnostics, they are also experts in the soft skills of relaying results and treatment in common language. There’s no Vet Clinic that is comparable.

name: Jade Sisk-trott
text: Staff is caring and listened to my every detail about what is going on with my diabetic dog, my elderly dog and all my cats. Much respect. And Sydney is the best receptionist, always sweet and helpful.

name: west W
text: Wonderful experience and very professional. Our Sunny loves Oak View.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us a review! Sunny is always a sweet boy!

name: Chloe M. Gooden Ministries
text:
Friendly
Quick service
Nice
Didn’t do unnecessary things to raise prices
Will be back for his annual care

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave us a review! Let us know if there is anything else we can do for Milo!

name: Jennifer Kimbrough
text: I REALLY loved Dr. Early. She seemed to really actually care about my GiGi and was so kind to me too! :) GiGi’s excited to see her again in 3 weeks!

name: Maggie Shannon
text: Dr. Robinson and the entire staff at Oak View Animal Hospital are exceptional. They are absolutely the best in total care, follow up, kindness and genuine interest for their 4-legged patients in addition to giving treatment details and compassion to pet parents!

name: Phillip Campbell
text: Everyone there is so friendly and compassionate. We would not go anywhere else!

resp.text: Thank you for trusting us all these years! We love Aunt Bee!

name: Meghan Hall
text: Thanks for getting us in quickly to help our Nala kitty. She's feeling much better and I really appreciate the doctor calling to check in on her! Love Oak View!!

name: Nancy Paschal
text: We are from out of town and our dog became ill. They fit her into their schedule and she is feeling better now. They were friendly and professional.

name: Michelle Spann

name: annie lynch

name: Traci White

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave us a review! We all love Leo!

name: omar pittman
text: They are on time and very nice. They take care of your baby as if they were theirs. That’s what you want to pay for when you could go anywhere.

name: Theresa Moore
text: Dr. Robinson and Julie always take care of my Mia!  Never questions the care she gets when she is at the Clinic.  Mia loves going to see them and can't wait to get out of the car!

name: Christina Mahaffey
text: The entire staff is great! Oak View has taken care of our fur babies for a long time and I trust them to be caring and professional

name: Courtney Waldron
text: Dr. Robinson is the best!   My dog only “smiles” at 4 people and she’s one of them. Even though my dog received a shot and dye in her eye during her visit, she still loves her. I drive all the way from alabaster to Oak View because of how nice everyone treats my dogs.

name: Bailey Mills
text: I brought in my dog when I first got her. She was older and I didn’t know the kinda shape she was in. I had a lot of questions and concerns about taking care of her. The doctor helped me work it out and answered all of my questions. I felt more prepared to be a puppy parent after taking my dog to OakView. I was extremely pleased and will continue to take her there.

name: Brian J Less
text: This has been a staple in Pelham for years for veterinary care from back when Murphy was there to now. Great place!!!!

name: Queenmommy Murphy
text: We love everyone at Oak View. They genuinely care about their clients and pets.

name: Lyn Hughes
text: Great people, caring staff! Can’t imagine going elsewhere...

name: Sam Cook
text: First time wellness exam was free and they all enjoyed my dog. Gave me some recommendations for treating his separation anxiety as well.

name: Michael Rowland
text:
We love Dr Robinson
She’s so compassionate and I love that she personally calls to update us on our dog and also check in on our dog to make sure he is ok.

name: Chuck McBryde
text: I didn’t expect to be able to go back with my dog but I did get to and I think that was huge for him.

resp.text: Chuck, we are so happy to hear you had a positive experience with us! We loved meeting you and Cash!

name: Alexandra Smith
text: My big weim boy, Willie Nelson, had to spend a week here while we were in between selling our home and moving to another. Daphne, the kennel manager left a sweet note about Willie's stay and built a feeding system for him with the food we brought. Willie is usually a very inconsistent eater but it seems like he is going to stick to it now. Pricing is always great and fair... especially for the care given. Thank you Daphne and all the wonderful staff!

name: Melissa Paruszkiewicz
text: Dr. Robinson is the best! She always takes time to answer questions, and I don’t feel dumb or like I’m a bother to her.

name: Leigh Morgan
text: Love the staff at oak view! And they love my pups!

name: Jenny McCallum
text: Dr. Early and Julie are so wonderful kind, wonderful and gentle. They are both so welcoming to my dogs.  Julie knows how to make my skittish dog, Jackson, feel comfortable with lots of love and peanut butter! Oak View is so amazing, I am so glad I found them. I always feel heard and never rushed! Thank you for always caring for my fur babies!!

name: marsha bowers
text: I was very grateful that Dr. Whitfield was so patient with my incessant questioning.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. Let us know if there is anything else we can do for Pebbles!

name: Phaedra Galloway
text: Dr Whitfield has cared for our pets for over 20 years. The other doctors and staff I’ve seen at Oak view have been excellent as well.

name: A Google User
text: Love these folks!!! Everyone is so nice and accommodating.  They give full attention to my dog's needs.  Highly recommend!!

name: Cami Velazquez
text: Oak View has been amazing to work with! Our puppy is always able to be seen in a timely manner, and they send helpful emails with reminders about health maintenance. They are always willing to answer all of our many questions and provide excellent care of our puppy! I would highly recommend Oak View to anyone in search of a vet!

name: Johnny Carmack
text: Prompt, professional personal touch.

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave us this review! Thank you for trusting us with CiCi & Cookie's care!

name: Lisa Phipps
text: Staff is always kind. Never had to wait very long to be seen.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us this review! We really appreciate it!

name: Betsy Schmidt
text: I love Oak View! My family has been using them for years.

name: Cody C
text: The docs and staff here genuinely care.

name: Allen Goodwine
text: Whitfield is so caring.  Willing to take time to speak with us on phone.  Then staff so helpful and friendly.

name: Kelly Brennan
text: I brought in a rescue we named Roscoe. The staff we very professional, extremely sweet, but most important, loving and helpful to this amazing pup who unexpectedly made his way into our lives. They went above and beyond what they needed to in order to make sure he is healthy! They answered all my questions thoroughly and took their time, even though we were the last appointment (that we were able to book right before lunch) of the day (on a Monday at that!). They even made him a goody bag with treats, doggy bags, and a toy for him!! Outstanding care. Kudos to this practice!

name: Debra Milton
text: Everyone was terrific, my sheltie warmed up to the Vet and staff (which he NEVER does) immediately that in itself made me comfortable.  Kudos to the groomer she did an awesome job with our sheltie.  Thanks, everyone.  Debra Milton

name: Butch Burbage
text: I am a long time patron of Oak View. I have always received first class service from both doctors and techs every time I’ve been in. I trust them completely with all of our pets. I wholeheartedly recommend you use this facility for all of your pet needs. On this particular visit, they were able to see my dog Izzy right away for a concern I had. Everything turned out great! Thank you so very much for your care and treatment of Izzy.

name: Bruce Bursi
text: Always kind to my super anxious dog and so nice to deal with.

name: Carolyn S Harrison
text: The staff were kind and professional, as was Dr. Early. They all clearly care a great deal for animals. The price was comparable to other animal clinics. This was our first visit, since moving here from Montgomery. I am so thrilled that we have found a good veterinarian were we live now.

name: Jan Bailey
text:
We have been going to Oak View for 10 years at least. Love the staff and Dr.'s, they are all very helpful and caring.
Had dental work done today, several teeth pulled. Dr. called me after procedure and let me know what all they had to do and assured me my Maya was doing well. Love this place.

Jan Bailey

name: John McQueen
text: Exceptionally great group of Veterinarian doctors that really care for your pets!

name: Kim Downs
text: Our first visit was on Wed and I really liked Dr. Early. Even with Covid restrictions, I felt like she took the time to answer all my questions and make suggestions to help me properly care for Shelby!

name: haley arnott
text:
this was my first time coming here with my dog and they were absolutely amazing!! so friendly, not overly priced at all.. my dog absolutely loved it and she came home so happy.
very, very professional.. i’m going to start coming there regularly.
thank you to everyone for taking care of my sweet pup today!

name: Robert Milstead
text: Outstanding Pet Care Family!

name: Thomas Brown
text: Kristen did a fantastic job!  Best haircut Duchess has had in a long time!

name: Cam AP
text: Vets here are friendly, reasonable prices also

name: Anna Strutzenberg
text: They allowed animal control to take a friends dog away by animal control and then be euthanized. She called multiple times per week to check on her fur baby to make sure he was safe. They lied to her throughout those weeks knowing full and well what they had done.

name: Linda Lemoine
text: I was very pleased with my cat grooming experience. My cat is Phoebe and she had an appointment on 08-14.

name: Lorena Juarez
text: I just adopted two Pomeranians and I decided to take them to Oak View Animal Hospital for a check up. I was surprised of how professional they were and I really liked how they explained everything they did. I highly recommend them.

name: Amanda Dinsmore
text: Dr. Robinson feels like part of our family- she certainly takes care of our four-legged babies.

name: Dan Mabie
text:
Oakview is a truly excellent clinic. We've received some of the best medical care imaginable from Dr. Robinson and Dr. Early, as well as all the staff. They helped treat our dog through chemo, and made it a bearable experience for our corgi, but they also gave us all the options and kept us on the right track throughout the whole process, making sure that we were considering the health and happiness of our pet first and not pushing us to any decision.

We drive an extra 30 minutes to go to Oakview and are happy to do it every time.

name: Patrick J Henry
text: We were attended to right away, given medicine for the dog, and as usual, everything went find.

name: Bryant Cline
text: Excellent communication. Great customer service with a smile.

name: ellana lecroy
text: Dr Whitfield and staff ROCKS❤

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us this review! We love getting to see Roxy Tutu!

name: Clif Render
text: We love the staff at Oak View and the care and kindness that they have consistently shown to me and my family members (both the furry ones and the non-furry ones, too)! They've seen us through fostering, adopting, and navigating the painful process of terminal cancer. They've become a part of our extended family and I recommend that you consider making them a part of yours as well.

name: D Thompson
text: My experience with Oak View has not been very good since Dr. Whitfield left.  The techs  are very courteous and helpful but the new young vets lack the experience, knowledge, and compassion that is needed for our furry family members.

name: Nelson Bates
text: Update: The vet techs lied to me. They euthanized our dog without a court order and so much as a phone call. I gained this information from the Manager of the city of pPelham. We boarded our dog with this clinic on June 1, 2020. We are homeless because of covid. My wife has contacted them several times checking on him and discussed services that they offer. We got a coupon via PetSmart and Shelby humane to have him neutered in Irondale. When we went to get our dog the clinic had adopted him out. Instead of being professional and admitting their mistake and helping us to bing our family member home they blamed my wife. They said that they attempted to contact us. They did not. Because we refused the $475 quote does not mean we care any less for our animal. His name is Axle And is a blonde Rot/Lab mix. He had to have been adopted the last 3 days because she had just declined their over priced  neuter service. We went to bring him home today and they said he had been adopted. They hung up on us numerous times and failed to provide any help. We want our dog.

name: Molly Bennett
text: My first experience taking my pet to Oak View was wonderful.  Caring staff, great hours, perfect location.  Dr. Elizabeth Robinson is the best!  I highly recommend them.

name: becky filler
text: Lee is awesome, she works front desk and always tries to help. Dr. Robinson is so great with my Boston terrier Charlie. You can tell he feels loved. He is always happy to go to the vet.

name: Linda Hall
text: I am from out of state and everyone at the office, the receptionist, the vet techs, and the Dr. were so kind and caring towards me and my sick kitty. They were able to get me in on a Saturday morning for which I am so grateful .

name: Noah Mitchell
text: The Dr’s And staff are all amazing and great people and provide great service for your pets. They always take care of any concerns I have and follow up with phone calls after the visit to make sure everything is good.

resp.text: Noah - Thanks for sharing your thoughts about Oak View Animal Hospital.  Glad we are able to provide you peace of mind and give you the answers you need and deserve. We appreciate you recommending us to other pet owners and are thankful for the kind words & feedback.

name: KD Burchfield
text: The staff and docs at Oak View are amazing! They are always so kind, ready to help, and appointments are on time and thorough. They are gentle and understanding with animals, prices are very reasonable too. They have been taking care of my little @chica.lulu for 6 years and now our newest addition, 14yo Nacho. We HIGHLY recommend them!

resp.text: KD - We appreciate you recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other pet owners!  Thanks!

name: Rebecca Davis McClard
text: The entire staff is very kind and professional. You can tell that they love the animals as much as the owners. I am embarressed to say I do not recall the name of the young lady who assisted Dr. Robinson with my kitten Myth, but she was very sweet, very informative, and over all very gentle with Myth (plus I think he liked her and that is always a sign of a good person to me). Dr. Robinson was cheerful, informative, and takes the care of her patients seriously and for that I am very thrilled to have her as the vet for my cats.

resp.text: Rebecca Welcome to our family at Oak View Animal Hospital! Thank you for the feedback & taking the time to share your thoughts. We look forward to being your partners in your cat's health.

name: Heather Ramsey
text: The people at Oak View are wonderful. They have loved and cared for my dog for 7 years almost like he was their own! We have a new puppy and we took her right in for a check up with Dr. Elizabeth, who is wonderful. I had a couple of vets before I moved to this area and they ran the gamut from lazy/didn't care to very expensive/pushy sales, and at Oak View I've experienced none of that. They genuinely care, their prices are reasonable, and they LOVE animals. :) I highly recommend to anyone looking for a new vet.

name: Kimberly Bavali
text: Dr. Price and Dr. Robinson take care of our dogs, Lucy and Cody.  We could not be more pleased with the quality of the treatment they receive. We have complete confidence in their expertise.  Beyond that, we greatly appreciate their kindness, warmth and personal approach.  They are just wonderful!  What a great staff as well!  The whole practice reflects a dedication to their mission.

name: Diann Hendon
text: I've always been pleased with the service they offer. Their kindness and concern for my dog is their greatest asset.  No question goes unanswered.  Also, it's great to get a call checking to see how my dog is doing........proves they care about their patients.  Everyone who works there is friendly and cares about everyone who comes to see them (pets and owners).  I will continue to take my pet there as long as I have a pet.

name: Laurie Howard
text: I love everyone that works here. Julie is my favorite. You all care, y’all are friendly, you love the animals. You don’t make it all about the money. Love you all. Thank you from Laurie, Nik, Charlee, and Cooper.

name: Kim Weaver
text: There was no wait time and I was in and out very quickly. Dr. Robinson is very knowledgeable and very helpful. The receptionist is very nice. The tech was great, and the Hospital Manager Brandy is amazing and very helpful. I wouldn't take my pets anywhere else!

resp.text: Kim - We appreciate you & your pets being part of our family at Oak View Animal Hospital! Thank you for recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other pet owners.

name: Madelyn P
text:
I’ve always had great service here and felt like my pets and even my family was cared for.

Several years back we had a family pet put to sleep here. He was twelve, and it was done in the most respectful, quiet, and dignified way possible. I really appreciated the staff and how genuine and empathetic everyone was.

Now we have two more family pets and I have to come up here with my (almost twin) babies. A technician or the secretary always helps me get my children and pets in and out in one safe trip.

I do not know the name of the technician that my son loves so much, but she is always here during the mornings and picks him up and carries him around and distracts him while I’m talking to the vet and waiting for my turn.

10/10 I’d recommend this vet to anyone

resp.text: Madelyn - THANK YOU! We appreciate you & your pets being part of our family at Oak View Animal Hospital! Thank you for recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other pet owners and for all your kind words about our team.

name: Dana Tapia, Realtor at RE/MAX of Orange Beach
text: A friend of my daughter's had her five pound kitten spayed and two kitty shots and the bill was $452. That is outrageous. I have no knowledge of the level of care but, I do feel that she was taken advantage of. We do lots of rescue work and have never seen charges like this. Lesson learned, never send a kid to a vet clinic like this one with her pet. I hate leaving a bad review but feel like a warning is necessary.

resp.text: Dana - we wish you would contact us directly with your concerns.  Then we could explain what was agreed upon before any services were performed.  Since you are not a client, we realize you do not know us and that Oak View Animal Hospital prides ourselves on treating each client like family and each patient like our own pet.  Our veterinarian spoke with the client about this situation directly and took steps to alleviate her concerns.

name: MR
text: I’ve been using Oak View for 9 years. Drs. Price and Robinson took great care of my dog then, and my dogs since. Dr. Robinson is always very thorough and listens and responds to all my questions. All are helpful and have been compassionate throughout the lives of the three dogs I’ve brought in to Oak View.

resp.text: We appreciate you & your dogs being part of our family for all these years!! Thank you for recommending Oak View Animal Hospital to other Pelham pet owners.  Thanks for sharing your thoughts about Oak View!

name: Laurabi Lace
text: I recently got a puppy and asked my friends and coworkers to recommend a good vet. Everyone I talked to said Oak View is the best. A few had stories of other vets they had used that they were not happy with. They are so sweet to our little girl. We are very happy with them.

resp.text: Welcome to the Oak View Animal Hospital's family! Thank you for allowing us to care for you and your puppy. We are your partner in your pet's health and here to answer any questions or concerns you might have. Appreciate you sharing your thoughts!

name: Monica Moore
text: I have had so many positive experiences with this vet.  The vet personally called several times to check on my fur baby after surgery.  We went in for another issue and the vet personally called to check on her to make sure she was improving as hoped.  Would recommend them to anyone looking for a vet!!  Added plus the front desk lady is super sweet and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you!  Our staff enjoys taking care of Oreo and all of our clients.

name: Mary Jo Sewell
text: The staff and doctors are always so friendly at Oak View.  Anytime one of our pets have had to have surgery, or been hurt, the next day Dr. Robinson will call personally  to check and make sure they are doing okay.  We have never had our animals treated this well.  We love her for the wonderful care she gives our pets. The staff make each and every one of our pets feel like a "rock star!"  I highly recommend this vet!

resp.text: So happy you are part of our family! Thank you for the feedback! We appreciate you recommending us to other pet owners looking for a veterinarian.

name: Natalie
text: The vet here is for real probably the sweetest and kindest PERSON I’ve ever met in my life. She loves animals and is somehow just as nice to humans. I LOVE this place. Even the front desk people are sweet. We’ve been going here for many years now and have never had bad service.

name: Birmingham Chapter
text: I have been using Oak View Animal Hospital for 5 years. They have taken wonderful care of my sweet dog Maggie. The entire staff is incredibly nice. Dr. Price is wonderful. He provided a treatment option for my dog who was having trouble leaking urine when other vets I had been to were unable to help. They will personally call and check-up on your pet if they have been sick or injured. I have been very pleased with the exceptional care they have provided for our family!

name: Lacey Bacchus
text: I recommend Oak View to everyone.  The doctors and staff are personable, caring and friendly and take a genuine interest in your pet's health.  I had used a previous vet in the past and never felt like they remembered me or my dog and never called to follow-up like Oak View does.

name: Booba Byars
text: Could not have been a better experience. All aspects of the results of my needs being met were great! My dog Sully rules and he loves it when I take him to Oak View Animal Hospital. The staff members are tops and I love them all. I am known for telling it like it is - good or bad. I tell you it is GOOD!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!  We love having you & Sully part of the Oak View family!

text: Dr. Robinson is very sweet and caring and she truly cares about your pets well being. Front desk staff are always friendly and helpful. I highly recommend Oak View!

text: Dr. Bradac, Julie, Lee and the rest of the team at Oak View have given my Tebow the best of care for the past 4 years.  Thank you all for your compassion for both my beloved pet and for me.
