text: I received my Wonderful PTSD Service Dog "Birch"  from them...It's funny that people complain that Rover Chase doesn't do what they say they do... I'm sure if you left your K9 there to be trained, they trained it... I'm sure Rover Chase would be happy to post the video of how well your dog was trained. If you took your dog to the puppy classes and complain about it... the problem is you. The dog goes home with you. They are merely their to teach YOU how to train your dog at YOUR house. This failure is on both of you... I have significant time their. I'm in the military and I know what Blow Hards sound like. The issue is ya'll not Rover Chase it's you. Both of you get negative stars for lacking integrity and blaming others. Thank you have a bless day.

name: Jordan Wakefield
text: DO NOT TAKE YOUR DOG HERE!!!! If I could give them negative stars I would. I took my Australian Shepherd here because they said they would help her with her people aggression issues. All they did was put her on medication that literally made her go crazy and she was even worse on the meds than off. And they told me to lock my dog in a room and never let her around anybody. That her best hope was for her to learn to wear a muzzle, that she would ever be able to be around people. When I tried to call for an appointment I never got a call back from them and I called and called for 3 weeks. It's been well over 2 months now and still haven't heard from them. Took my dog to Dale at Just Happy Hounds in Birmingham and she is a new dog. Completely off meds she never needed to be on and her aggression is under control. She absolutely loves 3 of the workers there and runs up to them to be petted. All I needed was someone to actually tell me what to do to help my dog. Not someone that just stuck her on meds so she would be too doped up to do anything. I have heard absolutely awful things about the people that work there from past owners that brought their dogs there. Please don't take your dogs there. They will not help them if they have a major issue that needs to be handled.

name: Pavlov Skinner
text:
As a two year employee of Roverchase, first as a kennel staff member and now as Head Training Intern as a training intern, I am a general witness to the management of the facility and dogs.  I can speak to the unending care this facility provides for your dogs. Our facility is an industry leader in the Southeast. With a low dog per yard Ratio, large staff per dog Ratio, FULL day care and boarding (meaning your dog is playing all day and never gets put up except for a 30 minute lunch and bedtime at 6:30pm if boarding, we have strict adherence to the humane and ethical treatment of animals, dog temperament evaluations to allow access to the facility, and two full time vet techs.  You can trust that roverchase has your dogs safety, happiness, and wellbeing at the top of their list of priorities. The training times, schedules, and criteria are strictly followed, and you will love the experience, knowledge, and end result of our many training options.  I would love to give you a tour anytime and show you the beautiful facility and explain to you all the education and care that goes into the practices and procedures surrounding your dogs each and every day at Roverchase!

-Aidan Nicholas

text: I absolutely love Dr. Tom Harbin! He is the best vet and I actually will drive from Florida to bring my dogs to him if there is anything serious that I can't trust someone else with.  His background is with the excellent Blue Pearl Vet Group, which I am very familiar with, since my dog had to go for specialized treatment in Atlanta.  He is very caring and takes the time to show it and address all your concerns. After surgeries, they actually hold your pet until they are able to wake up and walk around. That made me feel like my pet is important and they care about them and me and it's not just another dog getting surgery or more money in a practice's pocket. I highly recommend him and all the staff I have met there.

text:
(Translated by Google) I wonder if you remember iris? Yesterday, her amniotic fluid broke at about 1:35 pm. We called you around 5:30 pm to find out if her condition is normal. Your doctor is very sure to tell us not to worry. It will be around 1:30 in the evening. It ’s been 12 hours. When I called your doctor again and left a phone number for us, we called for a long time before contacting your doctor, but he still said everything was normal. He only helped to find the contact method of the pet emergency room, but during the two prenatal inspections of iris before, we twice asked you to help us find a contact method for the emergency room. You said that even if there is a problem, you can do it at night Calling you, you also have an emergency room at night, saying that she will have no problems with the second production. Even if there is a problem, you can help me at night. I believe you, because Iris has been here to check with you . But last night when we needed you most, I took a long time to contact you. I also thank you for helping me find the emergency room contact method at the end, but just when we were going to see the emergency department When Iris left us, I always wondered why during the two prenatal check-ups, we asked for an emergency room contact method. You only gave me your outpatient phone number, and I remember I told you that It ’s just that Iris can contact the doctor who can help her when the 1% you said needs the doctor ’s help. You said you can help her even at night, but when Iris needs the doctor ’s help most, where are you , Did you know that because we spent the time to rescue her in the most urgent time, if you can help me find the emergency room contact method, at least Iris still has the hope of survival, and May continue to be with us. Do you know that iris is like our daughter in our hearts? Do you know how helpless we are when we watch iris walk away in front of us? I want to ask you Where is the night emergency? I want to ask if your commitment is really so worth mentioning? Iris just had her two-year-old birthday last month. She is still so young, and the baby in her stomach has a total of 9 lives. Just say that it is gone? ?

text: We took our 3 dogs to Dr. Flowers and he was great with all of them. One of our dogs was very sick and the emergency vets office wanted to charge several thousand dollars to run tests. He was also very available to answer our questions and even was willing to come back from his vacation early to take care of our sick dog during closed hours. name: Jessica Wetherbee
text: I brought a puppy here last Tuesday that was diagnosed with parvo, they sent us home with medication and she still ended up passing away the next day. Then I had my other puppy start showing symptoms and when I called them they told me to go ahead and bring her in and then about three minutes before I arrived they called me and said that the doctor said he was going to be gone all weekend so he was not going to test her for parvo. They gave her a shot for nausea and send her home after telling me that she didn't look like she had parvo. 3 days later she was still sick so I called them back explain the situation and how dire it was that she got hydrated they told me that because she had an appointment the next day to just wait till the following day to bring her, that would have been four days in on not eating or drinking. I am very disappointed in this place I truly thought that they loved animals but they didn't even give my puppy a chance each time I would call them about her they would call me right back and explain why they could not do whatever it was I was asking. I pay in full every time so it's not even like I have a bill there, this used to be the place I referred everyone too but not anymore. I called central Baldwin and they told me bring her in immediately and now she is being well taken care of!!

Rarely do you see someone willing to go the extra mile as she has done. Even though I can't use her services, I would highly recommend everyone to give her a call who needs mobile pet grooming. name: cora watts
text: Top Dog's is an excellent grooming service! Lashawna's the absolute best! Very honest, dependable and isn't just in it for the money! This is a small business so your babies aren't sitting in a kennel around any other animal waiting for their turn,  scared because another animal is going crazy bc it's their first time or they just don't like it.. At Top Dog's your babies are her TOP priority..She absolutely adores and cares for every single fur baby on her clientele. From the first client to the newest, she loves them all!! She takes her time and gives your baby a chance to warm up to her before she starts grooming instead of jumping right to it and doing a rush job! She loves grooming, she makes sure your baby gets the very best care while she has them. Her shop is extremely clean and it's affordable! If you're looking for the perfect grooming business, want someone who is reliable and actually cares for your babies, then look no further, give her a call you won't regret it!!!

resp.text: Thank you for your review Cora Watts.  Every review counts especially the detailed ones.

By far the greatest rates along with all of the amenities. With her you always get more than what you are paying for.

name: Bethany Clements
text: I have boarded my Schnauzers here several times over the years and have always been extremely happy with them!  They truly care for pets, and take the dogs out 5 times a day and they actually play with them (most places are only 3 times a day and the employees playing fetch with your dog would be unheard of lol).  I love this place!!

name: Corrine Steding
text:
I have utilized the services of Paws and Claws, for years for our three dogs, and was always very pleased with the care that they recieved while in the care of Ms. Sandy.
I do realize, that the New Management, following Ms. Sandy, left more than just a little to be desired, but that only speaks volumes to me as to the quality of Ms. Sandy’s work.
It is unparalleled.
Her genuine love for the animals is astounding.
No pun intended, but Sandy works like a dog to take care of the animals entrusted to her, and I know this first hand.
I am so thankful that Ms. Sandy has returned to us, and I would encourage all residents to support her business, by donating any old towels you no longer need, paper towels, laundry products, dog food etc. For anyone who is in aware, Miss Sandy not only runs a kennel for our fur babies, she also runs a rescue for homeless ones as well.
Let’s show her our love, and help her, in any way that we can, to insure that this precious woman is able to carry on her excellent work.
She didn’t just leave paws and claws in the hands of those who were not capable,
she came back to restore quality to her establishment!
So please, let’s all lend our support, and encouragement.
God bless you Ms. Sandy, and thank you for all that you do.

name: Chris Hoover
text: Used them many times over the years. Always had great service and have never once worried about the care my dogs were receiving while they were there. Great staff and amenities..

name: Sarah Bailey
text: I boarded my dog here for three days and came back to find that they did not know where she was. If she didn't have a GPS tracker attached to her collar for me to find her (she has escaped my yard in the past and they were aware that she digs), I would have no idea where she was (across the highway about half a mile up the road). Consider somewhere else to board your pets.

text: Sandy is back! And this place is awesome again. They take excellent care of my fur baby when I must be away.

text: Great place to keep your pets , very reliable. Thanks

text: I would not suggest using this place. My dog stayed there and I had dropped off his own bed to put in his room. When I picked him up they had no idea where any of his stuff was so I just left without it. They also had a lot of young children handling the dogs there and my dog doesn't do well with kids so I was a nervous wreck. It just didn't seem like a professional place. I would try Branchville Animal Hospital across the street.

name: Donna Bowman
text: I worked there and i would never leave my fur baby there..  They don't get took out like the owner says.. The middle wing had no air and she charged all the customers full price and never told them there fur babies wouldn't be in the air conditioning.. Poor business..

name: T Johnson
text:
I picked my dog up yesterday, 6/20/16 from Paws N Claws in Odenville, AL. after a 9 day stay and was told he had the runs. I've been leaving him there almost 8 years and this has never happened before. I had to get up with him in the middle of the night. ***This business has been bought and is under new management!!!  It would have been nice to know this prior to my dog's stay. I drive from B'ham to Odenville because I trusted the former owner and her business. I'm not so sure about these new owners. They never once inquired about whether my dog was up to date with his shots. That's probably one reason he was sick when I picked him up. Who knows if the other dogs are up to date with their shots.  I called at 7:20 am this morning to inquire as to how long my dog was sick before I picked him up. The new owner, Tony, was going to check with his wife and call me back. It's 3:30pm and I have not heard from Tony. I took my pet to the doctor. They are treating him with antibiotics and probiotics. I'm going to be looking for somewhere else to board my pet.

Beware, you have been warned.

Awesome place for doggie daycare, grooming, and overnight kenneling.
Our doodle goes here once per week and it’s his favorite place on earth.
Great rates on day care. Grooming rates competitive w other places and super convenient as he lives to go there.
Nice and friendly staff. Curb side pick up during Covid.
Never had any issues.

text: Their the best and most importantly my picky little dog loves them too!

name: Ruth
text: I just picked up my dog this morning after boarding for 4 nights and a bath.  I moved 30 minutes away and still board him here when I travel.  He always comes back happy and healthy.   He has special needs (he's deaf) and they take good care of him.  They even send photos when I ask them to.  He's not stacked in a cage, either.  Another place I looked at did that and while they charged a little less, I'll gladly pay more (still reasonable) to have him comfortable and happy.  He even enjoys play time (he's not the most social dog either so that says a lot).  I started coming here based on a friend's personal knowledge of the facility and of the owner, and I'm glad I listened.  Blue Sky takes good care of my dog. One final note: I strongly object to the person who gave one star because of their grooming hours.  Really?  That was a mean thing to do.  Their hours are fine and they truly care about the dogs and their reputation.

name: June Bennett
text: We feel very comfortable leaving our two small dogs to board at Blue Sky.  They love playing with the other little dogs and all the personal attention they get from the staff. I'm a nervous 'mommy' but no matter how trivial my concerns might seem,  we always get a prompt and reassuring response....plus they smell so good from their baths they get just before we pick them up. We highly recommend Blue Sky Pet Spa!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words! We love Ziva and Gibbs! They act totally at home during their stays with us. Sweet babies who love us as much as we love them. ❤️🐾

text: The service here is exceptional! They are knowledgeable and patient. I have only been coming for a few months(since aug) and I have not been disappointed! Even when my furbaby was less than “perfect “ they worked with him and ensured all was well with him. I highly recommend this place for all your furbaby’s grooming needs!

name: L Milligan
text: With Blue Sky Pet Spa it's never too late to get your fur baby on a grooming plan. I brought my 4 year old Shih Tzu for his first professional grooming and the staff was phenomenal! He adjusted well and came out looking like a star! No doubt, we are regulars now - I definately recommend Blue Sky Pet Spa, we had the best experience!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words! We enjoyed watching little Shadow become more relaxed with us at the morning progressed. We look forward to his future visits.☺️🐾

name: Alex Maxwell
text: We have been incredibly impressed with Blue Sky Pet Spa. Our golden doodle, Bentley, comes out happy, confident, and I am sometimes dumbfounded with how good he looks compared to when I brought him in. The staff is very professional, kind, and receptive to his particular needs. When we first came in, they educated us (as many doodle owners fail to research) on the necessary grooming needs of the breed. I had been brushing him every 1-2 days before BSPS only to find out that I had been using the wrong brush and wrong techniques. The poor guy used to cower when I got the brush out. Now, with the help of BSPS, he loves getting brushed and we are on a 4-5 week scheduled groom. I know from this fact that they use the utmost care when grooming him. Very thankful to have this place and looking forward to more visits here.

resp.text: Thank you Alex, so much for the kind words, and taking the time to write such a nice review. We very much enjoy having Bentley at the spa. He is a perfect representative of his breed, and a proper gentlemen. We love our doodles, and even more, appreciate the pet parents who take the time to learn about their chosen breed. We are so happy that you found us! We look forward to future visits as well. ☺️🐾

name: Julie Knowles
text: I shared with Janet the special need of my sweet angel that other groomers swore to meet and failed. Janet assured me that my little angel, Lola, would be taken care of based on the needs I had shared with her. Unlike any groomer I have used previously, she made sure that my baby got the specific service I asked for. This means so much to my husband and myself. We have brought her home from "hair appointments" in the past and you could just see how miserable she was. When I brought her home today she pranced around like a princess. Thank you Janet and Blue Sky Pet Spa... you are awesome!!!!!!

resp.text:
Julie,
Thank you so much for the kind words. We enjoyed seeing you and sweet Lola again, as well as Tank, the cutest little dachshund guy!
We look forward to your next visit ☺️🐾❤️

text: They do a nice job on my pup. Waited in line and watched 4 persons in front of me get comments on their dogs behavior but no word on mine. Curious.. PetSmart always said he was a perfect little gentleman.

name: Andrea Kellar
text: I bring my dog here for nail trims; Blue Sky gets 5 stars for that. The service is fast and friendly plus they take walk ins. They're great with my nervous little old guy and the price is so low that I can take him as often as he needs.

name: Sherry Farmer
text: It's not often, 1-2 times a year, but when I go out of town this is where I board my little dog. He's older, nervous, but he's treated special & I can leave town with confidence that he's treated well. I only have to text my dates I will be out of town & I get confirmation of the reservation right away. He's given his own separate area, healthy treats, (I bring his own food). Techs take all the dogs out to potty, even do a late night potty break at 10pm. Everything is included, no extra charge for the potty break. Other places I've called give the dogs 3 breaks & charge for any extra! They will bathe & groom my dog with special products if I ask for a nominal fee. Great place!

resp.text: Sherry, thank you so much for the kind words! We’re so glad that you are happy with our services.  We love to take care of your little guy☺️☺️

They have a nice, clean facility and I recommend it to anyone wanting their dogs to be treated great. I will definitely use her again. She also had a lot of big dogs come in when I visited so I will also take my boxer / pitt mix.

name: Raven Bogart
text: Great experience! I brought in pictures of how I wanted my Shih tzu's (Cora) hair cut. I was nervous to try a new groomer since the mess-up that happened at a previous groomer...chopped off my pups top knot and made it into a puppy cut!). Staff at Blue Sky reassured me and explained options for hair maintenance products for her type of coat. They walked me through the whole facility and showed me all the grooming and boarding areas and met the staff. Everyone was friendly and very helpful! I have already recommended my friends and neighbors in Madison to use Blue Sky Pet Spa, and I have two more appointments already set up for the upcoming weeks! I'm excited to bring my long haired cat to be groomed at Blue Sky Pet Spa soon!

resp.text: This woman is a disgruntled former employee who was with the spa for less than 4 weeks and was let go. She has never been a client. She is stalking us on social media and will be receiving a cease and desist letter from our attorney. We always strive to price our work fairly, and are always ready and willing to explain to actual clients how we arrive at the grooming fee. Please give us a call or message us on FB for a wonderful customer service experience

I recommend Tabby's Pet Salon...they did an excellent job (and they are also cheaper than this place)!!

resp.text:
Hi Joe!
We are sorry that you feel this way! We give a lot of value for what we charge, along with the expert, well trained staff;  we charge very fair pricing to operate in the city of Madison. We do thank you for your input and wish you well as you find someone who better suits your needs ☺️

name: Andrea Corbett
text: I tried them after seeing the billboard on 69 south. They answered, gathered my info and was prompt to call me back to schedule my grooming appointment. Hannah was thorough to go over any concerns, questions, and issues with grooming. She was polite, and took extra time since our pups were timid. AJ got a tie and smelled so good, I even bought the blueberry spray they used. The facility was clean and well taken care of.

name: Susan Hall Cannon
text: I can't say enough about the people at West Alabama Dog Grooming and Hannah they are the most professional service in the general area and I recommend them to everyone around this area of west central Alabama!

resp.text: Thanks for sharing your experience! We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Proloy Deb
text:
There is no other way to express my review other than "The best dog boarding in and around Tuscaloosa". Our fur babies have been to several dog boarding in the past and we have always noticed that they were stressful once they were collected from the boarding. We did not know the reason until after they were kept at the West Alabama Dog Boarding and Grooming. This is probably because of the carelessness toward the dogs at other boarding. However, this is the only place where I saw our babies were genuinely happy. The owners of this place seem to be very loving/caring to all the dogs. Moreover, the owners of this place kept sending pictures of our fur babies every morning which added to our peace of mind while we were away from our babies. Our babies were also very clean and happy when we collected them. Thank you West Alabama Dog Boarding & Grooming, we had our trip to Florida without any worries because of you. We will highly recommend them to anyone looking for a short term or long term boarding.

Cheers,
Proloy and Kerline

resp.text: We’re thrilled to hear you & your fur babies enjoyed your experience with us! We hope to serve you again in the future!

name: Camaron George
text: I was about to book this place until I saw that they do not board pit pulls.  We have a pit bull that is a big ball of love.  I think any business that discriminates against pit bulls, or any other breed for that matter, deserves a terrible review so I felt the need to express that here.

resp.text: We are sorry you were having a bad day, Mr. George, but as anyone who knows us can tell you, we are not the sort of business you are portraying us to be.  We wish all the best for you and your dog.

They are so kind and truly compassionate about working with animals - and it shows! My dogs look great and I can tell they were well taken care of. I have been using the same groomer for 5 years, but I am sold on Pet Spa and Play, from here on out! So glad to have found them! 🐾❤️

This is not a good way to keep or do  business.  I am very disappointed.

text: Ms. Pam does a great job grooming my dog, Drew.  She has boarded him at her state of the art kennel, as well. And if you get your pet groomed, she offers one free night of boarding, if you board within 30 days.  I completely trust her with my pet and know that she takes really good care of him.  He loves her as well.  I recommend her to anyone who wants to take advantage of her love of animals and expert grooming.  She also has a pet sitting service that I plan to take advantage of.

text: I've been using Dirty Dog Saloon for the past 4 years and I Love It!! The quality of her work and just the love and care she shows my dog is rare. Its hard to find a place that grooms and boards your pet and the pet is always glad to see them or wants to go with them. This, to me, confirms that she truly loves and cares for my pet when she is in her care. Dirty Dog is hands down the BEST facility around and I would highly recommend them to ANYONE that truly loves their pet the way I love mine!!

name: F. A. Brown, Sr.
text: Ms. Pam is a Rock Star! She gave our girls, Jacy and Juno the a Royal Custom Cut!. We LoveLoveLove Her! I recommend her to the World!

name: Christal Davis
text: I have been using Pam since 2007 and absolutely love her.  She really cares about each and every pet that comes through her shop. I highly recommend her to anyone.

name: Clarence Bigham
text: I have used Dirty Dog Saloon for many years. I am very happy with the work Pam does. I will use Dirty Dog  as long as I have my two Babies(Dogs). She does GREAT work!!

text: Pam is a true professional passionate about her animals,fair prices kennels are spacious  animals are not in cages. If you love your pet let Pam do the grooming.She also picksup and delivery service for grooming. and offers pet sitting.

text: I'm very unsatisfied with the service I was given. The owner was very short and honestly rude when I explained to her how I wanted my fur baby groomed. She had him from 10am-2pm. He did not smell that great when I picked him up and the worst thing of all she completely butchered his haircut. She left him so uneven it is ridiculous! His haircut basically looks like she cut his fur with her eyes closed!! I would advise everyone to take your fur baby some where else with better customer service and quality!

text: Great job on my dog

text: Dogs were traumatized when they left. You are not allowed to come in the shop, she brings the animals to the fence for you to pick up. It's in her words because of liability but in every grooming shop I've ever been in you go inside. My advise if you can't see where and what conditions your babies will be in just don't do it.

name: Gabriel T
text: I had to go out of town, and couldnt take my dog with me, Pam was very helpful and inmediately connected with my dog, who is a brat. The place was clean and the mood was perfect for my nervous dog. Great place around the Birmingham area to take your pets to!

name: Ed Jennings
text: Took my Yorkie and my Sheltie to Pam two weeks ago. Asked her to only trim paws, ears and butt on my Sheltie.  She trimmed the whole coat!  My Yorkie was basically untouched,  except for her back and her anal area was badly bruised and skinned with deep cuts from the clippers. She still has black bruises and large scabs.  I'm so angry, I haven't decided what to do.  My husband has taken my furbabies in the past to Pam, but I went with him this time.  The yard was nasty and smelled of feces. I would advise no one to go to her shop!

name: Barbara Hicks
text:
I have been having my Bichon Frise groomed with Pam Drexler since April 2014.
I had a bad experience with my former groomer and lost my long time groomer to marriage and moving far away.  I met Pam in Pet Smart and she was so friendly, so when I needed a groomer I called her.  She has been grooming Casper ever since.  She is a very caring, loving groomer to all dogs.   Bichon's are very tedious to shape, blow out and make fluffy. Casper loves his bath and Spa day.  An excellent caring place to take care of your four legged children.

name: Krystal Hallford
text: The groomer is super sweet, I forgot to ask when I talked to her on the phone to give my dog a bath, and when I got there she had no problem doing it. I really appreciated the fact that she allowed me to stay with her while she was grooming my doggo. While I was with her, she explained what each product did. I highly recommend her for your fur baby. I will being going back monthly, and I will not use any other groomer. What is even better, she is 100% affordable.

name: Don Adams
text: great job Ms. Courtney does outstanding work

name: Jim R.
text: I just love Courtney, and she loves the dogs.

name: Stacey Hunold
text: She is the best around

name: Lisa Hill
text: Love her

name: Jeff Williams
text: We were on vacation at Lake Martin and had an emergency with our pup. Dr Mary and the entire staff were professional, caring, and empathetic to our needs, and they helped our little guy feel better in no time. It was reassuring to find great care even though we were so far from home. Highly recommend Kowaliga Whole Health Pet Care.

name: Traci Bray
text: Recently relocated from Missouri to Alabama with three cats in-tow. We sought an integrative practice, and found a fabulous vet in Dr. Mary Battistella. She and staff are caring, responsive and thorough. I must say that with two of the cats prior to coming to Kowaliga, although they had experienced routine vet care, issues had not received the proper diagnosis - Dr. Battistella not only addressed those but came up with simple solutions resulting in healthier, happier cats. We travel up from Montgomery, and the services and care are well-worth the drive.

name: Mary Dunn
text: The staff is so nice and friendly! We were worried that our 4 month old puppy would be scared to death, but he loved it. We were there for 1day daycare. Will certainly be going back!

name: Debbie Dunaway
text: Everyone is very nice and professional. My pup wanted to go back inside when I got him back. They never are apprehensive about seeing Dr. B.

name: Nani Borgesen
text: Dr. B and her staff are so professional and caring! They took care of my dog who normally hates going to the vet but when I dropped her off, she was completely comfortable. Dr. B is also one of very few vets who perform ovary-sparing spays in that general vicinity. I couldn’t recommend Kowaliga enough!

name: John Walker John
text: Gentle and caring with my pet, fees reasonable.  Respectful of appointment time..

name: Stephanie Kelley
text: I love the care that Willow and Holly get there!  And the place is always so clean which can't be said for most vets!  Dr B and the staff are always friendly,  caring and helpful!!

name: Kathy Gunn
text: Love Dr. Mary Battistella (and staff)!  Found her at a very sad and scary time right after the cancer diagnosis of my dog.  She is very knowledgeable and caring, and I'm so grateful I found her at such a very critical time.  After I chose not to do chemotherapy, but rather a more holistic/natural approach, my dog has done exceptionally well and has had a good quality of life under her direction and care, and she is still doing very well two years later!  I'm so very thankful for "Dr. B" and her staff!  Highly recommend!

name: Mike
text: My pets have been patients at Kowaliga Pet Care for five years.  The employees there are attentive, thorough and caring.  Doctor Mary Battistella has specialized knowledge in holistic healing, nutrition and medical practices.  She is very receptive and accommodating to the individual needs of customers and their animals and has unique training and experience to offer solutions beyond traditional veterinary practices and medicine.  There is also a large play room for animals who stay overnight.

name: Daniel Scruggs
text: I had an Emergency situation with my dog being ran over. After being turned down by another vet, these folks took my dog in and did what they could. They were very friendly, compassionate, and professional.

name: Paige Patterson
text: Dr MARY B has a successful practice because she practices from the Heart! Exactly what you want from your vet!

text: I was so pleased by the clinic! I called to ask about some symptoms my dog was having and they were able to see him right away. Within 20 minutes they had diagnosed him and prescribed medicine and I am so happy to say he is doing significantly better! The team were very friendly and professional yet you could see their compassion for animals. I am happy we chose them as our service provider!

text:
I took my pupdog Angel there. Found out she's allergic to fleas. EVEEYBODY that helped me and Angel were amazing. Super friendly and understanding. When I went there my pupdog had chewed all the fur off her butt and back and everywhere. Maybe 3 weeks after the visit my pupdog looks WAYYYY more healthy!! Thank you everyone there! God bless y'all!

P.s I MEAN LOOK AT THIS SMILING PUPDOG AND TELL ME SHE DOESN'T FEEL BETTER! HAHAHA

name: Jessica Sears
text: I took my 14 year old dog to Helena Vet and I gotta say I have never met a better team. Janet came in greeted us and immediately loved on my baby. She was so personable and caring! She spoke to me like a person and not just another number. She truly cared for my baby. I will definitely recommend Helena Vet to all of my friends from now on!!!

name: Rhonda Syphurs
text: Everyone was great! Very friendly  staff.  Loved Dr Barnette.  She went out of her way to explain every aspect of care and treatment. Office atmosphere was very cheerful and helpful. Prices were fair. Good location. Will be back!

name: Marsha Graham
text: Helena Vet Clinic has been taking care of my dog, Lola, for many years. I am very pleased with their service. They are professional and caring. Everything I need to know about my dog’s health is carefully explained to me. I highly recommend them for your pet care needs. Both vets are very knowledgeable and caring. Everyone in the office is so nice and very helpful from the front office to the groomer to the vet techs. My dog and I have had nothing but excellent experiences and wonderful care from Helena Vet Clinic. ❤️

name: Liz Jarrell
text: I moved here from Kentucky I have 12 year old lab name Lukey they were so great with him and me. They explain everything with you and you have questions they are there to help. The staff and doctors are wonderful and friendly they me welcome and like they knew me all our lives. Now my little ole man has cancer and they have been wonderful if I have question or concerns after hours they would respond. Luke and I so blessed for have them in our lives.i highly recommend the staff and doctors. We love you all.

name: Zac Reed
text: I’ve had my golden doodle puppy Mosby in there for his 3rd and 4th rounds of shots and it has been a great experience. Efficient, friendly, helpful, and affordable.

name: Alexa Hargreave
text:
We absolutely LOVE Helena Vet Clinic. Our young cats have had several visits in the last year. Two of the visits were for serious issues. We have only had Dr. Stephens as our doctor the times we've been there. Dr. Stephens is incredible.
How he communicates, and truly loves our babies is priceless. Also, very professional and informative. Reception is always very kind, and patient. These folks truly love our fur babies.

name: Danielle Langdon
text: They have been great both times I have taken my pittie in.  Janet gets us right in on the days I request. They will take great care of your babies. Highly recommend.

name: Susann McWhorter
text: Doctors and staff are TRULY animal lovers! Each person shows compassionate patience with my dog. All are very professional and pleasant! Have used this clinic for years and wouldn’t consider any other!

name: Jenna
text:
Wow! I came here for the first time today with my senior dog. We decided to change vets since we moved to the area. The receptionist, vet tech, and vet were WONDERFUL. I have never been to a place where they showed this much care, patience, and attention to my pet.
The staff is young, but don't let that throw you off. Your fur baby will be very much cared for here. I will absolutely be making this my go-to place.

name: Allison Dunbar
text: The staff was amazing! My dog was injured by another dog and needed to have her jaw wired back together as well at stitches and other treatment. Janet kept me informed throughout the whole process and I rested well knowing Dixie was in good hands! They got her fixed up and she is back home resting well.

name: Anna Jacobs
text: The doctors here are really knowledgeable and caring. It’s obvious they are passionate about taking care of patients. I never feel like I’m being overcharged, and I feel safe bringing my pets here. The reception staff is always incredibly friendly! I think it’s amazing the steps they’re taking to keep themselves and the general public safe by abiding by COVID—19 restrictions and keeping it to curbside service only. Thank you so much for all you guys do!

name: Chad 395
text: Best experience I’ve had at a vet clinic. Making an appointment was quick and easy. The staff was extremely kind and ensured all of my questions and were answered and my pup’s visit was explained thoroughly. Dr Allison was great. Very happy I chose this clinic for my new puppy!

name: MichelleJosesph Booth
text: They called me Scott for some reason I think they have me mixed up with somebody else! My name is Joseph and they did a great job with Saban  our dog. Pretty sure they’re going to remain our vet. The vet was very personable and professional and told us everything she did.

name: Deanna Chandler
text: Dr. Barrett is fantastic! She was super tentative and was extremely thorough. She answered all my questions happily

name: April Mason
text: I have been taking all my fur babies to Helena Vet. Clinic for a good long while.  They treat me and my babies like we are one of their families.  I can't say enough about this place.

name: dustin Norris
text: I have used this clinic for over 20 years and always been extremely pleased with my service and care...to me and my pets. Excellent place to take your fur babies and Excellent people taking care of them.

name: Angel Gilly
text: Polite, professional, knowledgeable, and caring staff provided excellent treatment for my cat Archie Waffles while calming me and thoroughly explaining what was happening and what could and should happen in the future. Highly recommend.

name: Tracey Bowen
text: I brought two of my dogs for nail trims and check a hot spot on the tail of my other dog. The doctors and techs are wonderful! However my one dog, avalanche, had two toes that were bleeding from his nail trim. I’m hoping the medicine I was given for my other dog, Keelin, for her alopecia works for her tail.

name: Marc and Karen Werner
text: We have boarded both of our dogs and most recently had them groomed and their semi annual check ups. 1 of our 2 cats that we rescued was showing symptoms of what we thought was allergies, but turned out to be a virus that was quickly found and treated within only a few minutes. The vet called us and explained everything in detail and answered all the questions that we had about treatment of both cats (since they were rescued together). Pricing is extremely fair and the staff is great!

name: Misty Doles-Busic
text: Very happy to find a veterinarian near our home in Helena that is professional, responsive, and good with our fur babies.

name: Kevin Stober
text: All the people at Helena Veterinary Clinic are professional, friendly, and caring about animals. It's very easy to get an appointment and their hours make it possible to drop off and pick up even if you have a busy work schedule. Their prices are very fair for the quality of service for your pet. They are my go to place for my dog (Coco)!

name: Amanda Counts
text: We changed vets after over 25 years and came to Helena Vet. The office manager helped me with getting out 3 dogs records from our previous vet and arranged our pets visits. During the vet visit the Doctor was on the phone with me the entire time (during COVID) - explained everything including the cost for each test and medication. She answered all of my questions honestly and was great to explain everything. My dog suffers from allergies and previously we were not taken very seriously and told to give large doses of Benadryl even though I explained that does not work for her anymore- it never really did. The most vital part was that she helped me with a treatment plan for my dog. At the end of the visit #1 I was not surprised by the bill- she discussed all that with me as we spoke and #2 I knew the all of the next steps. That was a big deal because where we were before I never had a treatment plan and basically we started over every time we came in. The next day Lucy’s skin was not red, hot, and irritated, she wasn’t chewing on her paws and shaking her head, she wasn’t panting and stressing her and everyone around her out. she was relaxed and calm, and sleeping so peacefully- that hasn’t happened in 8 years for her. The doctor even called me back to go over all of her blood work results. I have never been more impressed with a veterinarian clinic. I am actually a little embarrassed that I continued taking my dogs to the previous vet all these years- had I known the level of service that we were missing and the expertise these doctors offer in comparison to what we had grown accustomed to, I would have moved them many years ago. I look forward to many years of quality care for my dogs.

name: Kay Guess
text: Dr. Barnett and the staff at Helena Veterinary Clinic are always so easy to work with and have such compassion for the animals they care for. They explain everything fully, and you leave knowing exactly how to take care of your pet when you get home. Very thankful to have them in Helena!

name: Samuel Monte
text: My dogs always enjoy the visit and so do I. Doctors and staff do a great job.

resp.text: Thanks for sharing your thoughts! We value your feedback & recommendation to other pet owners.

text: The entire staff is extremely professional and caring. My dog loves going there and I highly recommend them.

name: Samuel Monte

text: The veterinarian is always very professional and always lets me know any details about my pets visits. The staff there are super kind, would highly recommend others to go to this veterinarian.

name: Kala Bradford
text: We have been taking our sweet fur baby Marlin to this clinic since we got him earlier this year. He's a mischievous little kitten and had to have major surgery this past Friday. I could not be more thankful for this clinic and its amazing, caring and professional staff. I would recommend them to anyone who is looking for a vet for their sweet fur baby. They took care of our Marlin like their own, made sure to keep us updated through the whole process, gave us specific directions for his aftercare and he is now at home healing nicely. We are SO THANKFUL for Helena Vet Clinic and its staff for being so wonderful through this process. You can tell they are all dedicated to making sure all the fur babies are well taken care of!

name: Kelly Benton
text: Everyone was very kind! Doctor Stephens was also very patient with all of my questions and very specific and detailed when he gave me information. I am a new dog owner and had a lot of questions I needed answered for my Doodle Puppy! I also very much like that they will communicate with me via Text Message about whatever I need! Love this place!

name: Chris Parton
text: This is a great clinic! The docs and staff are caring and patient. They have done a great job of adapting to the times during Covid.  Highly recommend!

name: Ashlee Elliott
text: Helena Vet Clinic is above the rest. They have cared for our best buddy since he was 8 weeks old. He is now 7 and has a tremendous amount of allergy issues. They have always been very responsive to his issues, even referring him to a speciality vet when they knew he needed specialized skin treatment. To me that speaks volumes of their professionalism. Dr. Stephens and Dr. Barrett are amazing, as well as Erin and Janet. These are the staff members we interact with most, but every single person we’ve ever encountered there has been like family! We can’t thank them enough for everything they’ve done for caring and treating our Apollo!

name: Donna Robison
text: Very friendly staff, Truly love animals and they take time to make sure every detail is handled.  Available  when you need them.  Definitely would recommend .

name: Jennifer Mamucud
text: Love Helena Vet. They know your pet is family and treat them as such. Very honest and upfront but also compassionate with the bad news.

name: Jennifer Castillo
text: Everyone at Helena Veterinary Clinic was helpful and friendly. They treated Luka as if he was their own. It meant a lot when Christy reached out to ask how Luka was doing after our visit.

name: Donna Robison
text: Very friendly staff, Truly love animals and they take time to make sure every detail is handled.  Available  when you need them.  Definitely would recommend .

name: Stacey Simpson
text: Everyone at Helena Veterinary has just been the best.  We have lived here going on 6 years and have had 5 different pets (4 dogs and a cat) under their care.  Sadly, 2 of our dogs have passed on, but the folks at Helena Vet kept them healthy and happy for as long as possible. Drs. Barnett and Stephens always answer all of our questions, and I've known Karen for as long as we've been using Helena Vet.  She is just so patient and kind and helpful, no matter what is going on.  Janet also has a real heart for animal care and has patiently answered my recent questions about my sweet older dog.  And talk about responsive, they will work with you in any way they can for appointments, medication, whatever the need is. Always return calls. Just can't say enough good things about all of these folks!

name: Joyce Peterson
text: Always a great experience at Helena Vet.  Treat Max like he’s their baby also.

name: Alex Pierce
text: My dog had been attacked.  I pulled into their parking lot. I had no idea they were closed for lunch. They took my dog and saved her!  They managed to keep me updated on every issue.  I can not recommend this practice enough!

name: K Hardy
text: Love Helena Ver! I’ve used them for 20 years! They have always taken great care of my fur babies!! Highly recommend!!

name: Jalie Edmonds
text: Great service, friendly, and take good care of our dog!

name: Rebecca Cannon
text: Dr. Barnett & her team are extremely kind and thoru. They have our girls best interest at heart. Dr. B gave me her time to explain our dogs condition & what the best route to take. Rose, the vet tech, was extremely friendly & clearly loves animals. Even with a mask on, you can tell she was smiling. We will use them again!

name: Pam Malone
text: We are new to Helena. They saw my baby as a work- in, diagnosed her with collapsing trachea and gave me options. She (Theia) is on meds and doing so much better and she’s family to me. I won’t go anywhere else!

text: My dog wasn’t dying. He got his annual checkups and still isn’t dying. 10/10

text: First visit with my 7 week old puppy. I was very impressed with the staff. They did a very thorough check on her. They were very friendly and excited to help her. Dr Stephens was very knowledgeable with any question I had about raising a puppy. I have only ever had adult dogs. Thank you so much for all of your help! Can't wait to bring my big baby in next!

name: Arif Patel
text:
The nicest of people work there. It seems like they really like their jobs!
Dr. stevens (maybe stephens) was v helpful and gave great advice with non inexpensive recommendations for our puppies health.

For covid: You call if you have when you get there if you have an appointment.

name: Debbie Weissman
text: We like the availability of the vets on Saturday morning due to our work schedule.

name: Ethan Johnson
text:
I honestly could not imagine taking my baby anywhere else. I moved about an hour away and refuse to go anywhere else.  Any time we need something, they are so quick to respond or get us in.

Both Dr. Stephens and Dr. Barnett always know what my pup needs and they get her fixed up! The whole staff from Janet to Karen and too many more to name, they are the literal best!!

name: shaton green
text: I’ve been to Dr. Barnett twice so far to check on my cat who likes to overgroom and rip open healed wounds. She is always so clear on the best treatment for him and though I don’t like taking him to the vet I know he’s in good hands with her. I recommend Dr. Barnett to anyone in need of a doctor for their fur baby.

name: Debbie Turpin
text: Very prompt on time. Very friendly.  Staff were extremely informative and 8nderstanding.

name: Kelsey
text: I took my pet for his first visit during COVID times. They had drive up service. Registration was easy enough. Sadly, it meant no interaction with the vet. Our previous vet retired and we loved him dearly. The kind of vet that grew up on a farm and loves animals is what I've struggled to find since. I couldn't tell you the vet's name here. My pup was fine when returned to me and is up to date on vaccines so I suppose it's okay.

name: Nathaniel Billings
text: The clinic manager was excellent! Dr. Stephens took so much good care of our little fur baby. I’m happy to drive from Hoover to Helena for Dr. Stephens and his clinic!!!

name: Eric Velez Ruiz
text: I don't even know where to begin explaining how amazing HVC was with our baby. Our poor baby was injured pretty badly requiring oral surgery and a lot of TLC. The staff at HVC was very friendly and so helpful! They took excellent care of our baby Chief and were in contact with us during the entire process making sure we were always in the know and making sure we were able to afford our Pups care. I couldn't be more grateful for having the opportunity to work with such an amazing caring staff from the Hospital Manager Janet being so kind and transparent with us to Dr. Stephens dedicating his after hours time and personally calling us after the surgery to let us know how Chief was doing. Needless to say I would recommend HVC for anyone seeking any care for their beloved pets. I am forever grateful for this Clinic and I can guarantee you it is where my Family and I will be seeking out our pet care!

name: Jordan Singley
text: I had the best experience at Helena Vet. It was my first visit and they were able to work me in that day for our sick kitten. The whole staff was so sweet and compassionate. With all the COVID restrictions, only curbside services were available but the staff did an amazing job relaying information to me with multiple phone calls updating me while I was waiting.

**** I’m editing this as of 4/23/20! Best decision ever for our fur-babies! We are new to the clinic and they treated us and our kitten like we had been with them for many years. The staff is kind, educated, and pays attention to their customers! I was very impressed with the cleanliness of the clinic and I like that I saw requirements for their clinic internally- such as “flea free clinic!”  The time spent with my kitten after eye surgery made a big deal to me because they were their for us before, during, and after the surgery. Their knowledge in this career is outstanding and I will always go with whatever recommendations they have for our fur family! Would highly recommend! Thanks to the team for becoming a part of our fur family!!!

name: Tyler Elsberry
text: Everyone was so friendly from the moment we stepped into the office until we left!! As a new pet owner, it really gave me reassurance that my pet will be in great hands. This will be my new permanent vet clinic and I will refer everyone I know around the area!

name: J. Terry McCombs
text: The best doctors and staff.  Wouldn't go anywhere else.

name: Heather Nelson
text: Dr. Stevens helped me when it was time to let my family dog go over the rainbow bridge. They came outside and carried him inside because he legs couldn't work and I couldn't carry him by myself. Thank you so much to the whole staff for helping and loving Luke.

text: Our first visit was great. Dr. Wes was very realistic & also has a teacher way about him, really informing us of the issues & potential remedies for our dog's skin / scratching / licking. We will happily go back!

We have been thru joy and hard loss with this team, and they have been nothing short of family.   You will never regret making Helena Vet Clinic your vet of choice.

text: Staff was super helpful and professional. I was in and out. My two girls are doing a whole lot better and I'm extremely thankful for their expertise!

Update: 2/15/21
Dr Stephen’s and his staff hit it out of the park again. They have been taking care of our newest fur baby, Asher. They are so excited to see him when he comes in and he loves them as well. He got neutered today. They called twice, keeping me updated and loved on him like their own. You couldn’t ask for better!! Highly recommend!!

text: Saw Dr. Stephens yesterday he was very helpful with my older cat sassy we were on the same page with her care couldn't ask for anyone to be more kind an nice Tk's again...

name: Kayla Abrams
text:
Absolutely LOVE!! 🤗😻
Dr. Wes Stephens is beyond amazing. 😸
He looks at his fur patients as if they were his very own pets. He does everything he can and does not do like most and automatically say, "put the 😐 animal down" 😔 NO, he is about helping the animals and making sure that they are able to live a long happy healthy life! 🤗 He explains everything at an easy way to understand. He takes one day at a time with them, meaning he doesn't throw everything out all at once; he tries to make sure the animals are very comfortable and at ease. He's a great doctor and I am very confident & very happy to say that he is the best Veterinary Doctor that I have ever EVER dealt with. And I am extremely comfortable leaving my fur kids in his care. I trust all his work and his intentions and opinions. 💯

Dr. Wes Stephens helped to save my fur kid's life and I couldn't be more blessed for Dr. Stephens & his work. He knows exactly what he is doing & what is best for these babies. He will not steer you wrong & he is also very very blunt, meaning, he's not gonna lie to you just because it's something he knows you don't wanna hear. He's gonna tell you rather you like the news or not because your fur babies lives are in his hands and he wants them to be able live long happy healthy lives so he has no choice But to be truthfully blunt. I would rather be faced with the bad news and my fur kid receive the help he/she needs than to be Lord lied to about his/her situation and than my baby die or become worse..

Dr. Wes Stephens is the way to go!

name: Anna Davis
text:
Helena Veterinary Clinic goes above and beyond to make the experience as peaceful as possible for both the animals and their owners!

I've always felt like vets may love the animals but ignore the people. In fact, I've often felt patronized for asking questions about process, time, and money. But Helena Vet Clinic has never made me feel this way, and I'm so grateful for the service both to me and to my animals!

I have two cats and a dog, and all visits have been above expectations! One of my cats is very temperamental, and their focus the entire time was her safety. They perfectly balanced that with easing my anxiety and giving me plenty of information about making the experience better in the future. Dr. Stephen's was especially attentive, and you can tell how much he loves animals and cares about his clients.

name: JessicaS
text: These people are amazing! Right when you walk in your welcomed in by their office cat and friendly staff. They have been takimg such care of our elderly dog for several years now. When he started to gain and lose weight we were afraid we would lose him. Their vet knew right away what to check for and right after got him on a thyroid pill and a medication for his cushings disease. This vet has gone above and beyond for us. We travel alot and they are able to send the rx to the pharmacy wherever we go. We have even recieved follow up phone calls and they have filled out travel documents needed for our pets. We love this place and feel they love our babies like their own.

name: Dave Tucson
text: Did a great job. Friendly staff and nice atmosphere. Next time I travel will board my cat there without hesitation.

🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟

text: They are awesome! Beauty is a frequent guest!

name: Brittany Brown
text: I love love love this vet. the doctor got on the floor and played with my dog and was so personal with her. I have never seen that in my life from a vet; I loved how all the staff members were playing with her in the other room. I could tell by hearing people call her name and one guy was supposedly wrestling around with her. The staff members are passionate about their job and my animal. This was my first visit to this vet and I fell in love. I am moving to Jacksonville Florida and the doctor knows some doctors down there, she took my number down to call me on the names of vets I could go to. I wish I would have found this clinic earlier, not right before I was moving. If you care about your animals like a child i HIGHLY recommend Helena veterinary clinic.

name: Larry Myers
text: One of the very best. I think that my dog may prefer them over me some days.

resp.text: So happy you are part of our family! Thank you for the feedback! We appreciate you recommending us to other pet owners looking for a veterinarian.

text: Great value and Sunday pick up

name: Susan B
text: Great service and they didn't mind that the kids tagged along..

resp.text: Susan - Thanks for recommending Helena Veterinary Clinic to other pet owners! We really appreciate it!

name: Devon Bissot
text:
This weekend I brought in a 1-year-old weim mix for a simple nail trimming. They brought it to my attention that he was not being cooperative and would need to be sedated. We passed on this at the moment to discuss the $150 fee they were asking.

They did let me know they were able to get his back paws trimmed. Upon returning home, we found that they completely broke one of our dog's back nails. Not just broke, but practically tore it out of the nail bed. It's sitting 90 degrees from where it's supposed to be.

It doesn't take a genius to think this through...if this was the first nail they tried to cut...then of course he acted out the rest of the time. He was hurt!

If it was the last nail they tried to cut and he had been acting so bad to begin with, why didn't they stop?

And...you're telling me you didn't know you hurt him that badly??? How can this happen and you not see it?

Today, he is at another vet who was able to examine him without any sort of sedation. The nail that was injured by Helena Veterinary Clinic will now cost me $200 to fix.

Helena Veterinary Clinic's response to this...it's my fault. I should have practiced with him daily to get him used to having his nails trimmed. The most ignorant comment ever made.

name: Laura Sparks
text: Dr. P was great! Super friendly staff.

resp.text: We appreciate you sharing your thoughts - thank you!

name: Josh Noyes
text: Great staff and excellent vet. Very loving toward animals.

name: Jamie Daniels
text: Great vet !  Awesome staff!  Love the groomer !

resp.text: Jamie Thank you to you & your pets for being part of Helena Veterinary Clinic!  We appreciate that you are sharing your thoughts about Helena Veterinary Clinic.  Thank you for the feedback!

name: Kacey Hydrick
text: You can tell a lot about the character of the doctors and the people who work in an office by the way they react to an emergency situation. We had an emergency with our elderly dog today and when we called the office, they were not compassionate and seemed bothered by the fact we were having an emergency. I don't expect anyone to stop everything when something happens to one of my animals but when an animal is very old and becomes short of breath and semi responsive, you'd at least think the vet office that you call would at least sound like they care even if they don't. In a brief phone call, it was obvious that the person who answered was not concerned, sympathetic, or compassionate. Luckily, there is another office that we were able to contact, be seen, and send our sweet angel to Heaven within an hour. She was almost gone when we called your office and were told you could see us in about 2 hours like it was just some routine vet visit. I hope that the next time an emergency happens and someone needs help from you in an emergency situation that you'll at least pretend to care even if you don't.

name: Rod Riv
text: Ask around. The neighbors tell us that this clinic refused to issue paper prescriptions in order to force you into using their online pharmacy so they can get a kickback. They wouldn't give me a paper prescription either. Their bitter front desk attendent Debra hates men and tosses around the word liar on a whim. Call three times to set up an appt, and they will clip the nails and claim you never asked to see the vet, but charge for boarding. Will run an exhaustive list of tests and generate a 2000.00 balance when those tests are not justified by the prognosis or diagnosis. Other vets claim they can't follow the thought pattern and charts were poorly documented suggesting tests were run to make use of expensive equipment for a return on investment. The crates are kept behind closed doors because the conditions are terrible. They over-medicated my dog by giving her a 3 year shot twice just so they could charge for it. You'll notice Debra pushing those heavily. Same as companion... Same vets...same staff... Stay away. Be warned or you are sure to experience one of these terrible experiences. All this in just two visits.

text: We are so thankful for your kind, considerate treatment of our old cat Baghera. He was so distraught over having to leave the house, but we desperately needed to have grooming done for his coat and claws before it developed into a life threatening situation. I SWEAR - by the time VIP GROOMING was done with him (in less than 10 minutes by the way), I think old Baggy was wanting to schedule his next cross-town visit! He didn't even cry on the way home! Your staff was wonderful and your experience was evident. We thank you for taking care of our old boy so well - and, even more so (if that's possible), putting us at ease. Baghera is like a new old cat! God bless you all!

My poor boy looks awful with what they did. They shaved him COMPLETELY and cut up hair on his face all wrong. One side is long and the other is completely cut up. I wouldn’t go here again or refer this place to anyone. I’m really sad and upset.

text: The worst grooming of my Yorkie that I have ever encountered!!!! It is definitely not "VIP". My poor puppy had an uneven cut and his head looked the worst. It was as if they didn't even know how to cut a Yorkie a hair. He came back shaved. He literally looks like a little mole rat. His stomach still has dirt on him as if he was not even bathed properly!!!! Definitely not worth the expensive $55. I will never take him here again. I feel so bad that I let my poor pup go here.

Not only do I have clientele experience, having worked there in years prior, I also have behind the scenes experience. No one loves dogs and cats more than these guys. They do a great job on my mom's dogs and they bathe my huge dog who has skin allergies! She always feels such relief after a medicated bath!

text: My dogs have been groomed and boarded at VIP for more than 10 years.  My baby dog prances right to the door and waits to go inside, and he is always "proud" of his new haircut when I pick him up.    Happy dog, happy owner!

text: I wish there were 6 stars to give.  After years of terrible to mediocre grooming experiences, we finally found a place that does a phenomenal job with our Goldendoodle at VIP.  We dropped our dog off looking like a mess and picked him up looking amazing. We finally found our new groomers!

name: L Taylor
text: The second time I brought my incredibly sweet, obedient goldendoodle to VIP, she was terrified to go in. I had to basically push her into the back, which I thought was maybe because there are about 10 cats right when you walk in the door. When I came to pick her up, she was overjoyed to see me, which is normal, so I paid and left. After getting my dog in the car, she was acting so weird and pitiful. I went back to ask if they had any issues with her and they assured me that she was one of the most behaved doodles they’ve worked with. Sadly, my dog has been acting weird for over a week and I just discovered that the groomer completely butchered her paws. The nails are cut WAY too short (into her flesh) and she has severe razor burn in between the pads of her paws, which she licks at constantly. After reading the reviews, I completely believe that my poor dog was mistreated and I will never bring her near that place again. Keep your sweet babies away from these people!!

text: I brought my dog in for daycare a couple of weeks ago and he was still full of energy and reeked of urine after getting him home that afternoon. Clearly they are not running these dogs hard enough or making them sit in kennels all day long. He was so thirsty when he got home too. Drank the entire bowl of water only to throw it all up a few minutes later. Very disappointed in my experience here and will not be back again.

name: Chuck Hester
text: When our pet (Annie) was hit by a car on Saturday afternoon I called your office on Chantilly after business hours and was connected to an emergency number. After explaining the situation to the young man, he took my contact information and said I would be contacted as soon as possible. Within minutes I received a call from your technician who told me to bring Annie to your hospital ASAP. When we arrived at your offices, we were met by three techs and a doctor who started examining and treating her immediately. All of you staff were professional, proficient, and above all else, caring. I would especially recognize Dr. Jane Sead for the care she is providing Annie in an effort to save her front leg which was severely damaged by the accident. Dr. Snead is very calming and appears to really care about her patients. We've found ourselves a new vet for all our pets!  Thanks to the Goodwin Animal Hospital staff for treating Annie and us so well.

name: Juan Marquez
text: Love this place ...... Great Staff.... My ferret was sick and no other vets would see him without a appointment.... I called Goodwin and they gave me an appointment to see him right away.... Doctors and staff really cares.... THANKS!!!

name: Patricia Allen
text: They are very good at what they do.

name: Jessica Adams
text: If I could give them zero stars I would. I trusted Goodwin with my dog over Memorial Day weekend I was told he was up to date on all his shots by Brittany. When I arrived the receptionist Heather told me that he needed an annual shot and that my total would be $134.00. So I told her okay even though Brittany told me he didn't need any shots. I would just have to pay to board my dog for the weekend. When I go to pick my dog up he has fleas! Also my bill was $200 not $134.00. I asked the older Caucasian Veterinarian that greeted me by the wrong last name why two of employees Brittany and Heather gave me the wrong information he didn't care. He told me my dog needed all the things I was charged. Like it was my fault not the employees. I had to tell him what happened twice so that let me know he wasn't listening or paying attention. To sum it up DO NOT TRUST THIS VET THEY ONLY CARE ABOUT $$$$ and the employees don't know how to do their job.

name: JTF “Ty”
text: We were in a position where our vet had moved to a location that was not convenient for us and we had been shopping around for recommendations. Having known Dr. Goodwin through community activities along with his reputation and recommendations from current clients, we knew we wanted to trust our pets' care there. A situation arose where our youngest and smallest dog was having some apparent GI distress and we called the clinic and Dr. Goodwin took our call and discussed the situation and had us come in. That is a level of customer service you don't ordinarily see from professional-level providers like doctors, lawyers, dentists and veterinarians.  We were greeted by kind and caring front office and technical staff and our pet's issues were addressed in a caring and professional manner. The approach was also conservative rather than a rush to run a litany of tests and get x-rays that might not have been warranted. And it turns out they weren't. After an overnight stay for our pet, we were promptly followed up with by Dr. Goodwin even though it was his day off. We were discharged under the care of Dr. Sterenberg with the same caring and thoroughness of Dr. Goodwin. Our only regret is that we learned during our visit that Dr. Goodwin was retiring and he was the main reason we chose the clinic as our new pet care provider.

text: Professional and loving staff

name: William Smart
text: Excellent experience every time.

name: James Sheppard
text:
The staff at Goodwin Animal Hospital has cared for our two cats the past 8 years, and our dog several years prior.  I am not qualified to judge the competence of the vets or support staff as some previous writers felt compelled to do, but I do know that our pets have been treated with kindness and concern, and whatever ailment that any of them had was cured when they left.  You can't argue with success.

We have an older cat that is in the twilight of her years and Dr. Glasscock has been unfailingly attentive and gentle with her on the many occasions we have had to seek help from her.  She is a credit to what I consider a very fine group of people.  The practice is operated as business and not as as a public service, so they do charge for their services.  Imagine that.  So does our family doctor, the guys who do our yard work and the woman who leaves the newspaper.

I would recommend these fine folks to anyone in need of veterinary assistance for their pets.  I miss talking Auburn football with Dr. Goodwin since he has begun spending his time at the new facility, but we are very pleased with Dr. Glasscock.

name: Abigail Hipps
text: The staff were friendly and helpful during our visit. The prices were more reasonable than i anticipated, and we were treated very professionally. We will continue to use Goodwin!

It was an expensive trip but I feel I got what I paid for.  The staff was great but ultimately they helped get my dog healthy!

text: I have used Goodwin Animal Hospital for over 8-9 years.  I love the staff and the Vets.  They obviously love the animals and go out of their way to make sure your furbaby is treated well and as comfortable as possible.  I have had to use their services for elder animals last visit and, though heartbreaking, my babies and I were treated with care, affection and respect for the process.  They work with you and great service.

text: I am so very grateful that the doctors are knowledgeable and willing to work on rabbits. My experience at Goodwin Animal Hospital is always wonderful. Great facility, highly recommended.

text: An extraordinary group of people who offer stellar customer service to its 2 legged and four legged customers ... there could not possibly be a better Veterinarian Clinic/Hospital/Pet Resort in the greater Montgomery area (and dare I say anywhere in the world!!).  I feel blessed when I have the opportunity to recommend Goodwin to friends ... and am rewarded when they too report back to me how blessed they and their pets are to have discovered Goodwin!  My pup spends so much time being loved and cared for at Goodwin's Day Care that I honestly think he considers my home his second home!  :-)

name: Rachel Cox
text: I always feel welcomed by the front desk staff. They're all great and very helpful. Dr. Glassclock is the sweetest vet.

name: Jean Maccinile
text: Been going there 15 years they care about your fur babies

name: Kalyn Pinkerton
text: So my review is from 2014. I took my cat in for a UTI back in November of 2014. He was seen by Dr. Goodwin. I was told he was blocked and had to have a surgery that would basically open up his urethra. So he had the surgery and he came home. He wasn’t getting better. Still in complete pain, losing weight, and straining horribly to use the bathroom. Not only that but he now has a gaping hole in his rear that is exposed to outside air and bacteria and causing infection. We went back to Goodwin in December for them to redo the surgery. Still not successful. At this point he’s being boarded at the Chantilly facility for constant observation. Looking back I’m assuming because they knew they had messed my baby up. So January rolls around and he’s not better. Weight loss, no appetite, and clearly in pain constantly. Dr. Sermon(?) decided to take over and redid the surgery AGAIN.  At this point my cat has been boarded there for over a month and has had THREE SURGERIES. Now I have a cat with constant issues at this point. They said the surgery was effective. WRONG IT WAS NOT. I’ll put a pic in the comments of his rear on the regular due to this complication. He couldn’t even sit down comfortably. He couldn’t walk like a normal cat. And he was constantly crying out in pain and straining. I switched vets at the point and had to spend the next three years of his life at routine visits every 2-3 months to have him sedated and antibiotics and his rear cleaned up. This constant pain eventually took a toll on him. I paid hundreds for prescription food and frequent vet visits and all Goodwin did for me was take a couple grand off my bill and left me with still around a $2k bill for them ruining my cats life. He recently died at only 6 years of age due to his poor quality of life and constant pain and infection caused by this surgery. I’ve investigated this with an attorney and I’m regretful I waited this long as it is outside of the statute of limitations for malpractice or Goodwin would have a lawsuit on their hands. I truly believe they single-handedly ruined my cats life and caused him to be taken from me way too soon. Do not trust these idiots with your babies.

text: Ms. Brenda and her brother Edward are the best people you will ever meet.  They tend to our Shih Tzu as if she were their own.  The care and attention they give our pet is amazing. name: Pamela Parker
text:
Brenda and Eddie are the kindest, most caring folks that you'll meet and it's so obvious that they care deeply about all animals.

My 8 year old Chug has arthritis and is very sensitive around his hind legs and paws, almost everyone I took him to always ended up cutting him while trying to clip his nails and he'd just whimper and whine the whole time.  Brenda and Eddie just talk to him soothingly and it's done without a sound or fuss and no cuts. He even reaches out for Brenda when I take him in.

My other puppy is hyperactive, more so than most puppies, and they are patient and wonderful with him too.

Prices are extremely reasonable and they take such good care of all the animals brought to them that I highly recommend them to everyone.

They are very caring and loving they do not keep him locked in a kennel all day like most boarders. They treat him special but not because he’s deaf. They are excellent with him.

resp.text: Aw thank you so much. We love our boy Kasper. He has the best personality and he absolutely loves my son ( and my son him). We treat him like our own!🥰🐾💕

Benny came out looking like a new dog and, for the first time, was well behaved while being groomed.  Drop off and pickup were simple and future appointments were discussed after I was given time to be sure I was satisfied.  We will make Sadie’s our new grooming destination.  Thank you Autumn and all the staff at Sadie’s.
