name: Mickey Marchand
text: They did a good job on my Yorkie and a great job on our senior Blue Healer with long hair. The latter being a very short summer cut. The price was reasonable and the groomer was very nice. I was happy with the end results. My experience was 5 stars. I am calling tomorrow to see if I can get and appointment for both of my dogs. I have tried to find Jonathan’s Studio but his phone had been disconnected and I guess he has moved to a new place of business. 👍👍👍

name: Rashanda Williams
text: Please DO NOT take your pets here. I brought my puppy in for a haircut to help me manage my allergies and they nicked him badly and did not tell me. My dog is a docile 7 pound yorkie-poodle that vets and groomers describe as manageable and sweet. Later, they admitted they "forgot" to mention the cut. My dog needed surgery and stitches, which resulted in a $330 vet fee that the groomers did not cover, despite assuring me they would do so ahead of the surgery. I was told  by the owner, Ken Beasely, that he "needed two weeks to come up with that kind of money" then that he would not cover the bill (which indicated they do not have business/accident insurance). Although I communicated with him calmly, presented receipts he requested and the vet's number, he was belligerent and admitted to several other counts of animal negligence (cutting another dog on the neck that bled so profusely they had to stitch him immediately) in efforts to explain that my animal's wound was not a big deal. He seemed to be on drugs and asked why I was worried about my little puppy when he didn't have personal insurance. He also seemed angry at the dogs he groomed, stating  "they all bite him every day." This is a very dangerous attitude for someone who works closely with animals.  While the business seems clean and respectable from the outside and is located in a nice area, and while the man who admitted my dog seemed kind and assured me they would take good care of him, the grooming room I caught a glimpse of when picking up my dog was filthy and unsanitary. Additionally, when I went to the pet store for bandages, a woman I spoke to working there shared that she had mistakenly taking her dog to Jonathan's Grooming Studio for a simple nail trim. She shared that all of his nails were bleeding when she picked him up and she had to carry him up and down stairs in her home for a month. This business needs to be shut down. Not only are they negligent, but they expressed no remorse for hurting animals. Please warn other dog and pet owners.

name: Sunny L.
text:
Do not be fooled by how the place looks. They offer amazing prices and do an INCREDIBLE job!
They keep prices low for us and focus on the dogs instead of making the store look super chic. I would much prefer lower prices than a super cute store front.

My dog is a medium size hair ball and what they do with her to make her look SO GOOD when they are done always blows my mind.

I've tried shaving her myself and it is an impossible task. Keep it up guys! You all are doing a phenomenal job!

name: Janay Michelle
text: I have a miniature yorkie who has been going to the groomer regularly for 7 years. Today when I picked up my dog, he had a huge, deep gash on the inside of one of his hind legs that was NOT there before. The people were not very friendly. I would NOT recommend this groomer for your pet.

name: Hillary Mccandless
text: First time taking my dog to the groomers. Should have read reviews before going. Seemed okay over phone but when I walked in the place was NASTY! One guy who took my dog looked like a crack head and wasn't friendly and had a very strange vibe. I dropped off my dog went to my car and felt sick to my stomach about leaving him there and read all the nightmare stories on people's reviews so I went right back in and kindly asked for my dog back. The guy who came out from the back was nicer but I still wasn't willing to take the chance with my fur baby!!!! Definitely don't recommend this place!

name: Deanna Chandler
text: I  love this place. Grooming is Excellent.  I come from Ga. And I visit them often...

name: michelle tilley
text: Today was the 1st time taking my dog there and the price was good but they didn't cut his hair like I ask them to.

name: Ishara the Dragon
text: Been going here awhile and have no problems. Personally I think most of the bad reviews have more to do with them having a bad dog and being told not to bring it back are the groomers being unable to do what they want so they write a bad review to get back at them.

name: Linda Beasley
text: Jonathans is a great place the reason dogs dont get the cut they ask for is because they dont brush or comb their dogs  etween grooms they come in all matted and have to be shaved and cannot get longer cuts

resp.text: Thank you so much! She’s a fantastic girl

name: Alex Worlund
text: We've been using Carrie for 10 years for our dogs and we could not love her more! She does such a great job and usually complies with any specific requests that we may have. We definitely feel confident leaving our dogs at Scruffy Puppy because we know that they will be well cared for and come home looking (and smelling) wonderful! If you are looking for a groomer, Scruffy Puppy is the way to go!!

resp.text: Thanks Alex.  You’ve got a great little dog family

name: Clint Graham

name: Kelly Williams

name: Steve Graham

name: Patricia Jones
text: Scruffy Puppy is by far the best groomer I've ever used.  I have two medium Australian Labradoodles and people stop to ask where I get them groomed.  She is hands down the most professional and knowledgeable groomer I've encountered.  She truly cares about your pups.  When my dogs see her outside of her business, they are excited to greet her. I cannot recommend her highly enough.

name: Dallas Phillips
text: Loved her cut

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Angelen Dempsey
text: Carrie has groomed our dogs for several years.  We have always been very pleased and have trusted our dogs in her care.  A few weeks ago, one of our dogs had a medical emergency.   Carrie was willing to let us know that our dog was bruised on his entire body. We had not noticed because he has longer hair and has long floppy ears.  He showed no signs of being sick. Some groomers would not have brought to our attention, but Carrie was willing to step up and let us know. Our dog’s body was attacking its own blood platelets and his count was almost at zero when we got him to the vet.  He had a platelet transfusion and is doing well.  If we had not taken him to the groomers that day, we would have lost him.  We are so grateful to Carrie and her sister for their willingness to step up and not ignore.  They put our dog's well being first.  Our family has moved to Fayetteville, TN in the last  two years but we continue to take our dog's to Carrie's Scruffy Puppy every 6 weeks and will continue to do so.  She is excellent.  Thanks Carrie for taking good care of our babies.

name: Pamela Sanders
text: Carrie is the best! My beagle loves her and her workers! She cries for Carrie as soon as we drive in the parking lot, can't say enough of great she has been with her.

name: Joseph Woerner
text: The owner Carrie is so sweet and so good to my doggos!  They actually look forward to going to the groomer!

name: Karen Shavers

Stephanie always has a smile when greeting you. Bella loves going to see "Ms. Stephanie" & that's what counts.

text: First time there. She did a great job. I will take my yorkie to her.

name: john hall
text: She is a pro!  Excellent work and fast too.

name: feliceyia vickers
text: Took my 8 year old Maltese in for a grooming and last minute which was amazing because they let him in on such short notice . The price was also great for a wash and the nails being clipped were included with the service. But my concern is about dogs behavior. My Maltese name is prince and he is normally very energetic when he goes for car rides. But, yesterday he was very drowsy and Extremely thirsty. Prince even threw up soon as he got inside of the car once I picked him up from the groomers. He seemed so out of it yesterday ! Not sure if this place gives dogs anything to sedate them but that should definitely be discussed if so! Especially on an empty stomach! I was told to bring him him at 10:30 am but was told that he had 15 dogs in front of him so he’ll be ready by 6 pm (closing) which is definitely no problem but That’s a very long time to go without food or water. My other concern was about my dogs cut, his back hair was choppy and the ears were choppy as well and very uneven. His tail also looked like it was left to air dry and not combed out at all.

name: Carl James
text: Do not take your pet there. Very unkempt in appearance dog cages stacked on top of one another dogs running around. The shampoo is over the counter cheap stuff my dog had outdoor dirt on his paws I picked him up and he still had the same dirt his coat is not well groomed all in all it not a good spot if you care for your pet. Southern Paw is by far the best.

name: Jenna Beattie
text: I've only used this facility for boarding because I don't have a dog that needs to be groomed, so that's where my review comes from. This is a family owned business that truly cares about their pup customers. They are located in a great area. They take good care of my dog when I have to board her. Their prices are low enough for me to afford which is always a plus. The husband and wife pair are friendly, caring, attentive to you & your animal's needs, and deserve all the business of this area. I have had no complaints with this business and would recommend to anyone!

name: Sharleen Baskin
text: They was great to baby and  I  know my little Miss Fendi is a hand full ... But they took care of her... I will be bringing  her  back....

name: Christopher Todd
text: We have a 1.5 year old Siberian Husky. We love to take him there for services and boarding. Prices are great, the owners have a heart of gold. Definitely recommend this place 🐕

name: Francine Sanders
text: They always do a great job grooming my dog and they know my dog by name. The only business that I’ve trusted my dog with and they have never disappointed us.

name: Judy Dye
text: We take our sweet Cooper every week and they are excellent with him.  We have always been extra please. Cooper loves going!

name: Barrett Johnson
text: Fast friendly service, they were able to take care of my Jack Russell/Chihuahua in a jiffy, at an affordable price.

name: Eddie Pickle
text: I took my crumb up for a hair cut and bath and was very pleased with what they've done to him his nails could have been a little shorter but all and all very pleased I'll be going back

name: Deborah Dickinson
text: No longer Gardendale's best kept secret! I love the grooming. These folks really love and care for my dog. Great service.

name: Mely Lopez
text: I did not like the way Cathy the groomer did  my pet. But Alicia the manager was nice enough to refund me some money so thats why ill give them 3 stars, because of the courteous manager Alicia. I guess I'll ask for a different groomer next time.

name: Jennifer Dean
text: I’m only giving them one star because I have to in order to leave a review. We took our Chocolate Lab here to get bathed and groomed and she came home smelling the same, she didn’t smell clean, she still smelled like a dirty dog, plus whatever they used to bathe her with made her skin flake and I just got that cleared up, and we took her about 3 weeks ago. I will never use this place again. Very disappointed.

text: I wouldn’t even give them one star if that was an option. This place hurt our puppy and I wouldn’t recommend them to anyone. He is missing chunks of hair around his eyes. They should be ashamed.

name: r mckinney
text: Good job trimming my cat.

name: Katherine Richardson
text: Our dog is so happy to arrive at Walks and Wags every day! It’s extremely comforting to know our pup is having a great day and is well loved by a knowledgeable staff. Training and socialization are prioritized, and we love the open communication facilitated by Cindi and her team.

name: Stacy W
text: I cannot say enough about the great care that Walks and Wags provided for my Hershey while we were on vacation.  She has always loved going there for Doggie Daycare so I thought I'd give them a try for boarding as well.  They  did a fantastic job!!   I can honestly say that she loves this place as much as home.  Thanks to all of the staff for all that you do in loving and caring for our animals.

name: Quintin Wilder
text: I delivered to this fine loving place a few times and I must say it smells good very clean and the staff be on top of things and the love I seen them show the pets won me over I tried to get my dog in there around Christmas time and they was booked up so that should tell you people love this place and trust it highly recommended

name: Jim Stokes
text: went by for lunch, but the dining room was closed. went to checkers instead, because they have outdoor tables.

name: Marilyn Taylor
text: My Golden Retriever just got the most fabulous groom from Bre. She came home looking like a million bucks and smelled fabulous. Bre is truly a dog grooming artist. Just look at my dogs smiling face.

name: Delana Ibsen
text:
Walks and wags has been such a Godsend to us. When we started bringing her a couple years ago we had a pup that we couldn’t give the proper exercise or life experience to. Because of walks and wags we have been able to finally establish proper pack structure at home in a way that makes all of us happy and able to enjoy life together.
The entire staff have been so incredible to us and I can’t seem to find words great enough to express my gratitude for all you have done.

resp.text: You are an amazing dog owner. Keep up the great work.

name: C Sells
text:
EXCEPTIONAL SERVICE & STAFF!! Sooo kind and generous! 💞💞💞
They cared for our fur baby for a week and he was right at home!

name: Lauren Parker
text: Our dogs love coming here and getting the opportunity to learn social skills as they interact with other dogs.  We like how personal the caretakers are with us and our dogs.  They know the dogs’ likes and personalities.  I can go away on vacation and not have to worry about the dogs.  I know they are having a blast and they are in good hands!

name: Karen B
text: As a puppy, our dog began going to a weekly play-date at Walks & Wags.  She is five years old now and still loves her day with her friends each week.  She comes home tired, but happy, from constant play.  We also board her with W&W whenever we travel and it is wonderful to be able to leave her with no worries, knowing she will be cared for by people she knows (and loves).  She is more than happy to enjoy her vacation while we enjoy ours.  Cindie and her staff are excellent trainers, as well.  I give W&W my highest recommendation!

name: The Knockout Ladysaint23
text: Great place for your dog to run, play, have fun and spend time with their friends or make new ones. After playing, your dog also gets to take a nap. After naptime, your dog also gets a bath, their nails trimmed and they also get a lovely bow before going home. Grooming and training is also available. You can rest easy knowing your dogs are well taken care of by friendly and knowledgeable staff, that love your dog just as much as you do. Don't forget to check the Walks and Wags Facebook page daily, you might get to see a picture of your dog playing.

name: Herder
text: Amazing place i know from personal experience the staff is amazing

resp.text: Thank you so much.

name: Mary Duffy
text:
This is a wonderful place for your dog(s) to come. Not only do they get socialized with other dogs but they get in some great exercise. Cindie Carter and her staff are who really make this place work. Simply put, they love the dogs.
My dog has been coming 1-2 times a week for 4 years. He loves Walks & Wags. . His excitement grows once he realizes where we are going, until he all but bursts from the car. I recommend everyone bring their dogs to Walks & Wags.

name: Lauren Perry
text: Walks and Wags have been nothing shy of absolutely amazing. They have provided more assistance in the care and training of my puppy then I ever knew I needed. Every staff member at Walks and Wags is educated and knows exactly what they are doing due to the amount of training that they provide their employees. I’m so glad that I found them!

name: Brian O'Hear
text: The people here are amazing and friendly! They take great care of your dogs! It's hard to find people like this who care for pets this much. They treat you like family.

name: Sloan Blaylock
text: As a former kennel employee and current vet tech (at another establishment), I feel qualified to give Walks &Wags a thorough review.  The staff is incredible. They all have an undeniable love for animals and are extremely dedicated to keeping your four-legged family members happy and safe.  Small, well-supervised play groups ensure your dog gets the proper socialization he or she needs, while careful supervision prevents any dogs from being over stimulated. They take great care to make your dog feel at home. To top it all off, your dog receives a bath and is returned to you fresh and clean.  Walks & Wags is a gem of a place. Your dogs will thank you for bringing them to board and/or play!

name: Christine Ford
text: Our experience with Walks and Wags has been phenomenal! My 9 year old, old lady dog started once a week day care with them several months ago. After several weeks of getting oriented to the facility and the staff, my old, lazy dog began to run and play at home again! She chases and brings toys and is clearly a much happier, more relaxed dog. I can’t say enough nice things about Alex, the lady who greets her in the mornings. The groomer at Walks and Wags does an excellent job with out stressing the dogs. These people clearly love what they do!

name: Katie Mallinger
text:
My dog went to walks and walks for a several years before we moved to Tennessee. When we moved I tried another daycare for my dog, but when I picked him up he was more stressed than tired.
My dog and I are visiting the Mobile area this week and I took him to walks and wags for a day of fun. I drove in the driveway and he knew where he was, and his reaction was priceless.
I would recommend walks and wags to anyone that loves their dog as much as I love mine.

name: Buddy Arensberg
text: Staff were very professional. Communication was excellent.  My dog loves Walks and Wags, and they are working with him to develop better social skills.  Much more than a boarding facility.

name: C Lynn
text: We tried this facility a while back, very bad experience. Owner was extremely rude and our dog will not be returning.

resp.text: I am the owner and I have not been working  on location. I’ve been wrapping up end of year and training. I would love to discuss your experience with you and  see if we can  figure out a solution. Of course our staff and myself apologize for any miscommunication. We have tried to locate your name in our customer mgmt system and have no record. Please reach out and we will be happy to assist . Warmly, C. Carter

name: Ilka Porter
text: The entire staff is fabulous. They all truly care about your dog(s). Our Molly also got a great haircut by Katie. Highly recommend!

name: mjill gee
text: My dog is a regular at Walks & Wags and I can't say enough great things about what a wonderful Doggie-Daycare place it is.  The outstanding owners, Cindie and Larry Carter, and dedicated staff are true dog lovers and have a great understanding of the needs and personalities of all  the dogs that come to play -and/or board- there. They have a great set-up for tons of outdoor play and lots of special dog activities as well. It is the ideal place to leave your dog when you are not going to be home as their day will be full of fun, stimulating activities, tons of exercise (broken up by group nap-time!)  and best of all, love and affection - oh, and a bath at the end of their day to boot!v If you are looking for a Doggy Daycare or boarding place for your pup, you won't want to look any further than Walks and Wags. We are so very fortunate to have it here in Mobile!

name: diane gibbs
text: Amazing people and a great place to take your dog for exercise, socialization, and they work with the dogs. They have pools for the dogs, hit tennis balls endlessly and the dogs are ALWAYS supervised. There is no rough play allowed and they come home cleaned and ready to sleep! Dogs are worn out. They take a nap at the hottest part of the day and then back out to play! It is great!

name: Lee Dunsmore
text: Took very good care of our little one and gave her a nice bath also.

name: Jake Rosner
text:
Training with Alyne has been so fun! We have only just begun taking our new puppy to walks and wags. Alyne is kind and patient and we can’t wait to come back again and again!
Will be boarding and training with walks and wags often! :)

name: Gusto Frazier
text: The best place for a dog my lab wouldn't jump in or out my truck but after being with walks & wags she now jumps your dog will get all the fun and exercise it needs and also a bath I've also left my lab here for a weeks boarding when on family vacation they're the best they love dogs and dogs love them

name: Kimberly Diane Rouse
text: They really care for your pup.

name: Patty Howell
text: Sophie had a great time at "camp" while we were away!  Alyne was great and she can't wait to go back!

name: Susan Newby
text: Love the staff and how much they care for my pup!

name: Sugarray Henry
text: This is a great place, and everyone who works there is amazing with the dogs. They are very professional and at the same time very customer friendly with plenty of excellent advice for dog owners.

name: Ann Corl
text: We and Willis love walks and wags. Tell him we are going to see Larry, and he goes absolutely crazy.

name: Megan Blosser
text: Walks and Wags got my dog to come out of her shell.  When Reagan began doggie daycare at Walks and Wags, she was beyond anti-social with dogs outside of her home pack.  She would tuck her tail and run in the opposite direction of strange dogs.  We took her to Walks and Wags to socialize her.  The results are amazing!  Now Reagan is a total social butterfly.  Her tail is held high and wags happily.  Its like she was in a cocoon of shyness and now she is a content fluttering butterfly!

name: Lyn Lankford
text: Good service

name: Donna GhostBear
text: Renai and Christie are awesome.  Our dogs absolutely love them.  They know when they are going for a *spa day* and run for the door as soon as we get there.  They treat them just like they  are their own.

name: Annette Fisher
text: Wonderful girls so supportive of my concerns. I recommend this spa to everyone. They really love our family canines..

text: Best groomer around. They go above and beyond to make our dog feel comfortable and loved.

name: Kristi Heath
text: Renai always takes wonderful care of my dogs! She takes the time to know the dogs and their insecurities so they get the best care possible. I loved the little goody bag I got the first time I came and the cute bow. Updated to say I've been going here a couple years now and I am still extremely satisfied with services.

text: My precious Shadow has not even been there yet and they have been helping me with him.  He has been suffering whenever he enters the groomers of having seizes.  I love these women they so love the animals. Thank you for being so caring.

text: We needed to get our dog in and get him cut after he missed two appointments and these precious ladies set us up an appointment for today. I have a Miniature Schnauzer that's 14 and 1/2 years old. He missed his last two appointments and was slightly matted. They bathed him and groomed him and did such a wonderful job. I know he will be much cooler while camping now and he definitely looks awesome! Thank you ladies so very much!!!❤️❤️❤️

text: Pretty professional. I feel as though they should communicate as staff with each better. I was over charged because I asked for one thing and it wasn’t communicated properly with other staff. But the refunded a portion. Also, if my dog is being boarded, and I call to check on her, you need to actually give me details on her well-being. Don’t just say “she’s fine” and you haven’t actually gotten off your butt to check. Other than my last visit, overall I haven’t had any issues.

text: Although I'd prefer to be able to come in and stay with my girl, I know she's in the best hands with Dr. McMillan and his staff!

text: My kitty was very ill this week with an infection. The medical staff at PC Animal Hospital were very caring and persistent on making her well. She is recovering well and I appreciate all of them!

name: Krissy Kinsey
text: My cat had to be spayed quickly because of a constant infection. I was concerned about cost because I'm between jobs and they quoted me $160 by phone. When I picked up my kitty imagine my surprise when she stated my bill was $260.....$100 over what they said...this on top of the $100.28 I already paid for the initial exam and antibiotics ! I am now going to struggle just to pay my utilities this month which are already past due. Other than the outrageous prices, they took good care of my kitty. If money wasn't an issue I would take all my animals there.

text:
I can't say enough good about this place the professionalism they cared as much for me as they did of my little sissy girl .at this trying time. They prepared here for me to take her home to her final resting place .From the bottom of my heart Thank y'all
Rest in peace sissy girl

text: Very dedicated doctors and staff! They pay extra attention to the pets and keep the owners informed. I've used this clinic for 10+ years! Love them!

The Doctor and staff are the sweet people
Thank you for taking such good care of my babies
Linda Fontes

text: This vet is very good at what they do..  they are always so nice an welcoming of anyone and any furry friend.  We love pell city animal hospital and we always refer people to this vet. They have saved some of my babies and took good care of them. The best understanding an helpful vet we have had.

name: Laura Smitherman
text: I trust you! May sound simple but honestly, my pups are extreme important to me. I truly believe you all do the best you can to make them safe. Thank you all.

name: Holly Mims
text: This was the first time I’ve taken a sick animal to this vet. Dr. Farmer and his staff were wonderful and treated my baby with love and care. Dr. Farmer was very thorough with his instructions for our pup and I am very happy with my decision to use this groups of veterinarians.

name: Sherry Bishop
text: The team at PCAH take great care of my cats!  They are warm and friendly people and take time to talk to me whenever I have a question or concern, no matter how trivial or strange it may be!  I never feel like they think I'm bothering them and they always return my calls when they say they will.  They go above and beyond to care for my cats.  I highly recommend them if you want great quality care for your pets!

name: Paige Allen
text: You walked me through the entire process of everything Fynn had and answered all my questions and put my mind at ease. Fynn came through with flying colors and you took great care of my fur-baby. Such friendly, helpful staff!!!! We are both so pleased.

name: Lee Karcher
text: We boarded our Bella with this facility over a weekend and they took great care of her. All of the staff was super friendly and you could really tell they LOVE their animal friends. I felt sorry for them at our drop off on Saturday because they were so busy and seemed understaffed. I hope others see a need for more staff here and hire some great people because these ladies were going above and beyond to take care of everyone with the crazy COVID restrictions in place. They never slowed down so I cannot imagine them having to keep this pace every weekend. Our hold time to check in was about 20 minutes but we were happy to wait bc we saw the issue was just not enough hands on deck, nothing else. They were very professional, super sweet, and we are so happy that they will be Bella's new vet facility in Pell City. I highly recommend Pell City Animal Hospital to anyone looking for great animal care.

name: Kim Garland
text: Can not say enough great things about this place. They have the most caring staff of any place I have ever been. I have been taking my babies there since moving to the area in 2017 and I am so thankful for them. The doctors are extremely knowledgeable.

name: N Kilgroe
text: The doctors & staff at Pell City Animal Hospital provide excellent care for our pets.   Their care, expertise and compassion for our fur babies is the best.  They have taken care of all our pets for 20+ years!

text: THE BEST vet ever!  They are so kind and loving toward your pet.  Very accommodating and informative.  I highly recommend.

name: brandi baugher
text: So many reasons to get your animals treated here. The front office staff is friendly and helpful. All the Dr’s are exceptional with both my cat and dog. One of my favorites is Dr Bearden sitting in the floor with me and my golden retriever (talking treatment to BOTH of us). My golden loves to carry her doggie in with her for comfort and they let her with out complaining (as they pick it up over and over). We have had nothing but great experiences here!

text: Treats my fur babies as their own pets! Goes above and beyond! Highly recommend

name: Patti Herring

Professional and good service.  Treat you and your pet like family.

Patti Herring

name: Susan Rinehart
text: Our dogs always get professional and compassionate care from the doctors and staff at PCAH.

name: Angela Whisenant
text: All of the staff at PCAH are fabulous!  Crystal and Dr Bearden are especially good with my very eccentric German Shepherd Lutz.

name: Dianna Enoch
text: Always receive the utmost care. They care about your pets.

name: Trina Barrett
text: I don’t do reviews often. Dr. Farmer is a wonderful vet and I have used him for years. However recently we saw Dr. Bearden. I cannot recommend her under any circumstances. My dog had an obvious deformation in her leg after an accident. Dr. Bearden put her in a splint, took X-rays and told us she would send them to a surgeon. Each week we went back and the treatment plan/diagnosis/story changed. The staff would tell me something different than she did each time. She never sent the X-rays to a surgeon. 6 weeks this went on. (Shame on me for letting it go on so long) On the last visit the dog was dropped off 7am, at her request, for observation without the splint. She didn’t look at the dog or remove the splint until I called at 1:30 for an update. At 3:30 she claimed the dog only had “liganitis” but was still not putting weight on the leg. When I asked about the “dent” she claimed I had never told her about it. Not true, and it was easy to see on the dog’s leg. She wanted to give the dog back without a splint. I had the staff splint the leg and took the dog to another vet. She had to have a metal plate surgically implanted to fix the damage. Because of Dr Bearden’s poor diagnostic skills, I cannot recommend PC Animal Hospital unless you see Dr. Farmer.

name: Kisha Lybrand
text: We had a great experience leaving our fur baby in your hands. He had a great time and was glad to be home.

She couldn't drink water by herself but yesterday she got up an went to her water bowl an drank some . Today she jumping around and playing ! She's taken little bites of her food ! I'm guessing that normal after having a upset stomach for 4 days ! But I can't thank staff enough for helping us with her an giving us every piece of information they could !

text: The lady we dealt with told us that she worked for them almost 3 years and the bad post were before her. She seems to like dogs and our dogs seemed happy when we picked them up. The place was an older concert building, but the dog runs were a good size. The play time in the yard is an extra $4 a day but that still made it cheaper than a lot of vets and other boarding facilities in the area. Overall our 10 and 8 year old labs seems happy and healthy when we picked up and the price was reasonable.

name: Forrest Strobel
text: I highly recommend Top Dog for boarding.  I have been going there for almost 10 years, with a 2 year absence when one of my pets was fighting cancer.  I have recently returned with a new dog and their care for him is better than ever.  They have taken the time to get to know my dog Sam and are very willing to provide the specific care that he requires, i.e., associated with his skin allergies, special diet, and medication.  They always take the time with me to get all the specific instructions that are needed for his care.  Sam has a good experience at the kennel and appears to enjoy his time there.

text: I really like them at first did great work. But when I couldn't make appointment and had to cancel they where very rude about it and never asked if I would like to reschedule. Was not happy with the attitude at all.

resp.text:
Amanda, rest assured I am checking into the situation you have written about.  At the moment I can only find one person with your name in our system.  The person with that name last checked in our salon on June 25, 2018.  I will not further any more details to protect the privacy of that client (and should it be you, your information).
I look forward to discussing your situation further.  Upon calling the salon tomorrow one of our team members can put you directly in touch with me.  I look forward to us resolving your case.
Thank you in advance,  Melody Basch

text: I’ve been taking my dogs here for the last 2 years and now I’m no longer going back. It used to cost $30 for my 50 lb dog to get a bath and tidy and now it’s $50, and I have 3 of them. I called to schedule an appointment 2 weeks in advance and they told me they would rather I bring my dogs in on separate days so that I don’t use up all of their space for other customers. I told them I would rather not make 3 separate trips on the different days. She said “well, we could do it but they might be here all day.” Needless to say I found somewhere else that would accommodate my dogs on the same day.

name: Jamie Powell
text: Amanda did an excellent job on cutting my dogs hair! He smelled so good and the price was super reasonable and affordable! I know now why she stays super busy!!!

text: went in for a bath and a blow out and they didn’t give him a blow out. had an 8am appointment and it took them 5 hours to just give him a bath. the worst service ever. and i just found a tick on him so yeah. never going back again! i tried calling and calling when he was there and no one would even answer. i never leave reviews like this but this was the worst service i’ve ever experienced.

name: Marie E
text: Myra's is pretty great! For $15 my small dog can get bathed and pampered! She always comes home smelling great and feeling super soft, and they always give her a cute bandana! I gave four stars instead of five  because it's a small building and all of the dogs in there barking seems to get pretty loud, which may be unsettling to some dogs. That, and they are so popular that you usually need to make an appointment and/get there first thing when they open on saturdays, or they will be booked up already. Totally worth making that happen though!

text: I took my two beautiful King Charles Cavalier Spaniels for a bath and a cut. We even had a long talk with the groomer about how I wanted them to look and I was extremely disappointed. I asked for them to be lightly trimmed in specific areas and instead my dogs were practically sheared including their wings(on their legs) which one of the attribute that makes them beautiful. Do NOT go here. There was nothing professional or skillful in the way my dogs were butchered. I could've done better with the dog clippers I have at home.

name: Kenneth White
text: Loved the friendly service and they treated my Major very well. He loved the attention and will definitely be going there regularly

name: Stacey Powell
text: Such a cute and clean pet shop. They have the cutest leases and matching collar. They have a nice selection of pet bandana. However the selection of pet snacks from the bakery is worth the visit. This visit was for my Bulldog's 2nd Birthday. The have the cutest cookies, and Birthday cakes or cupcakes 🧁.  Little party hats in blue and pink. They also had Gotcha Day items.  They were busy grooming in the back and customers coming and going seemed pleased with their services. I noticed one lady had a special type of dog food special ordered for her pet. So this little shop offers alot. I found just what I needed , Thanks Wolfgang Bakery Milo & Chanel loved their treats.

name: Kelley Morehead
text: I could not believe the groom they did to my dog. I discussed with the groomer of how I wanted my dog to be trimmed. They cut all of her hair off. I mean they sheared all of my schnauzer’s traditional cut she’s had every since she had a puppie cut. I believe my dog is embarrassed to be seen without her beautiful hair. I WILL NEVER USE THEM AGAIN AND IF YOU HAVE A SPECIAL CUT YOU CAN JUST FORGET IT!

name: Lynn Miller
text: Love this place.  They really care about your dog and do the grooming right.  They even told me my maltipoo had an infection in her eyes and I was Leary but took her to vet and they were right.  They have the cutest boutique for dogs you have ever seen.

name: William Lee
text: Jennifer and her staff are always excited when our Golden Doodles come in to be groomed. The groomers do an amazing job and always praise our Doodles personalities. We haven’t purchased anything from the Bakery, but I have noticed there are always busy with customers.

name: Elizabeth Krause
text:
I already loved this place but my experience today really sold me. I will never love another pet supply shop like this one!!

I come in regularly with my dog to get her nails trimmed down. They have an excellent selection of fresh baked treats (with ingredients available if your dog has a sensitive tummy or allergies!), a bakery case that even has birthday cakes for dogs, and some very cute toys, collars, and bandanas. I always get my dog a little treat because I can’t help it! The fresh baked treat bar is also very affordable.

Today, I went in for our weekly nail trim. I got back out to my car and....nothing. It wouldn’t start. My dog was staring at me like “Come on, we did the nails, let’s go home for my mid-afternoon nap”. AAA took almost 3 hours to arrive, and Woof Gang let me and my dog hang out inside the entire time waiting for the tow truck because the car was so hot and I didn’t want my dog to overheat.

These people are pure angels (and for some reason, my dog even lets them cut her nails, which she is so picky about. Probably because they are the greatest people on Earth!!). I can not recommend them enough, and hopefully my car works again by next week for our weekly nail trim!!

name: Chelle Ham
text: Very clean and cute store. I went in for a rope style leash and they only had flat ones so I didn't make a purchase. They mostly had fancy dog treats so I'll be back around the holidays.

name: Curtis Olson
text: Great little shop. But there's Great news there's expanding

name: Amy Baskin
text: The sweetest and most talented groomers in Dothan for sure!! They also make the BEST homemade dog treats! My dog usually hides her treats and really could care less about eating them but not Wolfgang treat!! She devours them and begs for more EVERY TIME!! WE LOVE WOLFGANG IN DOTHAN AND WILL ALWAYS HIGHLY RECOMMEND THEM!!

text: My fur baby Miss. Sassy Durden loves, loves,  loves Mrs. Jennifer Carico.   Jennifer has been grooming Sassy for years and she does a fabulous job making my girl even more beautiful.   Jennifer and her awesome staff will treat your baby like you do with lots of love and much care.  You owe it to your fur baby to stop in and check out this fantastic salon and bakery.

Such a good experience THANK YOU!!

Thank you for being amazing with my dog!!

text: First time visit. They took great care of my two dogs, gave them great cuts,  and went the extra mile. We'll definitely be going back.

name: Mandy McC.
text: Fantastic groomer, well priced, but they are cash or check only - no cards.

name: Fallon Meade
text:
Late. Unresponsive. Unprofessional. Horrible service.

I shouldn't have to go on, but I will. I scheduled my dog a grooming appointment here, with intentions of making it my new go-to groomer if I liked them on the first try. They advertise that they open at 7am, and I even confirmed that on the phone when I made the appointment. I brought my dog by between 7:30 and 7:40, and I arrived to a ghost town. All lights off. No one inside. No answer back to the message that I left them when I left. Nothing. Which it's probably for the best- The place didn't look like somewhere I'd feel comfortable leaving my pet even for just a few hours. I don't want anyone to have to have the experience that I did with this business.

text: Lisa is great at boarding and grooming!

name: Courtney Burgett
text: I have never boarded my dog in the three years since his rescue and was nervous about leaving him in a foreign environment for the first time. But, Wags was so efficient and thorough I was easily able to relax through a busy weekend knowing my pup was well taken care of. The scheduling and check in process was thorough and exemplified this business’s attention to individual animal care. I was able to shoot a text to check in on Jameson at any point during regular hours. Pick up was seamless and they even confirmed payment before we arrived so all we did was pull in, load our dog, and head out. They even put up with my annoying dog mom questions. I LOVED this service and I am happy to know that I have found a business I can entrust my dog with.

When I picked my old boy up from W&W he looked amazing, maybe even better. I am so grateful to have found a new permanent place for our babies whenever we need to go out of town again.

text: I was very pleased! Our two dogs seemed happy when we picked them  up as if they didnt even miss us. They were clean and smelled so good. I only gave a 4 because i didnt get to see where my dogs  were being kept and with us never being there and new to  them, they didnt even ask me anything about my fur babies. And when I called to see when I could pick them up (cause i was anxious  and missed them) the guy wasnt very personable. He wasnt rude just not personable. The girl that i think runs it was very sweet and when she called while we  were away, i asked how they were doing and she took the time to tell me and didnt make me feel rushed. We will probably use them again.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We let anyone who ask see where they stay. Next time just let us know and we will be happy to show you! We also send pictures of our boarding room, I tried to post a picture here but it wouldn’t give me the option. Hope to see y’all next time!

name: Griff Perry
text: Never thought I'd be leaving negative reviews on a business, but here I am. My wife and I had our 2 dogs boarded with Madison Animal Care Hospital over Memorial Day weekend. One thing that bothered me is that even though we were back in town on Monday they were closed so we couldn't pick them up. They still charged us for the day they were closed, but refused to let us pick them up. First red flag. When I picked them up Tuesday I noticed they had a green/yellow discharge coming from their eyes. I took them back to Madison Animal Care Hospital to get them looked at. Turns out they both had eye infections. Best part is they charged me full price for the examinations, tests, and medicine. No discount at all even though the most likely cause was from something they got into while being boarded by the same facility. Seems like this business is a little money hungry and they lack respect towards the people putting money in their pockets.

name: James
text:
Take my Bengal cat Zeus here for his checkups and they are always professional. Zeus is very aggressively to people that he doesn't know and Dr MaGee has been very good about making sure he's comfortable.

I would definitely recommend this place.

name: April Farr
text: Amazing staff and they really take care of all your pets needs and answer questions that you have. They also don't try to sell you unnecessary stuff. Highly recommend this place.

name: Niki Wallwork
text: Let me just say that I was totally impressed with the employees and facility.  The staffed were so very polite, kind, and caring.

name: Jamie Schwab

text: This place was amazing with both of my animals & worked to help me get the best treatment fo them on my budget.

name: Ashley Archey

name: Marc Harms
text: I've been bringing my puppy here for about 10 months now.  If your only concern is price, you can find cheaper elsewhere, but the quality of care here is wonderful.  I had to board mordecai here for 4 days, and I got him back clean and happy.  He had a blast.

name: Brian Randall
text: Dr. McGee and his staff are great. They were very professional, caring and knowledgeable  from our 1st visit at 6 weeks to Trane's transition 13 and a half years later. I give my highest recommendation to Madison Animal Care. Thanks for everything

name: Becky G
text: I was extremely satisfied with everyone at the facility. The doctor and staff were very helpful and the whole visit from start to finish, was fast and efficient! Will recommend to my friends and family. ❤❤

name: Pat Williams
text: Took my dog here for 15 years for exams, shots, weekly baths, and grooming.  Every experience was top notch.  Now starting again with new puppy.  Highly recommend for professional service, TLC for pet, and friendliness of all staff.

name: lynette Huggins
text: The facility is outstanding. The staff are kind, compassionate and caring. My furr-baby and I will be coming back for "Doggy Day Care" next week🐱🦮

text: Rocky loves Madison Animal Hospital they are great!

name: Kyle Griffin
text: They take great care of our dog. They have wonderful employees that love our dog and also have great facilities for them to play in during the day.

name: Kelsey Snyder
text: I’ve been bringing my difficult dog here for boarding and routine vet visits for the past few years and always have positive experiences! My pup isn’t happy when we get there but he’s always happy by the time we leave! Great staff, unlike the place on Hughes rd near Hwy 72. I’m very happy that the MACH staff takes the time to make my not-so-easy keeper feel comfortable, highly recommend this place!

name: Jade Chappell
text: Everyone is always so kind and welcoming when I have to visit. They go to great lengths to make sure that their patients and their parents are well taken care of. Highly recommend!

name: Mallory Dotson
text: Great place to bring my dog for vet care and daycare! The staff loves her as much as she loves them! Everyone is very friendly and accommodating. I would recommend this place for all pet needs!

name: Greg Redic
text: I received an estimate for service for $772 from them to treat a dog that was suspected to have pneumonia (we have another dog that was treat elsewhere a week prior with the same symptoms and the cost was less than $200). I was shocked by their pricing.

name: Eric Tran
text:
I had been taking my pets to this animal hospital for over 5 years. I've never had an issue with them, yet I don't know if the owners change or if it's just the staff.

I took my dog in to get an annual procedure. With the Covid19, everything is curbside now. The person came to the door and asked is this all we're doing or did I want to do blood work as well. I asked how much the blood work was and how much the full total was going to be. She estimated around $250. So I signed off and all was good. I had the vet come out and talk to me about my dogs health and it was all good. She told me someone would call me shortly so I could pay the bill over the phone. When they called, they said I owned $480.80. I asked her what happened to the $250 I was quoted? I completely understand an estimate is just that, an estimate. Yet when you're jumping over 100% over it's ridiculous. She told me someone would call me the next day to discuss.

I get a call from Christy who then tries to inform me that I was quoted $250 for the blood work only. She was very condescending and tried to pin this on me. Lucky for me, I keep a dash cam for insurance reasons and was able to send her the video of the whole conversation.

After they reviewed she calls me back and the first thing she says is "You win, we lose. $250 is the total." She proceeded to speak in a very condescending manner to me. This wasn't about winning or losing. She then tried to tell me that me recording on public property was illegal with a bit more rude attitude. I wonder how'd she feel to know I also record all my phone calls as well.

I say all this to state that I wouldn't go back her. I've been a loyal customer for over 5 years and have spent literally thousands on my animals. I guess $250 is worth more than a loyal customer.

name: Hannah Land
text: We have been taking our pets here for over ten years; the staff are always professional and helpful.

name: Shachar Newton
text: Our dog Kali goes to the daycare here and she seems to like it. The prices are pretty reasonable.

name: J C
text: We have taken our dog here for over 12 years and have had a wonderful experience everytime. They are friendly and caring to our sweet pup each visit.

name: david levine
text:
Dr. McGee and his staff were awesome..
My 1st. Time in for a second opinion on my Ridgeback's back leg which has been troublesome..
I have met plenty of veterinarians throughout my years. Mc Gee took his time examining Kobe.. there is no doubt in my mind he is a straight shooter, and very knowledgeable in regard to his practice. Unlike other vets in the past, he made no attempt to sell me unnecessary procedures. Should either of my dogs ever need further assistance, I will not hesitate  going back to Doctor McGee. The young lady's managing the front desk were absolutely delightful also. Money is not a question when it comes to our loving companions, but I will add, the fees charged are quite reasonable.

name: Jean Jett
text: Fast service. My little Toy Dalnn m Arian did great there.

name: Tuere Kemp
text: Found a puppy that escaped from his home and they helped me return him to his owner

name: Frances Linares
text: WORST PLACE EVER DO NOT TAKE YOIR ANIMALS HERE !!! They will charge you for things that they are not even doing they will not even examine your dog and charge you for it please save yourself before coming here

name: MC Ortiz
text: My girl absolutely loves going! The staff are wonderful with her and she comes home after a long day of playing all tired out.

name: Kay Lamar
text: I have been going here on and off for the last 9 years and the staff and doctors are amazing, caring and so gentle. I appreciate the fact that they understand and consider your feelings when it pertains to your pets. Thank you for always being awesome.

name: Claire Troutman
text: My family has been going here for years and we absolutely love the staff. They're super friendly. With both people and animals! They listen and suggest things that would benefit the health of your furry friends.

name: Myles Boone
text: They refuse to send prescriptions to online pet pharmacies. Clearly a money grab. Take your business somewhere that cares about your pet's health and your convenience than making money.

resp.text: You can request a written prescription to send into any online pharmacy you wish.  There are some online pharmacies who have been found to have fraudulent products by purchasing 3rd party and not directly from the manufacturer (including the "good ones").   There are so many online pharmacies on the market now that you can't keep up with what is what.  By the client getting a written prescription that gives the client the option to research the companies themselves.  We can not approve every online pharmacy anymore since the clinic will become liable of there is an issue.  We want to be sure clients are informed.  Also, you may lose the guarantee on certain products if they are not purchased by a company that gets their products directly from the manufacturer.  For example, heartworm prevention companies offer a guarantee.  If your pet gets heartworms while on their product and you have followed their guidelines and purchased from a company that receives product from the manufacturer (in vets office, some online pharmacies, or vererinarian online pharmacy such as vets first choice or covetrus) the company will pay for treatments.  The clinic is not refusing the prescription,  the client just has to pick up the written prescription themselves and send it in, all we want is the client to be informed.

name: Terri Rose
text: Like family. Great caring and excellent pet care.

name: amy winebarger
text: I took my dog to this animal hospital for several years.  There was always a wait even when we had an appointment.  The reception staff was very nice, but the techs were not always nice or patient, it was really the luck of the draw.  In the end, my dog died while being boarded at this facility after being misdiagnosed.  I would not use them again or recommend them to anyone.

name: Joyce Coleman
text: We have been going to Madison Animal Care for so many years.  Our most recent experience with them was yesterday.    We took our 3 yr old German Shep, Lucy, to be groomed.  We used them many, many times but unfortunately their groomer, which we loved, was no longer there and we went to Pet Paradise in Madison.  Not a good experience.   Madison Animal got a new groomer, Heather, and we used her for the lst time and certainly not the last time, yesterday.    Lucy has never looked so beautiful, smelled so good and the special "no shedding" shampoo is awesome.   After Lucy's bad experience at Pet Paradise I was very nervous about taking her to someone new again.   Heather took the time to talk with me and Lucy came home so happy.    Thank you Heather and everyone else for taking such great care of our baby.  For anyone looking for a vet, stop looking, go to Madison Animal Care.  Everyone there is awesome.    Thank you so very much!

name: J. R.
text: Extremely rude Vet, referred us to a hospital 5 hours away for neurology, called the hospital and they don't even have a neurology center. We informed her of her mistake and not only did she get angry and not help us find a neurologist, she actually said she won't be helping us any further, ever. Very strange woman, seems a bit out of her head, found a wonderful new vet anyway, will not return. Ps. she took a 300$ X-ray without asking us.

name: Joey Rogers
text: There were very helpful and caring when my dog needed a vet and care.  Also, they were they only clinic I could get to see me when the Animal Emergency Clinic kicked me out at 8am when they closed.  Not even my regular vet would see me.  I would definitely recommend Dr. Magee to others.

name: AnnaLee Tillman
text: They are so wonderful to work with and take really good care of our dog.

name: Sharon Wall
text: Excellent care. An appointment is best way to be seen. However they will work you in for urgent care. Treated my 2 dogs, and 17 year old cat that has multiple age related issues. My son in law is a vet in NC. This clinic is my local  choice.  "Just sayin."

name: Ron Willis
text: I simply can't imagine a vet or his staff being any more friendly. They've always gone way above and beyond, even volunteering to pick my dog up from the emergency clinic when I had to be with my wife in the hospital following a stem cell transplant. The dog had to be picked up by 7 am when the emergency clinic closes and a member of Dr. MeGee's staff volunteered to pick her up so I could be with my wife when the transplant surgeon came in that morning. Oh, and there was no charge for their kindness at a difficult point in our life. And, that's just one example of many.

name: Sharon Wall
text: Excellent care. An appointment is best way to be seen. However they will work you in for urgent care. Treated my 2 dogs, and 17 year old cat that has multiple age related issues. My son in law is a vet in NC. This clinic is my local  choice.  "Just sayin."

name: Ron Willis
text: I simply can't imagine a vet or his staff being any more friendly. They've always gone way above and beyond, even volunteering to pick my dog up from the emergency clinic when I had to be with my wife in the hospital following a stem cell transplant. The dog had to be picked up by 7 am when the emergency clinic closes and a member of Dr. MeGee's staff volunteered to pick her up so I could be with my wife when the transplant surgeon came in that morning. Oh, and there was no charge for their kindness at a difficult point in our life. And, that's just one example of many.

name: andra rae
text: The staff was excellent, we had to have our  blind dog of 9 years put down, they helped make the decision as easy as possible.  They even sent a card to us. Thank you!!  Very good place that love animals

text: Very friendly staff and vets! Will do everything they can to take care of your babies and find the problems they’re having! Out of several vets I’ve been to in the area, this is the best one I’ve found

They have always been so helpful and caring - and when it was time for one of our pets to be put to rest, they were extremely compassionate and thoughtful.  We will only use Madison Animal Care and recommend them to anyone who asks!!

name: Joe Parker
text: I have been taking my cats to Dr. Magee for around 12 years and I have always been happy with their service. We used their boarding a couple of times as well and I always feel like my animals are well cared for. The staff is always friendly and knowledgeable, and many of them have been there for years and recognize me when I come in, even though I usually bring my cat in only once a year these days.

text:
We are new in town and chose this clini because it was near and convenient to our home. Our older dog is so healthy and all we need are usual annual exams. Our new addition is a puppy. We had never owned a puppy since we adopted our older dog at age four. The Vet Tech was so helpful and knowledgeable. She provided good information and the Vet gave us our puppies first flea and heart worm pill for free.

We have not had any problems with the clinic or with our pets and they have a kennel which we have left out dogs. They do a great job of providing care for our animals and we appreciate it.

My only gripe is the prices seem a bit high.

name: Serein Forbes
text: The place gives off a very hospitable and calm environment. The customer service is top tier & the doctors have saved my animals lives many times.

name: Carolyn King
text: They take great care of our dog.

text:
I just want to say again how amazing these doctors are! They really do care about your babies. I am pet setting 18 year old sweet Millie. When I checked on her this morning she was NOT doing well. They got me right in and worked with me and the owner with her being out of town. I should not be amazed at such wonderful care they give, But every time I go there with my Diva Maggee or someone else they continue to show more and more great Customer Service and just when I think they can't get any better they do!!
THANK YOU AGAIN!!!!

name: J C
text: I have used these guys for years. Super friendly and always affordable and easy to deal with. My dog Enzo absolutely confirms this since he gets excited when being dropped off here! 5 Stars *****

name: Sarah Holmes
text: When our six-year-old cat was under a lot of stress and pain, Madison Animal Care Hospital took great care of him and put our minds at ease. This high-stress situation was the first time we took him to the vet since we've owned him, and all of the staff were very friendly and reassuring. My only complaint is that our cat isn't used to other animals (and is very timid around them) so he was scared of all the dogs who were excited to play in the doggie daycare. Overall, a great place!

name: Kellie Craig
text: I adopted 2 dogs from Madison Animal Rescue Foundation at Petco.  Madison Animal Care Hospital was one of two vets in Madison that saw both dogs through their visits (initial shots and spay/neuter).  While I live 45 miles away, I have elected to stay with this animal care hospital.  Why - the front desk staff is helpful; I have confidence in both Vets; the vet techs care about their jobs and the animals; the hospital has great hours; the cost is reasonable; and I just generally like the place.  I could have elected to take my dogs to the vets in Athens, but I don't because of the confidence I have in the Vets.

name: Gwen Mier
text: I have gotten very good results at the clinic. although the prices are too high.  I brought my Yorkie in for itching, it was a follow up visit, they charged me for her yearly checkup ($45) which she had just had the month before but she told me it was cheaper that the office visit.  I know Dr. McKee didn't charge office visits for a follow up.  I love my Yorkie and would like to continue there but do not know I can afford it, I am a senior citizen on a fixed income. The visit including the medicine was $79.00.

name: daniel (7anny5up32n0va)
text: I adopted through MARF, and this vet was where the dog had been before. I felt ripped off at my other vet, so I gave Madison Animal Care Hospital a try. Now I take both my dogs there. The vets are great. The staff is friendly. My experience and wallet size post-visit has been much improved over the previous vet. I would definitely recommend Madison Animal Care Hospital.

name: Neil Young
text: This place used to be great. Now they have lost our pets files. Double vaccinated within 3 months. Been rude when questioned and was told to bring our records next time.real professional for a veterinarian facility.

name: Sue
text: Caring people.

name: deborah lacy
text: Very friendly efficient and thorough!

name: zeke aguilera
text: We've been with MACH for years and we love the people!

name: Dustin Bishop
text: This horrific vet refused to see my cat who was sick and they were extremely rude about it! If I could rate them a 0 I would. I do not recommend this vet to anyone!

name: Jackie Byrom
text: Was very helpful

name: Jim Heusel
text: Great care by techs and vets.

name: Angela Thomas
text: I was very pleased with everyone. I will continue to bring our new puppy to them. I truly appreciated them and their love and care for our new baby.

name: Alura Young
text:
These guys are phenomenal! We've been taking our pup, Sam here for all treatments and routine care for about two years now.  The vet techs are very knowledgeable and friendly, as are the doctors and rest of the staff.  When sam had issues with his ears, they did only necessary tests and didn't overcharge.
The staff is not only interested in physical health of your pets, but in the mental/behavioral health.  Sam had fear issues when we adopted him from the shelter and they gave us many tips and forms of contact to help him (by the way, he's doing so much better now)!
Some people don't realize how expensive it is to own and properly take care of their animals; MACH is no more expensive from any other vet clinic in the Huntsville/Madison area.
**Not only is their hospital great, their Doggy Daycare is FANTASTIC.  It's only $10 a day for your pup, and they get to play together outside in the new play area complete with a water fountain. Sam LOVES going there and he especially loves a caretaker, Sal. **  Seriously, this is a great hospital.

name: Jennifer Wilmoth
text: We love Madison Animal Care Hospital! We own a lab mix and a Maine Coon cat.  Our pets have been coming here for a few years now for veteranary care, and for boarding.  Every staff member we have ever spoken with is wonderful.  You can tell every employee loves animals, and loves caring for them.  Everyone always has a smile.  Our dog loves coming here! Our cat is an indoor/spoiled cat, and is always uneasy about leaving the house.  He has always been treated calmly and gently here.  I love that they can perform medical procedures right there if necessary.  They cleaned our cat's teeth last year.  It was done in the morning, and we were able to pick him up that afternoon.  I have never had a complaint, and our animals love them.  They are not the cheapest place in town, but you get what you pay for.  I'm sure you can look around for less expensive places.  However, when it comes to the care of my pets, I would rather spend the money for great care, and know they are well taken care of.

resp.text: Gosh, Thanks!  It's always nice to hear such kind words!  We do love what we do, and we strive to make every interaction with our clients - the people as well as their pets - as pleasant as we possibly can.  While, these days, cost must always be of concern for any type of goods and services, we do our best to contain costs while still providing excellent pet care.  It's good to know we are getting it right, and we'll continue to try hard to do just that.  We love it here - it's a great place to work - and we enjoy seeing our clients each and every day

name: Rhonda Bradford
text: We boarded our dogs here for a week while we went on vacation and had them groomed the day before we picked them up.  One of our dogs contracted a horrible bacterial infection that took two rounds of antibiotics to clear up.  I don't know if the infection came from the kennel or from the groomer - but it was bad.  Our other dog was chipped while there and they never gave us paperwork to have it activated.  They were so hard to work with - they charged us for the vet visit to try and clear up the infection.  We ended up just switching vets completely.  It was the worst experience EVER!!!!!  ...all the way around.

name: Jason Briggs
text: We won't be back. The receptionist with the short blonde hair is extremely unpleasant. I have a pretty thick skin but having a sick pet is stressful. The last thing I need in that situation is to deal with someone who clearly hates her job!

name: Warren Barber
text: Shadow, Buttercup and Leia get good care here.

name: Carol Foster
text: Very caring compassionate staff.  I HIGHLY recommend them for all your veterinary needs!

name: Mikey P
text: Daycare costs are next to nothing, and the person watching them really treats them like their own dogs.  They can usually fit you in if you need to see a vet, and they really do care about every animal they see!

name: Wayne
text: Always kind, even the office worker displays a deep love for animals.  Shots to boarding ~ They do it all.

name: Renz Santos
text: The doctors here are terrific and gave us new pet owners plenty of tips about taking care of our pet.

name: Janet F
text: I have been going to MACH for many years. Dr. Magee has literally saved one dog from bleeding out (in surgery). He has diagnosed or helped diagnose and treat strange problems in several of our cats and dogs. Dr. Grider has gone above and beyond with a very sick dog and other animals as well. The staff is always friendly, helpful, and knowledgeable. I have always been very aware of my options with regard to treatments and costs. I have no idea why anyone has negative remarks or comments regarding this clinic. Right now my husband and I have 4 large dogs and 6 cats. They are a part of our family. We TRUST this vet clinic with our furry family!

name: Dave K
text: Good vets. Always treat our four pets well.

name: Michael Gegogeine
text:
Always great service. I would recommended them to anyone who loves their pet.

Michael Gegogeine
Madison, Alabama

name: Crystal Miller
text: One of the front office girls is just RUDE and unfriendly.  I am new to the area and had to take our dog into see them.  The female vet was rushed and barely looked at my dogs foot and prescribed stuff and was out.  I am used to a follow up call in a few days to check how things are going.  I have gone in numerous times to pick up food and other supplies and still not very friendly.  We will be finding a new vet to use.

name: kim sharp
text: this is a great place they keep both our dogs healthy and clean, and everyone that works there is friendly, as well as knowledgeable.

name: Greg Tilson
text: Hilde and Harding always have fun at Madison Animal Care Hospital.  Great place and nice staff.

name: Mark Weatherwax
text: My wife and i have been going to see Dr. Grider for several years and she has always been very polite and personable. Most important to me is how a vet handles and interacts with my animals. Secondly, i think the people which employed by the vet also speak volumes for the service and quality of care my animals receive. With that said, I have always found Dr. Grider to be a caring and knowledgable vet. She appears to have a good understanding of our needs and provides quality recommendations. As a whole, i believe that the vet techs employed are good and caring. They don't man-handle my animals and are very sensitive to their needs.

name: Robert Mackie
text:
This place is an absolute RIP OFF! They care about one thing and its to take advantage of clients and make money. the doctors here do not care about the animals.

My dog had simple diarrhea and vomiting. I was told they need to do a blood test, pancreas test, this that and the other.  I was handed an estimate of $175.

The vet was not knowledgable and was shooting darts at the sickness.  She was not friendly or sympathetic.  Did not say thank you or you're welcome.

After declining all these unnecessary tests, I was handed prescription pills and a cream to squirt into the mouth.  The doctor left the room.  I asked the nurse how to administer the cream, she had no clue.  I had to read the instructions on the package.

Without even handing a bill, the receptionist said today's visit is $170. I asked for a bill to see the charges.  I was charged $110 just for the medication.  I came home and googled the prices, amazon has all the meds for $40 total.  These people charge more then double the price for meds?

STAY AWAY from this place!  You will end up paying a HIGH amount for nothing.  Much better friendlier vets in town.  These are your typical vets that take advantage and exploit pet owners.

name: Donna Tripp
text: Fast, caring, priced reasonable

name: Jaime Caldwell
text: A family's small dog was killed by a larger dog while being boarded & they stated the dog was left outside by accident when they let the larger dogs out! Will never take my fur babies here!

name: I.wont. zip.it2021
text: Wonderful place to board your pets!

name: Jeffrey Baker
text: We've always had a good experience whether handling routine business or saying goodbye to treasured animals.

name: Ginny P
text: Absolutely the best. I would never take my babies anywhere else - they get such good care here.

name: Daphne Emery
text: My Pibbles love visiting!

name: Brandi Cagle
text: Pest pet care with a personal touch

name: Rebecca Humpal
text: Wanted me to drop off my elderly, ill dog. "We will look at it and get back to you after starting treatment."  Never had a vet say that, especially for a new client.

name: destiny melgar
text: Great staff, our bill was ridiculous though.

name: Rick Gardner
text: The only place we'll take our pets.

name: Larry wyenandt
text: Superior care for animals

name: Randy Holmes
text: Friendly, life saving diagnosis for my Milo!

name: Richard Kowallik
text: Excellent

name: n
text: Great staff and dr

name: Russ Thomas
text: Great Vet!!

name: Stefanie Vazquez
text: Great place

name: muzeman
text: The staff is very caring at Madison Animal Care Hospital!

name: Dan Nagle
text: Very friendly

name: Donna & Ray Cirimele
text: Dr. Magee is a doctor I have always trusted.  I can't say enough about his experience and honesty.  We have gone to Madison Animal Care for years and will continue to use Dr. Magee.

name: James Bryant
text: They perform unnecessary procedures and prices of the Mayo Clinic!

resp.text: In today’s economic climate, healthcare costs will always be a concern, for pets as well as people.  In every case, we’ll try our best to contain costs while still providing quality care for your dog or cat.  We will be happy to prepare detailed estimates upon request, and will work hard to craft a treatment plan that is both cost effective and does the most to ensure the best possible outcome for your pet.  We also offer Care Credit for clients that would benefit from a payment plan; this can be very helpful when the unexpected occurs.  We truly wish to partner with pet owners in determining the best way to care for their beloved pet, so it is our hope that all our clients will feel free to ask questions at any time regarding their pet’s care.

name: Jennifer Steele
text: Great friendly people. Got my dog groomed and he looked adorable . I would recommend them for your grooming and animal boarding and daycare.

name: Amber Overman
text: Took my 7 month old Great Dane here for the first time today... I’ve been on the hunt for a daycare I can put him in a few days a week to keep him from being bored while I’m at work... the owner is so nice and willing to work with me, the place is cute! I left him all day and came to get him and he was ready up front with her, loving on her but happy to see me and is WIPED OUT from playing all Day! He seemed very calm and happy there... I’ve tried a few others and have picked him up and he seemed almost anxious but not from here!  Ill be dropping him off every Tuesday and Thursday from now on!

name: Tim Vess
text: They took great care of my dogs while we were out of town for Christmas. The kennels are clean, staff friendly and caring . My dogs were in good spirits and healthy when I got them back. Thanks so much !!

name: Mary Thorpe
text: I will definitely be coming back here. I was able to stay during my first visit because my dog is really nervous. She did great with my dog and my dog looks great!!! Great price!!! Thanks for your service!!!

name: Kate Shelton
text: I would give them negative stars if i could! I took my dog for 1 night. We were not able to go on our trip due to someone getting sick. We went back the very next day to pick him up. He was completely covered in mud, his nose and paw is cut open, he is now acting scared of us, and to top it all off...... HIS TAIL IS BROKEN! I have had to take him to the vet after hours, just to find out what is wrong with my daughter's baby. This is a clear sign of abuse or neglect, maybe both. But it will be reported. There is no reason my kids dog should have been mistreated. Do not take your animal here!

name: Maegan Livingston
text: Best experience with our puppies! All 3 of our puppers hate being boarded. But at K-9 Country Club they did not want to leave the kennels after being boarded. The owner is extremely responsible and amazing with responding with questions and check ins with the pups! Great prices and friendly services. I highly recommend K-9 Country Club to all of my friends.

name: Kelly McNutt
text: They do a fabulous job with my fur baby.

name: Patrick Livingston
text: Highly recommend! Very friendly, clean kennels and great prices. She took excellent care of my 3 dogs, one of them didnt even want to leave lol. Definitely will continue to use this business.

name: Justin Richard-L
text: Moved to Huntsville about a year ago. We had a groomer that we loved any didn't think it was possible to find another groomer that we could trust with our animals. Great groomer.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback! We appreciate your business and consider it an honor to groom your precious pet.

name: Rebecca Patton
text: Very happy with our experience! Our Yorkie badly needed groomed, so she had quite a challenge ahead. They did a perfect job, and Josie even smelled great for days.  Will! Will definitely use their services mext time!

name: Kristee Rutland
text: I have a sassy Diva Feline that they were able to do a lion cut and bath on her. The best part was my Maggee Moo knew she looked Great!!!! I highly recommend them to anyone for their fur kids spa days! ♥️😻

resp.text: Thank you for choosing Aussie Pet Mobile! We appreciate your feedback and look forward to see Maggee Moo in the future.

name: Alura Young
text: We've used them twice so far, and the first time they meet you with your puppers outside so they aren't freaked out. He loves it and the girls live him! It's pricey, but we also do a de-shed- and how convenient it is for them to come to YOU! Very happy customers right here.

name: MaKayla Brown
text: Got my mini schnauzer puppy washed and shaved down. Great response time, very timely, they actually showed up 30 mins early. The groomer was very friendly and was very good with my Harley. Also did a wonderful job. Definitely using this service again.

name: Regan Christian
text: We've used them twice now and have already scheduled our next appointment. Cost is a little higher than in-shop grooming, but the convenience is worth it for us. Their groomers are excellent and have done a fantastic job both times.

name: Tessa Dixon
text: Did a great job on my fragile senior black lab. I would recommend this groomer.

resp.text: Thank you for your confidence in our ability to handle your precious pet.  We consider it a honor and appreciate your business!

name: Mongo Slade
text: Great people

resp.text: Thank you for the compliment!
